name: Jeremy Jackson
text: Really helpful staff and quick service.

name: Daniel BUCKNER
text: Sales was a great experience but when you have defect on your vehicle and have to get it fixed expect it to take several days for a simple fix and to be refused a loaner vehicle while waiting on your busy day to day life.

name: Teresa Watts
text: Rachael was great she went above and beyond to make sure I was taken care of. I love the car just wish they had cleaned it better there is still food crumbs and glue on the steering wheel

resp.text: Rachel is a wonderful sales person. I'm glad you had a great experience with us. Please call me so we can schedule a time for you to come in and get your car fully detailed.

name: Jayme Moore
text: If I could give zero stars, I would. Worst experience I have ever had with a car dealership. We test drove a new Titan and were quoted a price. After shopping around, and them blowing my phone up, we called/texted back and were told they would honor the quote given by two different people, including a manager. We made sure of this prior to going, as it is a bit of a drive. When we arrived, they had myseteriously lost our information and the quote they had just referenced on a call the day before from the manager. We refilled out everything, and suddenly the quote was $43k instead of the $38k we were offered previously and told over the phone they would honor. When I called them on the discrepancy, they suddenly started saying that the quote had been on a used Titan, even though they didn't have any used Titans on the lot, and we had driven and looked at four different new ones. The manager on duty (different from the one I had talked to multiple times on the phone), talked down to us and said it was a "misunderstanding". We presented the facts, but the manager blew us off, so we walked out.  They deliberately mislead us, lied, and tried to slide a higher price in on us, even though we had an agreement prior to arrival. I will never do business with Serra in any capacity after this experience.

name: Shun Drake
text: I have always had a great experience at Serra Nissan in Sylacauga Alabama. Morgan was very knowledgeable and helpful when I came into the dealership looking to trade vehicles. Morgan walked be through the entire process and she answered all my questions.

name: cat_g 73
text: They worked hard and got us the best deal, better than what we expected.

name: Crimson Harper
text: We love BIG COUNTRY (Jessica shell) SHES THE BEST. Jim Knight is such an amazing manager great work guys thanks for the beautiful new car and everything y'all did for us...

resp.text: Congratulations on the purchase of your new car!! We appreciate you, our valued customer, here at Serra Nissan of Sylacauga!!

name: leeleenewsome Newsome
text: I had my car towed in due to the alternator going out. They got right to work on it and had it repaired in no time! Thank you to Kenny Stewart and Alana for your hard work!

name: Alfred Wahnish
text: This was the easiest new car purchase experience I've ever had, and over the last 50 years, I've had many!  I was able to conduct the major part of the price negotiation over the phone with the Internet Specialist prior to my going to the dealership in Sylacauga.  Other dealerships I contacted were reluctant to do this and wanted me to be on their lot to "show my commitment".   I didn't want to spend the day haggling, so I went where I was able to have a meaningful dialogue.  Once on Serra's premises, I was treated courteously and they were very respectful of my time.  The whole process took just over 2 hours, and I was driving off in our 2018 Murano!  I would highly recommend giving them a call!  It's worth the drive!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review. I will gladly pass this on to your salesperson.

name: Antonio Davis Jr
text: This place was very helpful and the lady at the desk is superb did a wonderful job thoroughly explained everything overall great experience

resp.text: Thank you, Mr Johnson. We sure do appreciate you, here at Serra Nissan of Sylacauga!!

name: Dori Turner
text: Over all everyone was great.. my only issue was the red wasps nest in the rear hatch of the car you had me test drive..

resp.text: Mrs. Turner, it was a pleasure meeting you yesterday.

name: Jason Towne
text: The sales agent Deann Hall was very attentive and very thorough at finding out what we were looking for.

name: Teresa Maxwell
text:
This place is full of biased and bigoted Management. I went there today because I supposedly won a $500 gift card from Walmart.  I was wearing tennis shoes, sweat pants and a tee shirt. No make-up and my hair was in a ponytail. I showed the "Winning" circular to the management and I sure  did win a card from Walmart. One for $5 not $500 like the circular said I had won. NO ONE tried to even sell me a car. I was dismissed by the person that told me I had only won $5. If , sometime in the future, I need a vehicle, I will NOT go to this place nor recommend  this place to anyone.
I truly believe if I had been "dressed to the nines" I would have been treated better.

name: Amy Maddox
text: Extremely pleased with my purchase last year of a 2015 Altima from Serra Nissan.  My vehicle has been taken care of  in service by a friendly young man named Dustin.  I love my Nissan! Thank you!

name: Candice Payne
text: Set appointment to see car. I live over an hour away, drove all the way there just to be told the car sold 3days prior. Horrible experience.No one thought to call .... just very unorganized for my first experience. Handled very poorly

name: Lexius lexichanbass@yahoo.com
text: I had a great experience!

name: Hustle-ANN Heart
text: Jim Knight and big country are unstoppable. They make promises they can actually keep. Thank you for going above and beyond for our family you guys rock.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review for Country and Jim! We, here at Serra Nissan of Sylacauga, are thankful that we have such an awesome team to help our awesome customers, such as yourself!! Congratulations on the new vehicle!!!!

name: Mark Flanagan
text: My son & I had some issues with the paperwork, our names listed incorrectly on the financial institution paperwork but on the title paperwork for the Alabama license dept was correct.  I had to call the financial institution we were using to purchase the vehicle to get it corrected.  The gentlemen completing our paperwork could never be reached & I found out later was fired.  I was never informed when my car matts would be in, I had to call multiple times.  Apparently several other managers were let go.  The one person who helped me and communicated with me was Laci Branch and helped get everything resolved.  Hopefully the new management is following through their commitments to the customer.  I would give them another shot on my next car because pricing was good, worth the hour drive, 2012 Nissan Murano purchased has been a good dependable vehicle so far, and Laci did a excellent job fixing the problems we had..

resp.text: Mr. Flanagan, my name is Dena Napier-George. I am the Owner Loyalty Manager here at Nissan. I'm touching base with you to make sure that everything is okay with your Murano now. Please get in touch with me via email at dnapiergeorge@serraautomotive.com or feel free to contact me at 256-5000 ext. 2518 I will be here until 5:30 today.

name: Jacob Miller
text: Corrupt.  Crooked.  Thieving.  Conniving.  12 month Grinch that never recants.  Stay away from this place.

name: Jeri Sanford
text: They called and asked me to come in for a great deal. I drove from Pell City. I was informed my credit would only allow for a new car when I had wanted a pre-owned car. They showed me a basic Versa with nothing extra. I'm thinking if the payment is low enough... $410 a month for 7 years. That included an extended warranty I didn't ask for. I would pay for the car in a year and a half with those payments. So what's the 7 years about? I left. Got a message, great news, we can work with you. I came back, same story and deal. Why waste my time? I didn't call you, you called me. This place is a joke.

name: Penny Brooke
text: Excellent deal on my truck. Paper work takes way too long. Deann was super.

name: Brook McMillan
text:
NEVER BUY A CAR FROM THIS LOT!
I recently bought a Nissan Vera Note. The car seemed well at first then 2 months later the transmission went out and when we went to tell the management about the incident they laughed in our faces and cursed us out of the building. The company gave NO effort to help pay for or help like a company should. I am a full time working college student and will have to take out a large loan to fix the WHOLE transmission.

name: Eunicelynne Chavis
text: Drove 2 hours give us one price over the phone in a totally different when we got there.. unreasonable!

name: James Kelley
text: Had recall work done. Work was completed in a timely manner.

name: Shenikia Malone
text: I just bought a 2017 Nissan Maxima and I love it!!!! Great cars, great customer service

name: Jamie Martin
text: Very disappointed!  I called Serra on Dec 12, 2015 to inquire about a car on their website.  It seemed like an awesome price.  However, I didn't want to drive to Sylacauga from Cullman without more info. The dealer I spoke to proceeded (as expected) to sell me a new car rather than the used one I called about.  He finally said he would go to the used lot across the street to check on the car I called about.  He called me back and said they haven't ever had the car that I called about and that their internet guy makes lots of mistakes.  I checked the internet today (Dec 15) and the car is still listed. Instead of the well priced $15999, it is now listed at a more logical $19900.  I don't appreciate being told a lie.  I would have probably bought the car Saturday at the advertised price.  I would have even appreciated being told the appropriate price more than being told a lie.

name: DodgeCummings 04
text: I have done business with Joel Nuss, who is now the full owner of this dealership. It has been an excellent experience. I, being in the same business as he, know without a doubt he is striving to sell great vehicles and do a good business with people. He wants to make his customers happy. We have had behind the scene conversations about this. You can have full confidence in knowing this place will live up to their end of the deal. They tell what they know about the vehicles. They cannot predict the future of how a vehicle performs, but they try to sell good ones and make people happy.

name: Coins, Dreams & Crazy Things
text: What an amazing team! As a female shopper I know we can sometimes feel intimidated, or even a bit uncomfortable while car shopping. This was not my experience at all at NAW. These gentlemen were informative, honest and most of all respectful. They worked with me for several days with several vehicles until I found the perfect one for my family and I. They are quick to respond to messages, and have truly gone above and beyond what a car dealership normally would. You can trust these guys to get a great vehicle at a fair price, and most of all customer service that doesn't even compare to others in this industry. Trust Joel, Diane, Luke, Blake , Junior and Tommy! It's amazing how I've been treated by these folks!

name: Jason Clark
text: I drove 4 hours there to go purchase a truck. I asked if anything was wrong with the truck and they assured me there was not a thing wrong with the truck and there’s no dents/scratches in truck. When I get there I see there are scratches and dents. The truck had various amounts of minor problems and head aches. The only reason I bought it was because I had already drove 4 hours. I would not consider this a trust worthy business. “Excellent vehicle all the way around” was the biggest lie I’ve heard..  Enjoying the truck so far because the variety of issues.

name: Cody45551
text: I have been dealing with these guys at North Alabama Wholesale autos for over 10 years now. I have to say they will do things that most car dealers wont. I have never had an issue with buying a vehicle from them. Just good people with big hearts!!! Thanks for all u have done!!

name: Christian Simmons
text: Thank you Guys for the great deal on my ram 3500.I called these guys last week and was coming from Atlanta to buy this truck.I sent in a deposit to hold it and when I finally got there the truck was Detailed full of fuel.Joel Nuss also took care of my motel room and dinner here because it was late and I had worked all day before coming up.Joel and Diane Nuss do a great job here and make you feel at home. Has to be the best experience I’ve ever had buying a truck.You guys go above and beyond.There son Blake took care of me as well.Thanks again guys and I will be sending ALL of my friends your way!

text: Just bought a 2004 GMC Sierra at a great price! The staff was very friendly and family oriented. I would definitely buy from them again I highly recommend North Alabama Wholesale.

name: Stacy Clark
text:
Offered to buy truck and send nonrefundable deposit and got the runaround.

I've bought multiple vehicles from out of state and a $500 deposit tends to get cooperation  from more reputable dealers.

I then offered to have my bank wire the funds or overnight the check and they wouldn't go for that; keep in mind this was Dec 23rd so getting my credit union to fund same day without wiring instructions for an out of state transaction would not be possible.

Was offered the truck if I could get there, 4 hours away, with full cash payment.

Later that day they raised the price 10%, sounds like the owner messed up on his pricing and wanted to find any way to not honor the price he initially offered me.

After reading these other reviews I think it was for the better.

name: Julie Gay
text:
I recently purchased a Tahoe from North Alabama Wholesale. The salesman was very helpful and nice with the process. I would recommend my friends/family members to purchase a vehicle from them. Joel Nuss and his staff tries to make sure each customer leaves happy with their purchase..

name: Luke Costello
text: I bought a truck from this dealership and got totally scammed. I bought it from another state and trusted the dealership to be honest and trustworthy and did not receive that. I specifically asked the salesman if there was any rust underneath because i know this years truck is prone to that and he told me no and that it was all clean. I had it shipped to me and when it got here it was COVERED with rust underneath and was even missing parts of the body due to being eaten up by rust. I did not even get the truck of the transport truck and told them to ship it back. I had to eat the shipping costs for going there and back. I have now contacted the dealership and told them I want my money returned. This dealership was a total lie and deceitful transaction.

name: Patty Douthit
text: Loving my Nissan Altima that I purchased from these guys. The family environment was top notch. Will definitely send my friends to buy there vehicles there. The owner Joel Nuss had my car filled up and threw in a warranty on the house!!  Customer service was fantastic

name: Reagan Short
text: One of the workers there, Luke Parker, was extremely helpful to me! I highly recommend that anybody use North Alabama Wholesale. You will be very pleased!

name: Clay Messer
text: I only had about a five minute conversation with the sales guy/owner/worker.  I asked him to send me a few more pictures of the vehicle and he acted like it was too much trouble.  I live about 3 hours away from this dealership and just wanted to see a few more pictures before I drove three hours just to look under the hood of a truck.  I can certainly understand that he gets a lot of "tire kickers" in his business, but I run a small business as well.  I treat every customer with the same amount of respect whether they are purchasing from me or not.  If everything checked out okay, I would have given him cash for the full amount just as soon as I could get up there.  Now, I feel that he doesn't deserve any business whatsoever.  That's just my opinion.

text: Absolutely a great dealership.Owner Carl Nuss and his staff are doing a great job.We love our Tahoe that we purchased.They made everything easy and fast.The customer service couldn't be better.We will send all of our friends and family there to see these guys.Thank y'all again!!! Updated. Done business there for over 20 years and they always kept their word. I don't know if it's a change in ownership or what but that has changed. A month ago there was a vehicle I was very interested in. A week went by and it was still there so I went in with my husband and talked to Joel about it. He said ownership was changing and his dad was going to be leaving and to give him a couple weeks and he would give us an awesome deal on it which was fine because we needed to sell our vehicle to purchase that one. After 2 weeks we had a buyer for ours and was told to call the following week and set up time to do the deal on the vehicle I wanted so bad. Well I called 2 days ago and left message for him and told them it was about the blazer, she said ok he will call you back. Never heard anything. My husband calls up there today and he isn't in so my husband asked if blazer was still there. Guy says no we sold it back last week.😡 Well good damn thing we told guy that was buying ours that we couldn't do deal until the day we was able to get other one. I understand someone could have came and offered more than we was buying it for but Atleast he could have had the decency to call and let us know.

text: BUYER BEWARE. AWFUL BUISNESS. Worst experience trying to buy a car I have EVER had. Had already been to the bank and gotten our loan, got on the phone with them to let them know we were getting the check later that day and coming to get the vehicle, because they told us once we let them know we were approved and coming to get it they would pull it off the lot, lock it up and pull the stickers off but they did nothing but hassle us and rush us and tell us they were running it through the auction that same day then right after let us know that "someone just came in with cash in hand and sold it." DURING THE SAME PHONE CALL, how ironic. My fiancé is on second shift so we were trying to do it as soon as we were able and had time but that wasn't good enough for them. Awful customer service, awful business.

text: We had a WONDERFUL experience buying at Eagle Automotive!  Debbie and Kelly are incredible! name: Misty Perkins
text: I have been searching for a car for about a month. I have been to car dealerships where I wasn't feeling the car or the price and was pressured by the sales people over and over. I had been eyeing the Corollas on their website. I signed up to view the car at 5 AM. By 7 AM, before the store even opened, Kelly, the Director of Fleet had emailed me the Carfax and a rough estimate of the cost. When I arrived, Debbie had the car ready for us to try out, when we returned the paperwork was ready and I was ready to sign. I had to run to the bank to secure a loan and while we did that Debbie went and filled up the car for us. This was the quickest, painless, and best way to buy a car. I didn't have to haggle or anything. I honestly believe this car was an absolute steal and I am so happy with my purchase. I hope it will be a while, but my spouse and I will be repeat customers. Thank you, Debbie for being a total rockstar and go above and beyond! You are fantastic! If you need a car- I highly recommend Eagle Automotive!

text: I had been looking for a 2019-2020 Kia Sorento for a few weeks and everytime I found one online that was any kind of a good deal it was gone before I could get to it. I e-mailed Debbie and asked if I could put some money down and her hold it until I could get there? (I was out of state and 3 hrs away) She gladly took my $250 down payment and 3 days later on Saturday my wife and I drove down and Debbie gave us the keys and said "go drive it and check it out". We drove it, loved it and with a small amount of paperwork we were on our way home with a "like new" car. I had some issues with my DMV in my state and Debbie was GREAT to get me the extra paperwork I needed to get it licensed. I would HIGHLY recommend anyone who is looking for an almost brand new car for an AMAZING price to contact Debbie at Eagle Automotive in Huntsville AL, she will take care of you!!!

name: Dillon Austin
text: So I want to start off by saying I live in TN, after calling every (3) Alfa dealerships in TN and not getting an answer, I called this one in Huntsville AL. I had several technical questions involving parts I needed for my Alfa Romeo 4C. Not only was Scott able to determine the part numbers I had were wrong, he was able to find out what the right part numbers were, along with sending me a diagram and price of the parts I needed, as well as calling me back within 5 minutes and giving me a price for several different types of shipping available. He was extremely helpful.  Although this dealership is 5hrs away, Scott has earned my trust and this will be the dealership I use if I ever need help again. Customer service at its best. Very highly recommended.

name: Rick Hill
text: I had found a base model 2018 Stelvio at a used car lot in town and wanted to get it checked out by alfaromeousaofhuntsville — was placed in phone tag cycle while they tried to connect me with anyone who could help so that should have been my first sign they aren’t actively selling/servicing Alfa Romeo vehicles. Interested in buying a higher end Stelvio from a local dealership, I found a 2019 Alfa Romeo Stelvio on the alfaromeousaofhuntsville website that looked good - very low miles.  I called the dealership and was told by the salesperson on the phone (Lou?) that I knew more about his inventory than he did, which made me hesitant to buy from them. Determined, I drove to the dealership and met a salesperson named Matthew who, trying to be helpful, suggested I go to their website to price a car if I wanted to buy one. Brochures were only available online. He gave me an old Alfa Romeo magazine and his Dodge/Chrysler/Jeep/Ram/Fiat business card as a thank you for stopping by. I felt like he hadn’t even seen an Alfa Romeo vehicle in person. They had nothing in stock to test drive. I ended up going to Birmingham where the knowledgeable staff had six pre-owned Stelvio SUVs I was able to look at and test drive, with more coming in, and a few new dozen cars/SUVs on the lot to choose from, too. I gladly bought with confidence a 2018 Stelvio Ti Sport from the Birmingham dealership and will get my vehicle serviced there.

name: Amy Smithson
text: Shannon Kay Rascoe made the task of buying a used car an enjoyable experience. She went above and beyond. You leave feeling like you have a friend who just happens to sell cars.

name: Jason Glasscock
text: Great Place and Service, second to none.

name: Captain Flounder
text: My less than stellar experience ends with no car or even a test drive.  I communicated with the sales manager and inquired about a very specific vehicle.  I provided the stock #.  I was then referred to a sales person for a test drive the following day.  When I showed up the vehicle was inside the dealership and the sales rep thought I was interested in an SUV,  or the sedan I clearly indicated.  I left.  If you’re going to waste my time before I even get to drive a vehicle I shudder to think what the rest of the process would be like.  Luckily there are Alfa Romeo dealerships in Birmingham and Nashville.  I will take my business there.

resp.text: We realize you have options and would like to have a second chance to show you what we are capable of doing.

name: J Dub
text:
Leased an Alfa Romeo Giulia from the good folks at Alfa Romeo of Huntsville (Landers McLarty) a few months back.  Working with Deonte Sutton via email on a good price was very easy and painless.  True to his word, the car was ready for me on the day we agreed upon and the sales transaction was uneventful (which is a GOOD thing).  Brian Moultry handled the sale in-store and he was also very easy to work with, as well as pretty knowledgeable about the car I was buying.  Lastly, Don Alexandria in Finance provided the quickest and non-aggressive "backroom" dealing I've ever had at a dealership.  He was very precise, succinct and most importantly, wasn't too pushy at selling the usual dealership upgrades.

There was a mixup with the bank on the paperwork, so I had to come back in to sign a new lease.  However, this wasn't their fault in any way, and once again the transaction went flawlessly.  No funny business and none of the fast moves were pulled that some dealerships often get associated with.  Seriously, if you're in the market for an Alfa in Huntsville, don't hesitate to work with these folks.

I will definitely be taking my business back there soon.

resp.text: We know you have a lot of choices and are glad you choose us! Glad to hear we could make the process painless. Thanks for the 5 star feedback and for your business!

name: Eunice Paige
text:
OH MYGOODNESS!!!! They took ❤ CARE❤of me. However,  I must first give HONOR TO MY LORD & SAVIOR JESUS CHRIST❗❗❗#THANKYOUJESUS❗❗❗
It has been 2 years preparing for this moment of obtaining favor & credit worthiness to finally be approved for a 2018 Chrysler Pacifica. Thank you to Deonte, Julie, their General Manager & MY LORD!!! "THE TAXI LADY," (LUX BLACK), IS AT YOUR SERVICE... 😄💎💃💍💃👑💃💍💃💎😄

resp.text: Eunice, we so appreciate your business and this nice review! Thank you for doing business with us!

name: Gary Watkins
text: Really good deals and good service

resp.text: Gary, thank you for your business and the five star feedback.

name: Ashley Lanningham
text: Had the best experience ever buying a truck today. Lukas was more than helpful and patient with us today. He answered all the questions, and even got three different keys in the rain for different trucks! The atmosphere here is totally different than any other car lot, they are not pressuring you in to anything and not trying to get you to drive what they want you too! They are definitely there to please the customer!

name: Jaime Pettaway
text: Absolutely amazing customer service.  I purchased an SUV that had some issues after I bought it and they made it right with no questions asked.  They even came to Birmingham to pick it up.  My salesman, Jordan was so kind and very helpful.  I 100% recommend this place to anyone.

name: BobbieJo Salyers
text: Jordan was amazing.  We usually use Carmax and avoid dealerships like the plague.  Our experience here has changed our opinion and now we have 2 options for the purchase of a used vehicle.  No pressure tactics used and the honesty was quite refreshing.  Thank you guys for a great experience and an amazing used SUV.  Top notch for sure!!  If you have not visited this place..I would highly recommend you do.

name: nathan7727
text: I found Jordan to be extremely helpful and professional, without being pushy or high pressure. He quickly chased down answers to every question I had. He kept me in the loop during the process. He looked for solutions to options that I really wanted on the vehicle they had that I liked, and that I ended up buying. And he was just plain friendly and enjoyable to work with. I would ABSOLUTELY recommend you visit him for your next used purchase. Their inventory is pretty broad, and the vehicles are in great shape! You can tell that they really work hard at selecting top notch vehicles for their lot.

name: Jeff Glenn
text: Great experience. Jordan was top-notch, very knowledgeable / friendly / prompt in his responses to questions and not a pushy salesman. Good inventory and fair deal on trade and purchase of truck. Thanks again Jordan!!

name: Wesley Stephens
text: We have purchased vehicles from other dealers in the past, and our experience with Young Motors was hands down the best by far! Moose and Jordan answered any question that I had and didnt make me feel pressured into a purchase. They have a great top notch set of inventory to choose from!!

name: Thomas Wadsworth
text: Great people awesome service fantastic cars n prices!!!

name: Madison Hamilton
text: I had a wonderful experience here! It was my first time buying a car and I was very nervous and inexperienced with car buying. Wayne did a tremendous job with helping me out and filling me in on everything I needed to know. He was able to help get my first car financed when I wasn’t able to get approved elsewhere. They have great quality cars for great prices! Be sure to ask for Wayne as he is very helpful!

name: Glen Hutchison
text:
Thoroughly enjoyed the experience! Jacey took the time to send us pictures and answer all our questions. In our situation she was able to work out the details of our trade before we even got there.
No pressure, no high fees and a very easy process.

name: Michael Jones
text: Troy, Wayne and the whole staff were great... Couldn't have asked for a better group to buy from...

name: Karen Phillips
text: The owner was very professional at helping my husband find a tire for our car, put tire on,  and was done in like 10 mins or less.  I will recommend him to anybody if they need tires.  Thank you sir

name: Shyla Hutchison
text:
What a fantastic experience!  We found this listing on facebook marketplace, but weren't able to make it out to see the vehicle for a couple of days.  It was a bit of a drive, so I had lots of questions before wanting to make the hour drive.  Jacey was super quick to respond, so knowledgeable, polite, and helpful, and answered every question I had. She also sent me lots of extra pictures since we were looking for some very specific features. She even did quite a bit of preliminary leg work on letting us know if a trade was possible (it was, and very fair, in our opinion).

Once we finally made it out she made the entire process smooth, quick, and super easy.  She even cheerfully stayed late as we couldn't make it out until close to closing time. She was beyond polite and helpful throughout the entire process.  We couldn't recommend her or Young Motors more highly!

name: Cory Smith
text: Never been more pleased with a dealership!! Awesome customer service. Never had a problem with my 2015 GMC Sierra SLT 2500. I highly recommend that you stop in and check out their inventory!!!

name: Michael Clement
text: What I had been searching for happened to be nearly 3 hours away from home but I wouldn't do a thing differently. Worth the drive, dealer was honest about what to expect before I made the drive and I would definitely buy another vehicle from them. Good folks. Thank you!

text: Nice lot, just didnt have what we were looking for

name: Dalton Jacobs
text: Sold me a truck with some issues and never fixed the problem... was in their shop twice for over a week each time.... hard to get in touch with owner/boss. Wouldn't recommend this place to anyone. Horrible visit. Truck is currently parked because of the issues. Older guy there is a rude as hell..

name: Kelly Grider
text: Went here on a Saturday afternoon for a truck I had been looking at on their website for a couple weeks. Had all intentions of trading my brand new Jeep for a powerstroke they had.. that was until I went to ask to test drive and older man working inside told us "Sorry we don't do joy rides. You can only drive them when you've got all your finances with you and ready to buy." Oh? I wasn't aware that's how car buying works. Yeah I bet I do go to purchase before I've even sat in the damn vehicle. Ridiculous.... and rude! Can't believe that's how they treat customers walking around looking at 40,000 dollar trucks. Lost our business instantly. 👋🏼👋🏼👋🏼

name: Jerry Campbell
text:
EarIier this year I had a 1987 S10 with a 350ci worked on for worked on for 30+ minutes  and was charged zero.  Dennis Morgan the service manager said the mechanic was unable to  improve it but also stated what needed to be done and if I needed them to let them know.  Thanks Dennis Morgan..

In August I returned with the same auto after someone else worked on it. They did the fine tuning for $25.50.  I should have used them for the complete repair instead of wasting alot of money and time? A very costly mistake on my part.

Thanks Dennis Morgan (Manger) and Jesse Simmons (Mechanic)

I would use them again and highly recommend them to anyone who wants to be treated fairly and needed help at a very fair price! They let you make the decisions and apply no pressure to get yor business! Its very hard to find a business like that today!

resp.text: Thanks for the high recommendation, Jerry. Happy we were able to help. Don't hesitate to reach out anytime you need our assistance again. All the best. - David Below

text: I had a car emergency and limped in to their shop early Monday morning. Greg was already there and welcomed me in even though they were not open yet. Greg and the entire staff were friendly and professional. The facility was incredibly clean, both the shop and showroom. I do not hesitate recommending them.

resp.text: I'm so glad we were able to help you out with your car, Greg. My team does their best to make sure our customers are well taken care of and that our work stays fast and exceptional. Thanks for the awesome rating, and if you ever need anything else we're here for you! -David Below

text: He ruined my vehicle!!!! Service manager made me feel 1 inch tall! But he does have a cute nice helpful wrecker driver named Earl!! I wish he was not taken.

name: Gene Simmons
text: I was taking a trip from Florida to Kentucky and below car clinic treated me and my mother like family even though we had never met. I needed a helicoil done when my spark plug blew out of the head and Wesley took care of it on his lunch break so we would be on our way. They even went and got us lunch while we waited. The world needs more amazing honest people like them. Best experience I've ever had with any auto repair shop. 5 stars all day long

resp.text: Gene, we're so glad you were pleased with the service we provided to you while you were on your trip. It's never good to have an issue -- especially when you're away from home. We hope you're doing well! -David Below

text: Very helpful, great prices, and they don't try to pressure you by keeping you there all day and wearing you down. I'd recommend Below Car Clinic to anyone looking for a vehicle or needing work done on one.  If you are tired of be mistreated try this place.

resp.text: Kevin, thanks for the great review! We're so glad you were pleased with our prices and service, too. Come back again soon! -David Below

text: This man sold me a lemon!!! DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM HIM!! I haven't even got to drive the car a solid week since I got it and now the motor is blown!! What a CON!!!

name: Chandrya Alvis
text:
Hello, I’m a 21 year old 1st time buyer , I feel as if they played me about my warranty, my car & my overall sale. when I first got the car on June 18,2020
I needed a oil change badly!! The car had 0% oil life! Once I did that I needed a new water pump , Also I soon discovered  my 2014 Chevy Cruze had a oil leak as well..
then the thermostat went out , I had to replace the battery all out these things came of my pocket with in 2 months of having the car
also while maintaining my car note and car insurance I’ve never been late or missed any payments due to the fact I work to pay these bills. I’ve only had the car 5 months and here goes the motor just gone out..

when we recall all the problems this car had and I was fixing it every time something happen the mechanic and I agreed that it’s been a problem with the motor he also told me Chevy Cruze’s had a recall on their motor!!
The dealership never told me this! The mechanic did , now here iam 2 week later without a car , a rental , no communication from the dealership or warranty company just nothing I’m paying to get my car looked at  I’m missing work and I have to do everything alone every time I call GENE HE TELLS ME TO CALL TROY!! Finally I called TROY just wanting to get help with my car getting fixed by this 2 year warranty i supposed to have  because once I sent it to real good mechanic they told him I didn’t have a warranty!! That  I was supposed to have & they don’t know anything!! I had to find the warranty number alone and when I get Troy on the phone he’s “sick with COVID-19” so I guess that means hang up in my face because he’s not feeling well BUT NEITHER AM I!! I’m a 21 year old women who pays her bills on time and have to get to work!!  I really need my car due to me having two jobs and was responsible for getting myself to work. I feel like I bought a lemon!! Well proofs in the pudding my advice to upcoming buyers... TAKE A MECHANIC AND LET HIM TEST DRIVE IT !! It’s only one person at Langston motors that tried to help me during this process and that’s Troy daughters she’s a angle and I thank you so Much for trying to do what you can to help me!!! I really appreciate you the most!! Thanks for everything!

Sincerely, A angry black women.

name: Mo Bd
text: I highly recommend this company to anyone looking for superb customer service, excellent execution when assisting customers, along with being patient as well as specific when talking to a customer about parts and or replacement issues. This company is the best!!

text: The salesman was great that day.  The car maintenance light was on and when my mom took it back she was given the run around. We ended up having to get the oil changed at the dealership. So before you sign papers to purchase a car there, make sure everything is done because they are not doing anything once you buy and sign papers.

text: Amazing people! Ive had so many issues with trying to get a car. Most dealeeships i went to would pretty much laugh in my face but the people at langston motors are amazing. They bent over backwards for me and looked at me as a person and not a potential dollar sign. They do not shop you around the banks making your credit drop from being pulled so much. text: Purchased vehicle here off eBay. It was really cheap, and we already knew it would need work. They told us what problem the car had.

text: Chicken was wonderful.

name: Patricia Seymour
text: Love Gulf Coast Auto Group staff.  It’s the Audi that’s the problem.  I only have approximately 46K miles on the car.  She’s pretty.  But the convertible top has leaked since the purchase.  Then there have been so many problems with other parts, and a 3x AC problem/fix (qualifying it as a lemon), that it has been in the shop as much as it’s been with me.  I have a color-coded chart. When I let the “powers that be” at Audi know about the first few years of problems, they basically said, “FU with a smile”.  This car was actually built in Germany.  My German friends would be appalled.  They take their car quality very seriously.

name: Emily
text: I had a great experience purchasing my new car from Gulf Coast Auto Group. I highly recommend Mr. Kenny Cunningham. He was professional, honest, friendly, and made my buying experience easy and fast. All of the staff I spoke with were friendly and professional. I will use them in the future.

name: Ellie M
text: My service representative, Laura Collier, is wonderful! She always ensures that every issue is resolved. We have been extremely satisfied with the service that she and the mechanics at Audi of Mobile have provided to us over the past 5 years with our two Audis. My son took his Audi to another local repair shop and they caused damage to the vehicle because they lacked the knowledge and skills to properly perform the repairs. We then took his car to Audi of Mobile and they corrected everything! I will ONLY have my Audi Q5 serviced at Audi of Mobile.

name: Makenzie Brenner
text: I admit I was nervous to purchase a car online from a dealership over 6 hours away, but Gulf Coast Auto, specifically Devon made the experience seamless. Great communication, fantastic customer service and product knowledge. It was honestly the best experience I could’ve hoped for. 100% worth the road trip down and I am obsessed with my new car!

name: Queen Royalty
text: Everyone there is so nice and helpful. The finance department and the sales person (Alfredo Montes) made sure we understood the offer for our Volkswagen Atlas.

name: Myra C.
text: I went to Porsche of New Orleans and they were trying to blantantly make the 2018 Macan I wanted inaccessible. These fools really tried to make me put down 20,000 for a 500/month car payment. AVOID THAT DEALERSHIP AT ALL COST. They did not want to sell to a African American woman. Anyways, I found 2 more 2018 Macans in the Mobile area the same evening so we decided to go the next day. BEST DECISION EVER! I traded in my 2014 Infiniti Q60S that I loved dearly for a 2018 Porsche Macan! As a traveling CVOR tech, I needed more space and Kendarrius ensured that I didn’t leave without the vehicle that I wanted! I literally pulled up at 12:15 and was driving off at 4:30!! That was crazy fast, but if you are looking for an amazing deal on a beautiful car, THIS is the place to go. My monthly payment is 585/month on a PORSCHE!! That’s unheard of! They knew I wanted the car and this dealership made sure I left in it without having to eat bread and water for the next couple of years!

name: Monica Mingo
text:
My last two vehicles were Land Rovers.  I narrowed this purchase to an Audi or a Land Rover.  Devon took me on my test drives after donning a mask and I left with total knowledge of the Q5.  I went to the Land Rover dealership and was left knowing the same about their vehicles as I already knew upon arrival.  I was also unhappy with the attitude once I requested the salesman wear a mask during the test drive.

I called Devon the next morning to let him know that my husband and I would be returning and, when we got there, Devon was ready to go.  This young man has received several awards and accolades based on his performance and knowledge of Audi vehicles. I noticed two certifications on his desk.

Headed there my husband told me we were not going to buy the vehicle today and that this was simply an exploratory mission and that he wanted to test drive and then get the information in order to make a thoughtful decision.  After speaking with Devon at length, we ended up buying the Q5 same day.

Devon simply makes you feel good.  You sense his honesty right up front and there were no questions he couldn't answer.  We truly felt we were in extremely competant hands.

Thank you to Devon, the auto group, and for making it easy to jump the Land Rover ship and become a member of the Audi family.

name: Keri Van Atta
text: Alfredo Montes was very helpful and nice. We ended up not being able to afford the car we wanted, but he never made us feel bad or embarrassed. And most importantly he didn't make us feel like we wasted his time. He went above and beyond for us and I really appreciate it! Thanks Alfredo!!😊😊😊

name: Lee Lee
text: Courtney was so accommodating & super nice. Thanks Courtney- appreciate!

name: Daniel Flores
text: Purchased a VW all over the phone with Doug Klezmer. Doug took great care of me with a very smooth and convenient purchase. Very happy all the way around. Wish all car purchases were this easy! Thanks, Doug!

name: Michele
text: Me and my husband have had so many bad experiences here before the name change and new management or whatever. We always made appointments and would be there for 3 or 4 hours, we hated going there and the customer service was horrible! Today was the first time we've been there in at least a year or more and we were amazed at how much more better it is now. Our appointment was at 1 and we were out in less than an hour. Sean took great care of us and kept updated about what was going on with our car! The customer service was AMAZING! We have never experienced such great service like we did today. Thank you so much Laura and Sean and everyone for such a great experience and service we received today from you all!

name: Wayne Douglas
text: This dealership is very deceptive and dishonest. My salesperson was Alfredo. I specifically asked them to run my credit only through VW and stated that on the credit application. I found out a few days later that they had run it through all 3 credit bureaus instead and when I confronted Alfredo about it he said that that is just the way they do business and that my credit won't be hurt if I buy a car from them. My credit score dropped 24 points because of their unethical sales tactics. Most car manufacturers have their on inhouse financial arm so when you run your credit directly through them you only take an 8 point hit so that's why I made the specific request. Because I value my credit score so much it is very high and now I am reluctant to have it run at another dealership to get the car I want because of Alfredo and his companies dishonesty. This is just the worst fo many misleading statements Alfredo made to me. You're better off driving to one of the surrounding cities to buy your next vehicle than from here.

name: Krista Blanton-Goguen
text:
We recently bought our first Volvo. AJ has gone out of his way to make this experience as seamless as possible. His knowledge about the car far surpasses any other dealership we have worked with.
The vehicle is amazing and capable of so many things.  Each time the technology out smarts me he is always available to answer my text or phone call and walk me through it.
I just appreciate the extra effort he always goes to to make us feel valuable. I love my Volvo and don’t plan on going anywhere else for my future vehicles.

name: Caleb Anderson
text:
My wife and I recently purchased a used Jeep Compass from King and have had nothing but trouble after leaving the lot. I should start off by saying they did sell the vehicle "as-is" but when you purchase from a dealer I believe there is an assumption that what you are purchasing will be somewhat reliable.
On the way home from the dealership (Day 1) we were sitting in a drive-thru at idle and noticed the car would shake violently until we either moved or placed the car in neutral.
Day 2 my wife was on her way to work and noticed the brakes were squealing.
This is where things get "interesting". We were told by King to take it to a local Jeep dealer to get a safety recall issue sorted out. When I came to pick up the Jeep, the service department manager at our local dealership (NOT King) came to speak to me and said there were several issues with the car and he "did not understand how the vehicle passed any inspection to be sold". So of course, this alarmed me and I asked him what all he found. He said that all 4 motor mounts needed to be replaced, the rear brakes were shot, and the rear wheel cylinders were visibly leaking oil. He gave a repair estimate of $1600. On a vehicle that, to us, was less than 2 weeks old at the time.
So, I called the dealership who after 3 phone calls finally got back to me and said they were sorry for the inconvenience and I should be expecting a call from the used dealer manager and my salesman within the hour. Fast forward 2 days later, I get a call from a manager who says there is no way he can guarantee they will cover the repair but if I want to drive the car back to them and wait on the service department that maybe it would be something they would take care of IF "they felt like it was something they missed" and that I would hear from my salesman to schedule a service date within an hour. Again, a couple days later I get a call from the salesman who says the dealership has decided not to look at the car and that they would not cover any repair.
*So, bottom line, I would NOT recommend King Valley as a dealership. Do not expect ANY reliability from their used cars because even they do not. I was told "we expect vehicles with over 100K miles to have some trouble". Well sure, but immediately after driving off the lot??

name: Teresa Randle
text:
I have not only had one excellent experience with King Ford, I’ve had two superb experiences.  Greg Johnson, my salesman, was not pushy.  I first met Greg back in August 2017, when I  was shopping around between three different name brand SUVs.  I currently had a 2011 Toyota Venza.  I have always been loyal to Toyota products.  Ranging from SR5 hatchback, corolla,, 2 camry’s, highlander, and my Venza.  The Venza was nice and was very comfortable; But since Toyota didn’t make the Venza any more, my husband recommended that I try looking at the Lincoln MKX.  I had done my research and knew exactly what I wanted on my new vehicle.  I googled Lincoln dealerships close to my house, and King Ford Lincoln dealership located in Valley, Alabama popped up.  My daddy had always helped me with dickering for a good price,  but still leaving room for the dealership to still make some money ( all without breaking my pocket book).  My daddy passed away in 2011 and this was the first time I had to put all that knowledge to use that my daddy taught me.  So off I go, to Valley, AL.  I pulled up to King Ford Lincoln and started walking the lot.  Greg Johnson came up to me and asked if I had any questions, which I did.  I was looking for a Lincoln MKX with very specific options.  He only had one on the lot and it had just been pulled off the delivery truck.  He went and got the keys and off we go on a test ride.  I sat in the drivers seat, and immediately feel in love with the way the seats hugged my back.  When you start getting older, you are looking for comfort.  This vehicle outshined the other two brands that I had been considering.  I told Greg that I wanted to think about it and I would get back with him.  I really wanted to see if he was going to be blowing up my phone in pushing me to buy.  That was not the case.  After three days, of constant consideration, I called him back and asked if the vehicle was still available.  I’m so glad it was.  I headed back to Valley, AL and started talking price.  The sales team was so friendly, and really worked hard to get me multiple incentives and a great trade in price and still be Able to walk away with both arms and legs.  I was so pleased with the service and friendly staff, that when my husband said he was ready for a new Ford F-150 truck, instead of going to our local Ford dealership in Columbus, GA, we went back to King Ford.  While looking at several trucks with Greg Johnson, The sales manager, Jimmy Scroggins, walked up and he recognized me from my purchase 7 months ago and could tell me what I bought, as well as, what I traded in.  I was impressed.  Again the sales staff went over and above to find my husband the exact truck he was looking for.  I was in and out  of the dealership still feeling great about my purchase and the new friends I made at King Ford that I now consider family.  Thank you Greg, Kevin, Jimmy, and Mr. Porter, for a great experience at King For Lincoln.  I highly recommend this dealership to anyone looking for a new vehicle.  They truly treat you like family.

Teresa Randle

text: I purchased a car from this company not even exactly a complete two months. Within two days the car was having problems engine idled light came on, car was saying it was over heating, speed reduce do to over heated engine. I took the car back to first class the mechanic stated they had to order a part and that because the car is controlled by sensors that is why the car was saying it was over heated. Reminder this car supposedly past a inspection. The car was smoking I called and advised the company they stated oh because you just got a new part it probably just some old oil burning it’s fine. Last month the car ran hot again I called the company and was told someone would call me back no call was ever made I put coolant in it and it seemed ok. The car ran hot again so I called first class again they stated they had no messages or they didn’t see where I called(the woman was the same person I left a message with a month ago) because I was getting a oil change at pep boys I asked if they could tell me why my car was running hot they did a diagnostic test and first class stated pep boys is not covered under the warranty no problem I just needed to take it to a place that was covered under the warranty I did firestone. Firestone then talk to the warranty company and advised them if their diagnosis and made it urgent that the car be towed to a mechanic shop and requested that company be Chevrolet. The warranty company then had the car towed to Chevrolet. Chevrolet calls and say the warranty company is only covering a certain portion and the out of pocket remaining balance is 400 and some odd dollars reminder this is the same problems that were occurring when I first got the car. The first class is giving me the run around and are very unprofessional. I asked to speak with owner and was told he may be in today he may not but a email will be sent to him and once he responds I will get a call back. I am a single mother of two kids I have not been able to get to work. I gave this company every dollar I had and they are telling me to use use my insurance for a rental or my own money for a rental and get reimbursed. This has been the WORST experience EVER! I would never recommend or purchase from first class auto.I forgot to mention within the two days I purchased the car and it ran hot I was given a check for a rental($200) which in order for me to the rental $400 had to be held on the card I explained to first class I had given them every dime I had.

name: robert2002bmw
text: Buyers beware! This place is selling wrecked cars to people. They claim that the cars have been inspected, but I noticed some vehicles with some pretty bad damage. Make sure you get a Carfax before you spend your money. If you are ok with that then feel free to visit this dealer. This is not meant to discredit them but they should make sure to tell people upfront.

resp.text: Sir. as much as we encourage our customers to leave reviews, EVERYTHING in this review is simply untrue. We, nor any dealership that finances through banks, are allowed to sell vehicles that have been wrecked, have a salvaged title, or water damage. All of our vehicles come with a FREE vehicle health report and are immediately available upon the customer's request. We also believe that you are one of the sales representatives for CarFax, and that is why you are so adamant on pushing the company.

text: They were extremely helpful and very professional. I'm very happy with the service I received and highly recommend.

text:
Great staff nice newer model cars affordable car notes but the car i received started off great now it's been two months it's falling apart two blow outs engine light on car already had a mildew smell from it not being cleaned properly took it to AutoZone received a list of two pages of codes received run around from carlot when calling about issues having major issues where I have to pull over and cut the car off it's not reliable but I know it can be fixed but the cars are so called inspected I think not no different than buy here pay here

Update: My car lasted a total of 9 months took it to a mechanic he says my car has been overheating for sometime now but my gauges don't show it I have cracked water pump and head gasket back with no car and lots of debt im 100% certain this car was sold like this

resp.text: Ms. Handley we apologize for this inconvenience. Your vehicle does in fact have a 2 year/24,000 mile warranty which will cover all major components of your vehicle. For further assistance in this matter feel free to contact the office and speak with a member of management so that they may address your concerns.

text: They is very good people and they really work with you loving my new car!!

name: Rhea Baker
text:
If I could give this place a zero I would. My husband and I purchased a vehicle in May. It has now been 2.5 months and I still cannot get a tag. The sales person told us the finance company was responsible for giving us the title app in order to get our tag. They aren't. We have yet to be able to get our tag. I cannot get the sales rep to contact us... They lie and deceive you into believing that they will take care of you.  I cannot afford another fine for not having a tag. Horrible, horrible experience. DO NOT BUY A CAR FROM THIS PLACE!

Edit: I am now being told that I have to pay $100 to have a title app reprinted when I never received one in the first place. This is absolutely ridiculous. Con artists

resp.text: Mrs. Watkins we apologize for any inconvenience this situation has caused you and your family. Here at First Class we strive for all of our customers to have the very best experience they could possibly have. We would love the opportunity for you to come into the office so that we may have the chance to rectify this situation. Also, we urge our customers to be totally honest in their reviews about our dealership, feel free to leave your review posted. Hopefully we’ll have the opportunity to sit down soon. Thank You- Management.

text: I bought a car from them a few years ago. After much research, they were by far the best value for the price. This is where we got the most car for the money. So when he was NOT some sleazy car salesman (unlike the other location I ended up at) it was rather refreshing. So if you are in the market and the shortage ends then you should definitely do business with them.

text: Found a Honda Pilot on Trucar, called in and test drove it. We decided we wanted it then and went on with a surprisingly smooth purchase! It was hassle free, and there was no sales pressure at all.

name: Stephen Hall
text: This place is awesome.  Very few car dealers are like this anymore.  If you are looking for a great deal on a used car or truck, then buy one here.  I just purchased a 2015 Ford F250 at a great price. After I got the truck home a couple of days later I noticed a coolant leak.  I had it checked out and it was about $580 for the coolant leak and some other issues.  I called them back and they were willing to give me $300 towards the repairs.  I knowingly purchased the used truck "as is" and knew he didn't have to give me anything towards the repairs but I am thankful he was willing to help me out!  When I need another used car I will be back!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Stephen! We always stand behind our vehicles and we always try to give the best deals possible! We hope you enjoy the truck and we look forward to doing business with you in the future!

name: Ron Martin
text:
Montevallo Imports is great! Staff is awesome, no sales pressure and quality used cars!
Paschan did an awesome job of telling me about the vehicle and was not pushy. Ms. Sheila dealt with my finance company and had me out the door in less than 30 minutes.
I usually don’t frequent car dealerships because of all the games and sales pressure but you get none of that here! Just simple, honest and pleasant car buying experience!
If you are looking for a great car at a great price, then look no further than Montevallo Imports!!
I purchased a 2016 Honda CR-V for my wife as a surprise Christmas gift and they even kept the car for me a couple of days because she was going out of town and I wanted to surprise her when she got back.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind feedback, Ron! We appreciate you and your business! We hope your wife loved the vehicle and we’re honored that we could be a part of this special surprise!

Thrilled with our experience!
This was the fastest, most pain free car buying experience ever. They let us test drive without pressure, had a rather quick paperwork process, and everyone was extremely laid back.
I feel like we got a fantastic deal and we will be back.

name: fredyb
text: This dealership is amazing I drove from Foley, AL nearly 4hours away. The owner Paul and his staff stayed late for me and my wife to arrive to check out two cars. The dealership closed at 6:30pm and we didn't arrived until 8pm, not once did we feel rushed or pressured throughout the process even after arriving so late. They let us test drive both vehicles by ourselves without anyone telling us where to go, the owner Paul even encouraged us to take it on the highway. Once we decided on a vehicle the paperwork process was even better! I couldn't believe how fast we was in and out hassle-free! The customer service was beyond any dealership I've experienced in my area just great people that made us feel very comfortable. This drive of nearly 4 hours was very worth it and I would do it all over again if I had to! I definitely will be back someday in the future for my next purchase, while my wife sit back and enjoy hers now. Thanks Paul, Montevallo Imports, and staff for making my wife dreams come true! I pray that God continue to bless this business and I speak more and more blessings amongst this business for doing what's right by their customers! We need more dealerships like this one around, I wish I could give it 10 stars!☄

resp.text: Thank you, Fredyb! We appreciate you!

text: I purchased a 2013 Jetta. The car was immaculate and very well priced. The sales person was extremely accommodating and we had all the paperwork finished very quickly. I couldn't be happier with my experience with this dealer and I will definitely consider them for future purchases.

text: This was without a doubt the easiest and most pleasant car buying experience I've ever had.  Everyone was courteous and friendly, and the deal was done quickly.

resp.text: Thank you so much Shilonqua! We really appreciate your business!

name: Andrew Morgan
text:
I was very satisfied with my purchase from Montevallo Imports.  I saw the truck online, and went by one weekend afternoon.  They made a copy of my license and let me take the truck for a test drive on my own which was a breath of fresh air because I didn't feel like I was taking up the sales guys' time. Sheila, the manager was very kind and helpful.   When I got back, I got the carfax report without issue.  There was no high pressure sales pitch that I had become used to after looking at lots of trucks over several weeks. I was honest about minor defects I had found on the vehicle and they acknowledged and did not dispute them.  We haggled a bit as is healthy and expected, but I think all parties were satisfied and I know I got a fair price for the vehicle.

I wanted to use my credit union, so had to wait until Monday to take possession, which wasn't a problem. After a handshake, we agreed to meet again on Monday. On Monday, after I got my credit union info, Sheila checked other banks they commonly use just to make sure I was getting the best deal on my loan.   The truck was cleaned and ready to go, and they had all my paperwork ready to sign.  We exchanged a check for keys and I was out of there in less than 30 minutes.

It has been a little over a month and I am so far very satisfied with my vehicle, and I would definitely consider doing business with Montevallo imports again.

Since I haven't had a problem, I can't give a full 5 stars since I can't know how they would handle any weird thing that might come up. With that said, I got a great vehicle at a great price without any hassle, so I can't complain.

resp.text: Thank you, Andrew! We appreciate you!

name: Eliane Sarkis
text: Great service

text: My husband and I were in search of a cls 550 and located one at Montevallo Motors. When we arrived the sales person was kicked back in the lobby as if she was on break. I assumed she was a customer by her demeanor. We asked to see the car.  The car was overpriced based off of the car fax report. The car as well had several cosmetic issues. When we asked to hear the engine, the car would not start. This leads me to believe that they do not crank their cars on a regular basis and have them sitting there. After 20 minutes of jumping the car off, I asked if the cup holder could be replaced, since the car was priced well over 20k. Her response was it will just peel off again. The appropriate response would have been, the cars are sold as is...not no it will just peel again. I will never visit this car lot ever again and will encourage my family and friends to not patron this location as well.

resp.text: Hi Kova, we’re sorry you had a bad experience with us. We are a family owned business and our goal is to provide you with great service and offer good deals on great cars. Our vehicles are listed and sold as is with no warranty, unless stated otherwise. We try our hardest to please all of our customers and to make things right if something does happen to go wrong after the vehicle has been purchased. If there is anything we can do to make it up to you please give us a call at 205-663-9993 or come by and see us. Thanks.

text: Edit: I want to talk about my real experience with this company. I did everything they asked me to do, they not only never credited me for my review on here, but then decided to charge interest and late fees in the amount they owed after deducting it from my first payment. Five months later, when I asked for payment review they decided that I was paying a few days late and instead of letting me get caught up with what I owe, which I had in their office with me, that I needed to ha e the next months payment as well or they would accept nothing. They gave three days to pay for a month that wasn’t even due yet as well as the month that we were currently in. And then all the late fees that had occurred from money they were suppose to credit me. Every month was a new fine or fee so I was never technically on time which gave them the right to repo my car which I’m sure is there plan from the start every time they sell a car. Great experience in purchasing a vehicle. You know what... they can keep the car, I can find something else that’s fair and honest.

name: Alison Gentry
text: Wish I could give no stars for the rude sales manager and all five stars to Jonathan the salesman. He should be a manager! Very friendly, understanding, and respectful. We made an offer on a truck that was only $900 less than asking price. We also wanted to know trade in value for current car. Jonathan came back and the manager said he wanted full price of sticker and lowballed $2000 less than what the trade in was worth! Did not even give a counteroffer. We thanked Jonathan and said we would keep an eye out for anything else that came up we might like. Super nice guy. As we were about to get up to leave the manager came over and started yelling at us and bashing us for the offer we made! I was shocked! He kept telling us we had no idea how much the truck was worth. The offer we made was reasonable for the truck. We told him he could not give us the numbers we wanted so we were leaving. Yet he kept yelling at us and trying to tell us we were wrong! Terrible customer service. A manager should not yell at two customers telling us we are wrong because of an offer.

resp.text: Mrs Gentry, We apologize your experience was not to your satisfaction.  We strive to provide excellent customer service to anyone that we have the opportunity to serve.  We always like to learn from our mistakes and improve our service in the future.  Please contact me so we can discuss your visit and we can correct the issue.  skcomatt@gmail.com or 251-343-4488

resp.text: I am sorry that you feel that way. Financing is provided by financial institutions and sometimes down payment is their requirement to obtain a loan. name: Melanie Shelly
text:
I found the car I love 2018 Nissan Maxima. I live about an hour and a half away so I really love it!  I did all my negotiating via email and set up a test drive appointment. Very, very, easy sale for the company. My biggest disappointment is the fact that the car was filthy when I arrived and the battery terminals were severely corroded. I am convinced nobody from the service department even looked under the hood until I made them.  I wanted the terminals cleaned,  I wanted an oil change,  all fluids topped off and a cabin air filter change (Very minimal requests for a car dealership) I stated it would have to be detailed inside. The detail department worked on it but they would only be there until 12 or 12:30. So we concluded our business (paid cash) and I went to lunch without the car.  Well by the time I got back the headliner was much cleaner but it smelled terribly in the car (like stagnant mop water). Nothing else was even wiped down and unfortunately the detail department was gone. There was sticky crusted disgusting something in all the buttons so some would stick in certain positions. Literally the battery terminal was only brushed with a wire brush to knock off the corrosion. I don't think the oil was changed. When I got home the oil did not appear new. I think they put new on top of the old then they mixed together. The cabin air filter was not changed. I removed it to check because everytime I used recirculated air instead of fresh it smelled bad. It has a new one now and it no longer has an odor.

My salesman was okay, but seriously the easiest commission ever. Wish I would have at least gotten an after the sale phone call. Just to check in. Would have made me feel better about the other issues.

My complaints are only directed to the service and detail departments.

I am now looking for a truck in the $20,000 range (same as my Maxima) and I am not even looking at this company now.

My Fiance and I are the proud owners of a 2018 Toyota Camry that's in mint condition with extremely low miles thanks to SKCO and especially our salesman Bobby! We were both treated amazing and taken care of like we were the only customers the dealership had. We found our dream car, test drove it, ran some numbers, came to an agreement and were out in record time. I recommend SKCO to anyone searching for a new car or truck and expecially recommend asking for Bobby as soon as you walk through the doors!!

name: Sid smith
text: I purchased my 2012 toyota4runner from them. It was very clean and had a great experience at the dealer. They were very friendly and gave me a great deal. The best thing is they had just about every make and models there that I was looking for. I recommend this dealer. Came back and bought a 17 Sierra. Still great experience.

name: Cameron Martin
text:
I was at SKCO Automotive today. I had been there for almost 5 hours. My salesman was actually a nice  man, so i have absolutely nothing bad to say about him.  After going through this ridiculous process of trying to prove my income for 2-3 hours and trying to be put in a car  the finance company wanted me to have. I was exhausted, over it and ready to leave. As if that wasn’t enough, someone decided to make a big deal out of nothing. My children went ahead of me and went to the door. They were holding the door for each other and then was holding it for me, waiting for me to catch up and come out. Before I got to the door they were approached by a lady. She told my children to either go out the door or go find their moma or daddy and they they were letting the air out. I was appalled!! I asked her what was the problem. I asked her name and she mumbled something and I asked her again and she told me she didn’t owe me an explanation!!  Come to find out she was the owner. The salesman walked up to me try to find out what was going on. She began to butt in, so then the gentleman walked me out the door to discuss it. it started to rain, he offered to grab an umbrella for me. We make our way into the building and the owner runs up to the salesman and tells him he is her employee and He better not walk me out the door. How pathetic and nasty can a human be over nothing!!
I’m sick of people  acting ignorant for no reason towards me. So needless to say I left all deals on the table and vowed to make it known that I would never spend a dime with a company that doesn’t value my business or dollar. So it’s above me now!!

And so far from what I hear the cars are junk! A friend of mine bought a van and the alternator went out 2 days after she purchased it.

Oh and if you plan on buying a car using your business name don’t waste your time. Apparently they don’t know how to process those sales!

name: Beverly Hodges
text: I bought a 2012 Chevy Avalanche here and I'm so impressed with how professional and friendly these guys are especially in this heat...The patience they had while I test drove the trucks is unbelievable. Thanks to Mr Vic for all your help. I just love my truck.

name: Fontello Worthy
text: I was looking for a newer car so i went to Skco automotive in Mobile, Al. When I went there I went to my niece salesman and told him what I was looking for and what I wanted and I had a trade in. Everything that I wanted it was always a problem with what the financial department would finance he kept saying. I wanted a 2011 or 2012 Toyota Avalon or a 2 door 2013 Honda accord. The salesman kept trying to put me in 2015 or 2016 vehicle and that wasn't what I wanted. The salesman was real pushy and not at all patient. I left from there with a 2016 Camry, the same one he threw in my face as the 1st car I drove even though I told him I hated those Camry. In the end he wound up giving me a car i absolutely hate. He made sure he got a good commission off of me, in spite of what I told him I like and wanted. I will take my other family members to another car lot instead of this one. So now I'm going to go to my father, God mother, God sisters, sisters, and lil brother and God daddy, who are all ministers, and plead with God to reverse this curse that was done to me and make a way out of no way to get the car I want. This is so sad and disgusting to be taken advantage of like this. Should have went next door to the dealership the carsaleman  told me not to go to and get a car i wanted .

name: Lafesacalia Sims
text: I am so happy with my black sonata I brought from this dealership. After having a bad experience at SUNCOAST AUTO (DON'T GO THERE!!!); I had to get a new car, I came here and got the car I wanted. I've had my sonata for 3 years now and I love it. My next car purchase will be from this dealership and nowhere in mobile. Jeremy, I think that's his name, was great he took care of all my needs. Everyone was so nice and they took their time and didn't force me into a car I didn't like just because I can make the payments. I like this place a lot.

name: Lezah Presley
text: For anyone shopping around for a new or used vehicle I definitely recommend SKCO Automotive. They have a brand new facility, the greatest and most respectful salesmen I've ever met. The managers there try their hardest to make sure they get you the best rates and best deal to fit your wants and needs. They have highly trained mechanics to help with any mechanical problems you might need, and the service department will make sure everything is done quickly and properly. Don't even get me started on their detail department, wow, that's the only word that comes to mind when I think of how clean and detailed my car was when I purchased it. When you come to SKCO Automotive your greeted by a wonderful team of experts whose sole purpose is to have you leave in the vehicle you wanted and happy that you chose their establishment. My family has been buying vehicles from SKCO for many years and we'll always come back. It's great to be able to come back and see the same people that continue to help you each time. Thank you everyone at SKCO.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback.

name: Michael Hudson
text: The only reason I gave it 1 star is the sales agent Bobby. He found me a truck i liked and tried his best to help me get it. But the guy over him I think is Tim or Tom. The first day I went he told me the truck had to go through Service inspection but it shouldn't affect the price because the price HE put on the truck gave him more than enough room for repairs. When I went back the next day the truck was going to cost a lot more than it should have. He set up the price to be 15,000 out the door at 8% interest. Now here's the kicker. My wife's car was 16,000 at 8% interest and skco wanted to charge me $30 more a month than what my wife pays. The math doesn't add up. Most the vehicles are preowned, damaged and way overpriced. Save your money and go elsewhere.

name: Amanda Unrue
text:
Buying a car wasn't bad.  But they have this policy of holding the spare keys until you pick up your paperwork.  I informed them that I was going to be moving and might not be in town to pick up the spare key.  The guy who was doing my paperwork said that he would mail it to my new address(even though that is apparently against policy).  The paperwork arrived in the mail, but the spare key never did.  I called them back to check the status of that and they are now saying that they have no record of a spare key but that I can bring the car into the dealership, pay them about $400, and they'll make a new key.  So now some random person has the spare key to my car, which I find a little sketch.
**As a side note, it is my opinion that the office manager is incredibly incompetent and rude.

name: James Wilson
text: I came into SKCO Automotive to buy a Nissan Sentra that I seen online. the salesperson, a Mr. Billy Keene, informed me of an issue with this particular car. He showed me evidence that it was in need of service, however minor, before it could be sold. He actually took the car to the service department and fussed at the service manager telling him that, "I have a man here to buy this car and you all could have had this ready a week ago." Billy persisted until the service department took care of the issue. He and I sat while they took care of the issue and I found him to be very astute about all sorts of subjects regarding cars and how financing works. He took time with me he did not have to take. He also made it possible that the car that i wanted was serviced before I left in it a few hours later. I cant say enough about this salesman, and also about the sales manager, a Mr. Joe. The Dealership as a whole was easy to deal with and Billy and Joe were actually able to get me out the door $500 less than the advertised price. If you need a good quality vehicle, i highly recomend SKCO, and really recomend dealing with Billy.
