name: Jenny Linda
text: Bought a 2009 GMC Yukon used from this dealership. Great service, very friendly and helpful. Scott Howie was very accomodating in trying to make sure I got the truck I was looking for and was very helpful. Mr. Richard Nassar knew I was on my lunch break and worked very quickly to get me in and out and finished with all my paperwork all with a smile on his face. Went to many other dealerships in the search for this used truck and could not be more pleased with my experience here at Joe Bullard Cadillac. Will start here first next time and leave the rest for last resort!!!

name: Jeannette Bennett
text: Worst used vehicle I've ever purchased. This car has cost more in 18 months than my Honda in ten years. Inspection protocol was incomplete before the car was presented for sale. When I tried to find out what had been done I received this asinine answer: if it needed something we did it. Will never purchase a car here again.

resp.text: Jeannette, I am sorry to hear about the recent frustration with your vehicle. Our team is dedicated to providing our customers with a top-notch experience and I’m disappointed to see this wasn’t the case for you. Our GM, Marc Heiter will be reaching out to you shortly regarding this matter. Sincerely, Joe Bullard Cadillac Team

name: Johnny Swopes
text: Absolutely, the most wonderful buying experience my wife Kathy and I have ever had.  The atmosphere was amazing!!  Ty was very gracious and made us feel so welcome as did the entire Bullard family!! Andrew Speight was phenomenal with his delightful British accent describing all of the wonderful details of this truly great Cadillac DTS. His knowledge of the vehicle was paramount!! He knew 'everything' and treated us royally with the test driving and description of the many facets of the vehicle. Andrew kept everything in perspective of the price we could afford. Then he turned us over to Jon McCarthy who was equally as brilliant. Jon made it happen!!! What service!! Jon was so relatable with such tenacity in helping us, and he really came through with making our dream come true!! We highly recommend the family of Joe Bullard Cadillac, and especially Andrew Speight and Jon McCarthy.  They will indeed spoil you! We really thank the Lord for sending us to this Company, thy are a true blessing to the gulf coast!!

name: C C Hall
text: I purchased a Cadillac SRX on 1/11/14 from Joe Bullard Cadillac. Curtis, Roosevelt and Ty were very courteous to me and my husband. They answered all of my questions and worked with us to get to the price we were willing to pay. The Cadillac warranty is hard to beat, especially the 4 years of maintenance and the road side assistance. This is the 6th GM vehicle that we presently own and I know will be the best serviced one by far. I had been looking for a vehicle for 5 months when I decided to look at the SRX. I am glad I did. It has everything on it that I was looking for plus a lot or more features. Everyone at the dealership that walked by you spoke and asked you how you were doing. This is a dream vehicle for me and I look forward to driving it for years. I will recommend to family and friends that are interested in a great luxury car or SUV to get a Cadillac at Joe Bullard Cadillac in Mobile, Alabama and ask for Curtis. I had to use the service department today to get my oil changed and check the routine things out. Christian and the others were very courteous and took care of me and my SRX. The customer lounge area was very pleasant and comfortable during my wait.

name: Greg Loughlin
text: Good workmanship, poor communication.  No warranty info with tires on road hazzard option.

resp.text:
Hi Mr. Loughlin,

Thank you for giving us this valuable feedback. I have sent your comments to our Parts and Service Manager as well as the General Manager for them to consider how we can better improve our communication and process. Please feel free to contact us any time you need assistance and we hope to continue working with you in the future.

Kindest regards,
Kristina M.
Marketing Manager

name: Ashley Brown
text:
Superior Service A++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

My experience at Joe Bullard Cadillac - Mobile Alabama was excellent to say the least. The moment my fiance and I pulled up to the dealership we felt welcome. Mustafa Elastal immediately greeted us and made us feel important. He went out of his way to make us feel comfortable as he walked around the lot with us picking out suitable vehicles. This was very important to me considering I had never owned a Cadillac before. His extensive knowledge of the vehicle I wanted (XTS) and the history of Cadillac itself impressed me by far. The hospitality didn't stop with Mustafa. Roosevelt Harris also did a fine job answering all the questions I had about the different cars and prices. He also mentioned a couple of nice restaurants we could try out while visiting Atlanta, GA which we did and absolutely loved. Curtis Williams came by and personally greeted us and also had a nice conversation with my fiance. Last, but definitely not least, Jon McCartney was absolutely amazing (and not just because he actually knows where Winnfield, LA is located lol). He worked very hard to get the financing I needed to get the exact vehicle I wanted. It was a hard sale for me, but he showed us that he wouldn't give up. I really appreciated all the time that each of them took out to make our experience the best car buying experience we have had. I would recommend this dealership without thinking twice (I already have mentioned them to others), and I will be bringing others to come do business with Joe Bullard Cadillac in Mobile, AL.

name: Ramona Reed
text: Honestly we did not wake up that morning thinking of buying a car. We saw one on the interstate and decided to go look at them. When we got there it was freezing and windy and Darren Robinson was in the parking lot moving cars. He offered his help and we told him we were in town to Christmas shop not spend all day at a dealership, we just wanted to try the car on for size. he escorted us inside for coffee and cocoa and went to get the car. we test drove it. we loved it but we were not there to spend all day at the dealership. we left our personal information to be reviewed and were going to shop when Darren notified us that we would be using the cadillac for the day via loaner form approval. we really enjoyed using the car. we Christmas shopped all day and when we returned to the dealership we had been approved for the car with our payments within dollars of request. Jon McCartney had to have been the most professional financial manager i have ever encountered. He was a real person who made us feel right at home and comfortable to speak openly. very friendly and personable. then Roosevelt Harris enters the picture. a gem. a diamond in the rough. so charismatic so joyful and helpful and accomodating. I cannot put into words how much Darren helped to familiarize us with the cue and features. he was so knowledgable of the cars systems. he was an absolute treasure. I cant say but one thing about Joe Bullards team, "you are doing something right". I got hugs from everyone when i left. i felt like i was part of a family there. I even got a text message from Darren on Christmas morning wishing us a merry Christmas. i literally spent 2 hrs tops at the dealership and received the most beautiful CHristmas gift I could have ever dreamed of. but the most inportant thing was the environment and kindness that we experienced while there. oh and my son loved the lounge with computers and coffee/cocoa which made his time there enjoyable also. we will definitely reccomend Joe Bullard Cadillac to friends and family and we will definitely be repeat customers ourselves. my only hope is that we have the privilege of having the same staff in years to come. Thank you so very much.

name: Fred King
text:
From the moment I walked in the front door, Andrew, Ben, and Ty did their best to find the perfect car for us. They were more than successful, my wife and I both have never been more satisfied with a major purchase and the reason for this was the genuine effort each member of the team at Joe Bullard put forth to ensure that we left not only as satisified customers, but as new friends.

Andrew stayed with us and walked us through the process and was a very genuine and honest regarding the steps and what was happenning and what was going to happen.

Ben was very diligent and went above and beyond to get the exact car we were looking for... the car is perfect, just what we wanted.

Ty was also great, taking time to sit and talk to us about what was happenning and to ensure us that everything was on track and going well. It was and it did. I do not remember seeing as big a smile as when I told my wife that ya'll had her car ready... Thanks

Richard made the paperwork fly by with ease... the power of a sharpie to show me where to sign... Thanks for making the experience great.

I can not say enough about my outstanding visit and purchase, when you want to go back to the dealership that sold you a car to visit with  the people who were involved in getting you a vehicle because they are now friends, I guess that is how it is always suppossed to work, I am glad that I found the place to go and to send my friends and family to when we need not only a new vehicle, but to meet some outstanding people as well.

Thanks again!

Fred & Diane

name: Andrea La Rossa
text: Wow!  Another great experience with Joe Bullard Automotive!  My Salesman, Damos Brand, was wonderful. He was courteous, professional, and very knowledgeable about the Cadillac product line and that helped make my car buying experience a dream!  Damos delivered my new Cadillac XTS to me and then spent as much time as I needed going over all of the XTS functions and assisted in setting up my XTS to suit me perfectly!!  I love my new Cadillac XTS and once again, I will recommend Joe Bullard Cadillac, Damos Brand, and the New Car Sales Manager, Roosevelt Harris, Jr., to everyone I can.  Both of these men are true assets to Joe Bullard Automotive.

name: Jim Smith
text:
I was impressed from the start with Rich Borden who was the first person I met and provided me an excellent selection of new and used models to make my choice. I had driven a 2002 Cadillac Deville for 10 years, so I was already happy with the Cadillac family and had owned/driven GM (Pontiacs before the Deville)cars since 1966. Because I perferred new over used, and because I had never leased a vehicle, Rich introduced me to Ben Jackson who provided me the pros and cons of the lease vs purchase option. I made my decision on a 3 year lease. I made my choice of the 2013 XTS.
The administrative process was made flawless by the excellent knowledge and professionalism of Ben Jackson and Richard Nassar.
The entire sales staff from Ty Bullard(same as when I bought a new Olsmobile Holiday 88 from his Dad and Granddad Joe Bullard in 1978), Roosevelt Harris(who presented me my Cadillac IPad),and in particular Rich Borden was outstanding.

text: Very impressed with the service and friendliness of the staff. Dealership waiting area was clean and comfortable with bottled water and coffee available.  Had a waiting area in showroom area (nice and bright) and a second area with a television in a viewer friendly area. TV had a remote available for choosing channels. Nice work space with charging stations available for those wishing to take care of business.  I had scheduled an oil change and tire rotation and feel it was done within a reasonable time frame.  Enjoyed chatting with other individuals my age and will be going back to this dealership.

resp.text: We are so glad everything was completed in a timely manner. It is great to hear about your positive experience during your service visit. We look forward to assisting you again in the future. Thank you for the review and have a great day.

name: Heather Manhart
text: Our family of five lost our A/C traveling from Illinois to Gulf Shores in June. It was HOT. We knew we needed to get it fixed before we headed home so we called Sandy Sansing and they got our car in the next day! They had us fixed up and ready for the “cool” ride home by our departure date. Only thing that could have made it easier was if they had rental cars on site but two rental companies are just down the road so no problem. Thanks for your friendly service! A/C is still going strong!

resp.text: We are so glad we were able to get you back on the road! It is great to hear about your positive experience with us. If there is any way we can be of further assistance please let us know. Thank you for the review and have a great day.

text: We went around the 4th of July weekend to trade in our car for a Nissan Rogue. Our sales representative, Matt Cali, was amazing. Definitely made our experience wonderful.

text: After buying a Nissan someplace else, I started going to this dealership for my service and it has been awesome. They are friendly and though. They help me weigh my options and try their best to work with my busy schedule. They even vacuumed out my car for me. Jessee Sawyer has been the rep I usually deal with and he makes it so easy but I have really been impressed with all the staff. I am so glad I pulled in there the first time.

resp.text: We are glad we have been able to really help you out. It is great to hear about your positive experience with our staff. We hope we can continue assisting you in the future. Thank you for the review and have a great day

name: Jim Sutton
text:
Rebuild brake system master cylinder, re-surface front rotors, new front brake pads, flush/replace brake fluid. Fixed "mushy" brake pedal feel, seems to be a competent brake job.
Negatively, it took EIGHT BUSINESS DAYS to accumulate the parts needed for this routine kind of maintenance/repair.  In the meantime after we inquired about progress every day or so (we were never proactively informed), each time we were told the parts would be in the next day's delivery.
I'm not saying all of this is the establishment's fault, just relating the overall frustration of the experience.
One star for the experience, four stars for what seems to be an effective repair.

name: Randy Moris
text: Everything worked out exactly as I expected it to. I had an early morning appointment and your service department put my vehicle in right away and finished all the work quickly. Everything was explained clearly of the work done. The technicians were courteous and answered every question I had. I will return to Nissan in Foley the next time I need service work and routine maintenance

resp.text: We are glad everything was completed quickly and to your satisfaction! We look forward to assisting you again in the future. Thank you for the review and have a great day.

name: Pat Hackl

name: Erik Hess
text: Very professional staff. My family and I were on vacation from Knoxville, TN and our 2012 Murano started running really high RPMs. Turns out the car needed a new transmission. The Sandy Sanding staff weren't able to get the parts they needed for the repair from their regular parts suppliers. However, they were able to locate another dealership that had the parts...in Atlanta. Jessie from their service department took an overnight drive to Atlanta to retrieve the parts while the service techs removed the old transmission. Needless to say they went above and beyond to get the work done quickly. The car was dropped off on a Monday morning and was back in my hands with a new transmission by the following Thursday afternoon. That's 4 days from diagnosis to work completion. I couldn't be happier with this turn around. Especially considering the trip to Atlanta for the parts. I highly recommend this team for any repair needs you might have.

resp.text: Thank you for the high star rating! We are glad we could help you out.

name: Omega Phillips
text:
The tech that worked on the truck was good, I suppose never seen him.
But Leon the service person that checked me in was rude.
I asked him how long it would take,after he informed me my 8:40 appointment was not at all accurate, and only one person works on diesels.Leon said if you make your appointment online that's just a time they give you- to work you in. I said well if I knew that then I would not have made the appointment for that time.
All I was really there for was alignment(that takes about a hour)he asked why I said because we purchased new tires. Leon said well why didn't they do it then. I said we bought them in Cameron after the hurricane hit, we were lucky to get tires.
(It should not matter why I wanted a alignment just put it in the computer)
Then I said how long will it take, will he give me a update when he speaks to the tech-since he already told me the 8:40 really didn't mean anything.
He said if you would let me talk,
Leon never came back and told me anything, so I went back up there after about 30 minutes of waiting. The other two guys were very polite and helpful, like I told the one- I just wanted to know, so I could walk over and get some breakfast.
After my vehicle was finished,Leon was stand offish, but I guess that's better than rude.

resp.text: We regret to hear you did not have a positive experience with us. Please reach out to our General Manager to resolve your concerns.

name: Elizabeth Peel
text:
EDIT : We received a call back and a family sickness situation was explained to us.  We may still be doing business with them.  Putting 5 stars down now so I don't effect their rating since I cannot delete my review.  Will update if we purchase from them.

Original:
I called and spoke with April two weeks ago about a truck I found on their website.  I spoke with her on a Friday afternoon and she asked me to text her information on my trade so she could work up a tentative offer and that she would get back to me that evening or at the latest the next morning.  I sent the info over shortly after our phone conversation and she confirmed via text message she had received the info and would get back with me shortly.  I have not heard from her since.  I sent a text message the following afternoon asking for an update and the next Monday asking if she had any information for me and she never replied.  My husband called and left a voicemail 3 days ago and still has not had a reply.  It is safe to say they lost a sale.  It is common business practice to communicate with your customers. If you are not interest in a trade then be professional enough to say that.  I would have still purchased the truck.  The lack of communication lost my business.

text: Family member purchased a vehicle with gap insurance. Barton Auto sales is ignoring calls and requests to release info for the gap insurance to the purchaser or the bank. If I could give zero stars I would.

text: As much as I would like to leave more stars for the quick and efficient buying of a truck from Kip, I have to say that TNT sold us a lemon. They sold us an expensive extended warranty that we knew nothing about and when the air conditioner went out in the truck, we were told the warranty covers powertrain ONLY. Save time and money and shop elsewhere, There are plenty more reputable dealers around that won't sell you a piece of junk.

name: Angela Chelette
text:
Julio Jones Mazda kept impressing me each time I had contact with an employee. Felicia in Service was so professional and patient taking time to answer my questions and explain
what was being done or what findings were made about my car. She arranged a loaner car that was totally unexpected and highly appreciated as I was essentially stranded in town. I apologize that I do not recall the gentleman in Sales who I spoke to briefly, very sympathetic to my situation; to the Service manager Matt, who advised he would allow my vehicle to remain on lot until picked up; to John who shuttled me to a car rental to leave town. name: Tabitha Payne
text:
I met Matthew Moss while looking at the Mazda 6’s. He introduced himself and asked some questions about my needs in a car. He pointed out the safety features, the roominess of the car, the amazing gas mileage and other features found in the Mazda 6.
Matthew introduced me to Rick Cantrell. They were both extremely knowledgeable and in no way were “pushy” or made me feel the importance of buying a car that day. I felt a sense of trust in talking with both of them.
I went home did my research and emailed Rick to send me a final cost breakdown. I was extremely happy with it and told him that I’d be there after work to pick it up.
When I arrived, it had been cleaned and the gas tank was full! I drove off in the first new car that I’d purchased in over 20 years. I absolutely love my new car and would recommend Matthew and Rick to anyone who asks me about my car.

name: Christopher (Chris) Gill
text:
If I had just dealt with the service department it would be a five star rating. The young lady that helped me with my service was friendly, professional, and was on top of the process the whole way!

They lose a star because the parts department left a lot to be desired. It was next to impossible to get them on the phone and after a while the system sends you to a voicemail that no one apparently ever checks. I left 8 or 9 messages and never got a call back. My part had been there for three days before I found out from someone in service (when I called) that it had arrived. They either need more people in parts to handle the load or better training.

resp.text: Hi Christopher, thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed your experience with us - but do want to apologize for the negative experience you had with our Parts department. This is not acceptable and it will be looked into and addressed immediately. We appreciate your business and hope to work with you again soon. Take care.

name: Lorin Floyd
text: My mother purchased my dream car which is the Mazda CX-3 from Julio Jones Mazda in Tuscaloosa, Alabama. After she surprised me with the car, she told me that this was the easiest car buying experience that she has ever experienced. She began to tell me that their customer service was extraordinary and that she would highly recommend the dealership and using Jared Davis as the salesman. After my surprise I returned to the dealership for Jared to show me all of the car’s features. As soon I pulled up, he ran outside and was very excited to meet me. He was very nice, funny, and thoroughly went over how everything worked. He even folded all of the pages in the owner’s manual that I would need. As we were talking I found out that we are going to the same University and have the same major, and he even offered to give me advice for the school as well. With that, I would highly recommend Julio Jones Mazda and Jared Davis to any future car buyers.

text: I arrived early for my appointment and they took my car right in. The waiting room was clean and pleasant. The service manager was helpful and attentive. He asked me what services I wanted for my car in addition to the airbag recall repair. A friendly, young salesman sat to chat with me for a few minutes as I waited. Jared asked about my Mazda and my experience with the dealership. He was genuinely interested and enthusiastic about working for Julio Jones Mazda. I learned that Tuesday’s are “Ladies Day” which meant 15% off oil changes AND free massages by a therapist from Nancy Taylor Day Spa!!! I have NEVER had such a pleasant car service experience. My car had the airbag repair, an oil change, tire rotation, 17 point inspection, and the headlight “glaucoma” polished in just over an hour. When this dealership was owned by Verta Barr, it had the reputation as the best service department in town. I think that under Julio Jones’ ownership, it will regain that reputation.

name: Dylan Davies
text:
What can I say? My husband and I went to look at the Mazda CX-5. We found one online, previously, and wanted to drive one before we drove all that way to Birmingham to see it. They made us a proposal, "If we  can cut you a deal on a new one, can we have your business?" Well, of course if the price is right then, yes. We drive a grey CX-5, everything is great, but they are calling this car "new" and it has 7500 miles on it. Well, it's never been owned they say its a "demo" car. Then my husband tells them he wants to be at $19,999 financed for this car (yes, we were putting several thousand down - we didn't expect a miracle deal). They only get it down to $20,010. Then he says, well if you throw in remote start, we will take it. They came back with each of us paying half so, we decided to buy the car.

They told us that they could get us a killer interest rate of less than one percent. When we got back to financing, it was another story entirely. We ended up wit ha 4.99 interest rate because "less than one percent is only for "new" cars" well when you were trying to negotiate this deal you said it was a new car and now that we are financing you've classified it as a "used" car.

After we left, we began driving to my dad's house which is probably 100 miles away. The check engine light came on before we got there. We had O'Reily's check the computer and they said it was low oil pressure. We called and they has us call the Mazda tow truck to come pick it up and take it to the nearest Mazda which was in Birmingham. (They told me to get a rental during this time and they would pay me back.) They called for me to come pick it up three or four days later saying it was a computer problem and it was fixed. When we got there, 4 error messages were popping up on the dash. We left the car and called the sales manager at Julio Jones Mazda who never called us back and said he never got our message.

I went in to talk to the Julio Jones Mazda sales manager about this problem on Monday. They had me sit there for a while and eventually said they spoke with the technician at the Birmingham Mazda and they said I must have taken my foot off the brake too early and it caused the car to throw up those error messages. So, they blamed me for the problem.

Later, the technician from Birmingham called us personally and said they had screwed up and not fixed it properly to begin with. So, the sales manager at Julio Jones Mazda was either misinformed or blatantly lied to make me think it was my fault.

Well, we finally got the car back and it has been running fine. No more issues. However, they still haven't paid me back for the rental and it's been almost a month. I called about this and they said they lost my receipt and asked me for the amount again. I still haven't been paid and they haven't bothered to call me back. That was a week ago.

Simultaneously, I took the car in to the Julio Jones service center to get the remote start put in on a Thursday. They told me it would take a day, maybe two, to get this done. The service center is telling me that I owe our half of the remote start that was supposed to be included in the deal. Obviously, they didn't include it in the price like they said they would. Also, they had to give me a rental car because they couldn't get the remote start to work. It's now Monday and I have no clue when I am going to get my car back. I called today and they said they still couldn't get the remote start to work.

Needless to say, I don't wish this headache on anyone and I wouldn't recommend this dealership to anyone. It has been an absolute nightmare since we signed for this vehicle.

resp.text: Hi Dylan, thank you for your feedback. We sincerely apologize for your experience, as we strive to provide all of our guests with 5 star service. We understand that our management team has worked with you on this matter and has provided you with a reimbursement check for your rental charges. If there is anything further that we may do to assist you, or if there is any further feedback that you would like to provide, please feel free to email us at WeCare@BuyFromJulio.com. Thank you

resp.text: Mr. Coley, Muddy Waters is a dealer of Native Trailers LLC, we have sent your info over to the manufacture they are the ones that would supply the warranty on the trailer. We are sorry for the inconvenience . If you do not hear from them please give us a call.

text: My husband and I bought not just one but two little four wheelers for our kids,   I had been shopping g around d we got a fair price for them.  The reason for my one star, NO CUSTOMER SERVICE!  My kids wore down the brakes, I don't think they were hard on them, or our brake light is working.  We called while they were under warranty.  It took two weeks to get back about parts.  At that point the parts were out of warranty.  So we paid for them and shipping.  We got the wrong parts.  I even took picture the second time.  We got parts that look similar but size was wrong, would not work.  So Mailed them back along w one of the brake pads off the 4 wheeler and tracked them..  I found out that the package was delivered Thursday 4/28 .  I called and was told spouse was sick bit she sent picture to manufacture.  No call that we got them, they are working on it,, nothing.  This has been the way we have been treated.  You have to chase them down to get answers.  I asked to be called by the end of the week, with answers and a solution!  I haven't been able to ride our 4 wheelers since early March!  It's May 2nd!  It's not like we got these for free and didn't pay for replacement parts or shipping!

Just be careful and smart about it. Do your research. Being naive gets you nowhere, but taken advantage of.

name: William Deacon
text: I was on a road trip 650 miles from my local dealership, when the vehicle developed a problem. Turns out the wheel speed sensors where the issue. I call my dealer who advised me to find a dealership that could make the repair... easier said than done. I was told 10-14 days before the service could be performed... until I spoke to Shannon Stull at Century Auto. I briefly defined the situation in hope that the parts and time might be available. In record time Shannon with the cooperation Chris Pope, where able to order overnight the proper parts and squeeze the car in for service. The parts did arrive and the service was performed without issue. I’m sure it was a team effort to make this happen, and thanks to the professionals who actually installed the parts! Clearly this Dealership, Century Auto has the service and professional staff to get the the job done. My night mare hunting trip was saved by the team, to include transportation to and from the rental car. Everyone I met at the dealership was outstanding, but I can’t say enough about Shannon and Chris.. true professionals. THANK YOU, for all the efforts and the time you saved me!

resp.text: William, thank you for sharing your experience and I am glad the team was able to help.

name: Necedah Townsend
text: My Porsche was at the Huntsville shop for over an week after I told and showed the parts guy and manger Shannon what was wrong with my Porsche.  We pulled up the part and I left under the impression that the part was being ordered because it was going to take at least two days to arrive. Therefore when the part was scheduled to arrive was the timing I was told my car would be looked at by the technician. Lies lies lies .... I had to keep calling Shannon the manager to find out if there was any information on the arrival of the part ... how much will it cost and never an direct answer. Every time  it was let me call you back and I am about to go follow up. And never return the call/s. After my car was there for a week I called again to only find out the part was not ordered and they were ordering it that day. Which meant at least another two days waiting for the one part that we knew I needed to arrive. The sad thing is this is the only place locally that are certified to work on my car or get parts from. I had to get a rental twice for a week because I never knew when my car would be ready. Extremely Poor Customer Service. Lastly they called me at 4:00 to tell me my car was ready when they close at 5:00 with only an estimate for cost. Never stating that they did not except certain payments. Noted on my receipt I had a premium car wash lol.  My car was so dirty on the outside. I had just gotten the inside detailed myself. Such a joke.

resp.text: We are so sorry about the miscommunication regarding our service scheduling. While we can accommodate walk in clients, our customers who book appointments are priority to have their vehicles serviced. We take pride in our service departments commitment to thorough inspections and quality work, and sometimes both of those take some time. Our team worked as quickly and as diligently as they could to try meet your expectations. We apologize your vehicle was not diagnosed and repaired as quickly as you wanted.

name: Chris Haury
text: Professional, as expected from Porsche. Even though they were backed up and hampered by an employee out sick and weren't able to provide the loaner vehicle requested, they honored my appointment and provided an excellent door to door shuttle service that was really efficient and quick. When they phoned to tell me my service was complete, the driver was already 10 min from my house. The service on my vehicle was excellent as expected, and the Porsche tech sent a video going over my vehicle and the work done. Very happy.

resp.text: Thank you for your five star review! We are happy to see you received exceptional care from our team.

name: matthewsleila
text: I have had issues with my Macan, too many in my opinion,  however this team of mechanics and the service team are the reason why I stick with it and remain patient and positive. They truly care and always have done their very best to ensure,  although there have been issues, that they provide the best service possible and always go out of their way to please the customer. Amazing team, technical knowledge and certainly understand and practice high quality customer service. Shout out to Jacob,  Randy and Chris. I appreciate you guys.

resp.text: Thank you Leila, the guys will continue to strive to provide the service that you appreciate and deserve.

name: Bill Brown
text: Great experience for a long time coming first buyer. Total professionalism from all Century employees. No pressure and all were extremely helpful in explaining the new world of Porsche, to include those not directly involved in the sale.  Highly recommend Century and the Porsche Brand.

resp.text: Welcome to the Porsche family and Porsche of Huntsville, a Century Automotive dealership. Congratulations on your purchase and thanks again for your business.

name: raymond fernandez
text:
About over a year or so ago Porshe of Huntsville did inspection service on my Cayenne without informing me of the cost. When I called this out to the service manager he said he would make it right and explained the dealership would provide the next service at no cost to me. He said he would document it in their computer records. I counted on that all this time, so when my vehicle was brought in for service I fully expected them to honor that promise. We'll there service manager said they could not find any record. Please note that I confirmed this way back with the previous service manager that it was noted on their record.
I am completely dissatisfied with the lack of commitment to what was promised by the dealership.
I therefore  refused any additional service and just agreed to pay for an oil change (which costs $430), The car was kept for 4 hours.
I will never buy a Porshe again.

resp.text: We wanted to follow up and and thank you for speaking to our service manager Shannon about your experience and hope the resolution  you came to together was satisfactory.

name: Dave Vaupel
text: I flew to Huntsville from Jacksonville to buy a Cayenne e-hybrid and drive it back home. From my pickup from the airport to drive-off it was a great experience.  Bradley D. and Jon C. Took great care of me. I will definitely be talking to them when it’s time for the 2 seater. Thank you Porsche of Huntsville!

resp.text: Thank you for your five star review! We are happy to see your trip was well worth it and that you love your new Cayenne!

name: Ronnie Honbuckle
text:
Exceptional Service staff from the service managers desk, shop mechanics, parts department, shuttle service personnel, the folks who cleaned and washed my Porsche and bookkeeping departments. Thanks for the courteous, timely and a job well done. Cheers
R. Hornbuckle 4/16/'21

resp.text: Thank you for your five star review! We are happy to see you received exceptional care from our team.

name: Mike Kurbanick
text: What a great experience!  Everyone was friendly and knowledgeable.  Our car was exactly what we were told it would be and then some.

resp.text: Thank you for putting your trust in us and flying up to Huntsville. I hope you had a safe and enjoyable drive back to Florida.

name: Todd Lackey
text: Century and the team at century Porsche are always top notch. Above and beyond the call of duty is always my experience. Jacob and Chris make it easy. A+ service. Good job!

resp.text: Thank you Todd

name: Kelley Snook
text: Exceeded expectations. I purchased my car sight unseen and had it shipped to Michigan. Bradley walked me through the entire process including what to expect and timing of each step. He is a knowledgeable professional that I would make an effort to work with again—even though there are three Porsche dealerships within 25 miles of me. Everything was exactly as he said it would be and he continues to be a willing resource for me after the purchase. Outstanding communication. Thank you!

resp.text:
Kelley, Thank you for the kind review. Purchasing a vehicle sight unseen from several states away can be a difficult. We try very hard to represent our vehicles to long distance customers as if they were looking at them person, yours was easy. Thank you for your business and entrusting us with your purchase.

Drive safely.

Porsche of Huntsville

name: Ken Boustani
text: As always,great service.My Porsche is ready now.

resp.text: Thank you for your five star rating! We appreciate your business!

name: Len Nelson
text: Per usual, Century Porsche and my mechanic  Graham Boccino are the best. Top shelf service for your Porsche at reasonable rates. He installed the PSE exhaust on my Carrera S and it sounds incredible.

text: Ray Diaz is the best. Kept me informed the whole way through the build.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and your continued business. You spec'd out a beautiful Spyder, enjoy it!

name: Roy Duvall
text: Great experience and communication throughout the process.

resp.text: Roy, thanks for taking the time to share your experience.

name: Joseph Owens
text: The service department is absolutely amazing. I have never experienced the level of care and detail that they provide..  Randy and Jacob are the nicest and most professional people I have dealt with.  I cannot say enough good things about them.  I will let them service my cayman every time i need something done.  By the way having the videos sent to me while it was being serviced was amazing.  Thank you very much for your help..

name: Clint Cosper
text: Service was great, car was complete at time stated. Thanks

name: David McKenzie
text: Knowledgeable techs, convenient location, will use again.

resp.text: Looking forward to seeing you next time David

name: Mel g (missy)
text: We traveled from Florida to pick up our 2018 Porsche Cayenne sight unseen and was exactly as Bradley told us. Great working with Bradley. Would not hesitate purchasing again from this dealer.

name: C Wells
text: I highly recommend the service department at Porsche of Huntsville. Randy Carter and Jacob Holt consistently provide a great experience and high quality. The service work is always done correctly and the pricing has been very competitive to the market. This dealership is a valuable asset for the local community!

name: Felecia Hives
text: Tried to charge up my car, only for their vehicles

name: Minibike King
text: Love this place but I always leave without a car. Maybe after my next stimulus check fingers crossed.

name: Jacqueline Wade
text: I have used this dealership’s service department twice. Not only are the service folks knowledgeable and seem trusting, I’m so happy that each  and every person are very professional with a commitment to customer service. Quite a class act.  Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you Jacqueline for the kind words. Porsche of Huntsville strives for this kind of service and relationships with all of our customers.

name: Becky Cobb
text:
I live halfway between Huntsville and Memphis. I took my car to Memphis for its annual service a year ago. My check engine light had popped up several times before I took it.   I was told there was nothing they could do for my car’s issue unless my check engine light was “on”.  The issue persisted and became worse.  I decided to try Huntsville to see if they could help.  To my surprise, your dealership exceeded my expectations!  I was provided with a loaner car and constant updates.  Your service manager, Randy Carter, was amazing. After my disappointing experience in Memphis, Randy and Chris Pope will be my “go to guys” for as long as I drive my Cayenne.  This car was our first Porsche purchase and being cared for the way I was in Huntsville, it will not be my last.
Thank you for everything you did. I am a satisfied customer and will continue to use  you for my future purchases.
Sincerely, Becky Cobb, Iuka Ms,

name: Charles Phillips
text: I had a major service performed on my Panamera this week.  Jacob and Randy provided excellent service. From the time I dropped the car off to getting the loaner car to pick up.   Everything went smoothly. Communication was very good.  Definitely recommend this service team.

name: J Williams
text:
I’m am glad others have had a good experience with this dealer. We have not. We found the car we wanted here in Huntsville while shopping from out of state. Initially the process was smooth, easy, friendly...until the salesman, Bradley, sold the car out from under us. This was after several attempts to call, email, and yet for 24 hrs no word back, nothing. Only to receive a call hours after all the attempts to reach...to say the car was sold. Having dealt with other dealers and more specifically, Porsche dealers...the lack of communication and poor salesmanship was absolutely horrible.

I know, in our case, we can shop at other dealers...I can only hope they treat their customers better than they did us.

resp.text:
J Williams,
I am sorry that you had a bad experience. Feel free to call me if you would like to discuss.
Jon Cunha, Sales Manager

name: shane Gadomski
text: Beautiful and luxurious and sporty all in one! Jacob in service is very knowledgable, helpful, and professional. Great overall experience!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Shane

name: Maria Ivette Rivera-Del Valle Anaya
text: Excellent service!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your five star review! We are happy to see you received exceptional care from our team.

name: Carl Weimer
text: Randy does a pretty great job in service. I bought a 2017 Macan S, had a few issues, but they were resolved quickly and got me back on the road.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Carl. We are proud to have Randy and his service team.

name: Richard Schwartz
text:
I love love ❤️ my new Porsche.
Yeah yeah YEAH!

name: Robert Nelson
text: We have another dealership closer but we make the drive to this location because of the excellent service department. If you want to feel like your business is appreciated go here.

name: HC Kwok
text: I bought a pre-owned 911, and have been coming to Century for service.  I track and abuse my car...and I'm kind of picky about the work done.  Randy and his team have been outstanding in dealing with my numerous requests and getting my 911 ready for every weekend when I need it to perform at Barber Motorsports Park.

name: Keith Jackson
text: Randy Carter and the maintenance team are great.  The sales lobby is nice, too.

name: Vytautas Pukis
text: Helpful knowledgable staff. Highly recommended!!

name: Steven Payne
text: Super service!

name: Matt Tucker
text: Excellent experience

name: josh crawford
text: I visited 4 different lots then ended up coming back to the very first one (stallions) for my car. They have some of the cheapest prices in Birmingham and the car buying process was super easy. Samir was very friendly and let me test drive until I found the car I wanted. Mrs.Audra was eager to help inside and paperwork was done in no time. Would definitely recommend

name: Kelly Ballam
text: Rakan was very friendly and very helpful. The process of buying my car went very smooth and was a pleasant experience all around.

name: kr
text:
I needed a reliable car for a decent price. I looked online and found stallions auto and knew immediately where I needed to go.

I test drove any car I wanted and was able to come to a decision in under an hour. a good selection of cars, all constantly being detailed. I left the lot with a car newer than I expected and well under budget. I highly recommend this business!

name: Larry Smitherman
text: Just like any other father, I was very scared and hesitant in shopping for a car for my upcoming 16 year old, I mean who wouldn’t? I want to make sure I put my kid in a safe and reliable vehicle. Upon arriving to the dealership (which is not a fancy dealership by any means) I saw the vehicle that we had seen on this dealerships partner advertising site. Moments later I walked up to the office and met the person that I had originally spoke with on the phone, Lee. He made me feel at home and welcomed me in a polite manner. No pushy sales person mentality here. Very straight forward and comfortable atmosphere. I test drove the vehicle, liked it. It’s a used car and I don’t expect perfect for $6K. Needless to say, the 2012 Rogue with 120k was the perfect buy. AWESOME! Will be back and will recommend you to friends and relatives in the area, cheers.

name: Amos Sunday
text: They are scammers. I bought a car for over $10,000.00. Check engine light came on before I made it home. I called them 3 times to discuss options. Each time they said they would call me back. (Never did) . I suggest only buying cars from here if you have had them fully checked out by a mechanic or if they still have a warranty.

name: Nick R
text: The best used car buying experience my family and I have ever had. I was a student looking for an inexpensive user car and they had tons of options. Found the perfect car and got a fair price and drove it home that day. These guys are great and were honest with me from start to finish. I’ve had this car for about a week now and no problems it’s been a great ride. 5/5 stars, Stallion Autos is the way to go!

name: kat osborne
text: It’s really hard to find great quality, prices and customer service in today’s world of car shopping! I hit pay dirt with these guys!!! The office manager, putting it mildly because she can do any job there, Audra was down home pleasant and eager to help! Lee was helpful and courteous!! Our family is planning another purchase and we will give Stallions our business!!!

name: Calvin Jenkins
text: Very easy. Friendly. Well mannered staff. Professional. They knew they’re inventory by heart. A wide variety of vehicles. I was very impressed and pleased with my purchase. Highly recommend.

name: adam ledbetter
text: Very nice group of people here! Reasonable prices and they still worked with me on an out the door price. Paid cash and completed the transaction in under 20 minutes. Highly recommend going here if you are looking for a good used car. Very large selection.

name: dward eagle
text: This place was great. We drove an hour to test drive a car and turned out to be a good first car for my daughter. Everyone was nice and not pushy like the normal used car places. Process of purchase was quick and easy. We will def be coming back when looking for a vehicle!!

name: Lori Mckoy
text: I bought a 2010 Toyota Prius for my teenage daughter there. When I asked, the salesman if the car was in good condition, he said the car was in great condition. Since buying it not quite 2 months ago I’ve had to spend almost $1,000 after buying it for 5,000.  I would not recommend Stallions to anyone. I called after the first repair asking if I could just return it for a refund and was told no. So that shows they don’t stand behind the quality of the cars they sell.

resp.text: - [ ] Hey Ms.  Lori. My friend just  bought a brand new Maserati. Only been a few months and he’s having to do some repairs. Few thousand dollar repairs. I’m not sure what the problem was with your car but we could have helped you by sending you somewhere to get a better price. But every car will eventually need something fixed.  Parts get worn out and go bad. It’s normal.

name: Lamar King
text: Did not purchase a car but I thought I should review the great customer service .Ronza was very polite , understanding, and committed to her work .she was great at explaining everything to us. Great customer service is hard to find, but you can find it here.I highly recommend anyone to her and Stallions Auto for your next car purchases.

name: Chris Banks
text: Great people great cars you want find anywhere else.. quick service I was in and out in a flash... I will go back and recommend them to new buyers

name: Jessica Hennington
text: This was the calmest shopping experience I’ve ever had. I was happy to purchase my Kia from here as a new mom my number one goal was a safe and reliable vehicle. Lee and Alex knew my needs and went above and beyond to make sure they were all met. Mrs. Audra in the office was extremely polite and patient with all of my questions during the paperwork process. I would definitely recommend buying a car from here!

name: Ran Cedriq Washington Sr.
text: My son, Ronald Washington bought a car from this company in November of 2020 and it had NO PROBLEMS safe out runs GREAT. My wife and I are ooking forward to going and purchasing a BMW sometime soon. A great company to purchase from! We'll do more business with Stallions!

name: Cyndi Bonner
text: Do not finance your car through this company.   They will repo your car if one payment is late and cost you thousands of dollars to get your car back.   You have been warned!

name: Kimberly C Nunn-Washington
text: My son, Ronald Washington bought a car from this company in November of 2020 and it had NO PROBLEMS safe out runs GREAT. My husband and I are ooking forward to going and purchasing a BMW sometime soon. A great company to purchase from! We'll do more business with Stallions!

name: Jessica Alnemer
text: the workers inside the office are very polite and they help you get answers to all of your questions. very easy to communicate with. affordable prices. rakan and laith are very professional, helpful people. would recommend.

name: Muhammed
text: Stallions was awesome. The customer service was impeccable. They helped me find the perfect fit for me and my wife. We both financed our vehicles from stallions, and have shopped with them over the past ten years with amazing service. I currently drive a Toyota solara, while my wife drives a Toyota Camry- both of which exceeded our expectations. Would recommend to shop all your auto vehicles from this spot

name: Alex Paquette
text: My experience with stallions was great. Jessica helped me with every step of the buying process from finding the vehicle to getting my paperwork done. It was the easiest car buying experience I've had

name: Darkness X
text: Ronald Washington whom is my brother came home with this fresh new car from this company last year in November. It's so clean and he won't let us eat in it!

name: Kenitra Young
text: Mr.Lee has been a great salesman ., I’ve purchased a Sequoia Toyota 2005 and he has good running cars . I truly would recommend any other person to him . I Thank him so much for his service .

name: MADD Boom
text: Great people really helpful n they care .

name: William Beaty
text: These guys are awesome! Family owned and operated. 19 years here. They know the area. They gave us an amazing price, and negotiated fairly with us. They are all about building relationships, and establishing their reputation as an honest business contributing to our community.

name: Tez Finley
text: Variety. Quality. Affordable. Good business. Recommend

name: Pete Zane
text: Spectacular experience every time since 2014. Thanks. Keep up the good work. I always send people looking for a vehicle your way because y’all always done me right

name: Johnathan Washington
text: Man.. My brother Ron WASHINGTON bought a Passat and it looked better than mine! I bought mines before he bought his! My got scratches on it cause I bought it out of BIRMINGHAM but I should've waited for him before I got mine. How was also CHEAPER THAN MINE! UMM GON'T but my next car from Stallions cause I see EVERYBODY IN my town, riding wit a Stallions tag on they cars.

name: Maya Nelson
text: This place was awesome! Lee was very helpful and informative of whatever questions I had even when I felt like I was asking too many. Would definitely recommend y’all!

name: James Holeman
text: Happy to leave a 5 star for this place. Visited 3 lots and ended up back where I started. Price won me over. Thanks Lee

name: Bethany Beaty
text: We had a great experience at Stallions Auto! We found the listing online, test drove it, and took it to a mechanic for pre-purchase inspection. The price was so great that no negotiation was even needed! Once we decided to buy, we had papers signed in 10 minutes. Great hassle free experience!

name: jeremy lane
text: This was my second stop. I spoke with Lee and he was super upfront about the vehicle I was inquiring about. Gave me the run down on what it needed and what was almost due as far as maintenance. I enjoyed the straight forwardness and which I had put a deposit down to hold the vehicle. I chose to go look at one more car lot and take my chance, by time I chose to do business with Lee the vehicle I initially wanted was sold. I explored more options and ended up in a 2013 Toyota Camry Le. Paid cash, was provided a Carfax and went on my way. Easy short and sweet.

name: Hun Lui
text: I found exactly what I was looking for at Stallions Auto. A good dependable reasonably priced automobile for my daughter. They had such an incredible selection of vehicles at the price range I was looking for. When in search for a used car I don’t expect a PERFECT used car, I am reasonable and I think they were more than reasonable with me. Answered all my questions, showed me the Carfax and had me on my way in about 25 minutes. Will definitely be a repeat customer thanks to the excellent customer service and pricing.

name: Tonya Henson
text: New to area and luckily found these guys! Took the nerves away and prices I can afford!! Very customer service oriented and Audra was super helpful!! Rick and Lee so sweet

name: Marcus Brown
text:
I am going to give these folks a high five ! What a pleasant experience. Very friendly, effeciant, and honest. I felt very comfortable in my decision. I know it is an unfamiliar time with what is going on around us. We planned ahead. I applied for credit and spoke with Lee. It was so simple and what a great deal !. Everyone was wearing a mask and being observant of caution. I was literally only there for an hour ! My purchase / completion of paperwork maybe took 30 minutes ! What an awesome experience and a great car !
Mini Countryman S...I am in love

name: Gerica Cammack
text: This is the 1st place I've came across that do layaway. This is a good way to earn someone's business.

name: Robert Joe
text: Lee was great. Not a fancy dealership but cars are priced very fairly and great selection of vehicles for cheap. Drove of the lot in my brand new Altima in no time!

name: rolando antonio
text: my sister told me about this place after she bought her car, she said they have good deals. i saw good reviews online so i got a car for my son. car is running good no issues. good business. good prices

name: crane industries LLC
text: Bought a company sales delivery automobile from Lee and I was very content with the value and price. Paid cash money and was presented true straight forward information in regards to condition and history. Came with good tires and body looked fair for the price. Happy man overall. I will recommend you

name: Jackie Olson
text: I went to stallions because they had great deals and My credit is not great and no where would finance me. They also have good quality cars my mom told me about them after I ran all around town. Thank you Rick and everyone at stallion see y’all in 2 weeks

name: Samuel London
text: This is my second time purchasing. Great  experience and not to forget to mention how awesome their customer service is. Make sure to ask for Rakan or Lee, very helpful!

name: Jarrod Jones
text: Very well. Nicely put together package. They fit well with what we were looking for. Honest, trust worthy, upfront people. Very “unsalesman” like. Pointed me in the direction of which  3 vehicle to narrow my search down. Listed pros and cons on each and was very enlightened on his knowledge of his vehicles. Will definitely buy another in the future (hopefully not anytime soon)

name: Gina Portobello
text: Amazing service. One stop shop. Did my financing on one car through them without checking my credit and bought another one cash. I was also referred to a upholstery store to  take my aunts car that needs seats repaired. All in all I’m beyond satisfied. Thank y’all

name: Ronza Alnemer
text: Everything went smoother than expected. I would recommend them to anyone looking or needing a good dealership..... Lee was very considerate and courteous and extremely helpful  He will help you with everything you need He is very professional...I would recommend any one to him!

name: Alexa Naiomi
text: Just got my Infiniti from Rick at stallions. Y’all go see him. I went to 4 dealers before I went there and no one wanted to sell me a car but he did. Thank you

name: Jill Crenshaw
text: My go to car guys for 6 years now. They got me 3 different cars that I asked them to find. I’m thankful to know some people like them in the car business because I got screwed when I lived in Florida! So I appreciate you

name: Dj Simmerton
text: Made a drive out to see the vehicle my daughter wanted, they were very nice over the phone as well as in person. Drove back and have kept us with my services since then, no problem at all what so ever with the way they handled our procedure! Very hands on and quick, we appreciated the conversation! Good place to conduct a cash sale (We looked) - Thank you Lee

name: John Kennedy
text: Great selection and very helpful staff.

name: Samir Huneidi
text: 10/10. Great selection of vehicles at fair prices with a fantastic staff. Everything was very straightforward and I got my car and the paperwork done In no time. Would highly recommend.

name: Darryl Little
text: Man y’all were all so good to me and my family and just want to take time out our day to say thank you in a few ways. We’ll be bringing all your employees lunch next week. We went to a few other places and no one treated us the way y’all did or did half of the things y’all did. THANK YOU! We love our cars from y’all

name: Tyler Rose
text: Stallions has helped my family out so much man. We can’t say thank you enough. I appreciate y’all. Great customer service

name: Northernhighlandgourmet Gourmetfeast
text: The guy with the short hair and a beard helped me significantly. Not only in my car buying process, but also in recommending me a place to upkeep my Porsche! Good cash deals. Good smooth transaction. Straight to the point. I’m the type of person that likes someone to shoot me straight! Thanks

name: Freddie Percy
text: 5 stars. Ask for Lee. Straight forward dude. I wanted a good price for a dependable vehicle. An overpriced car at a “fancy” dealership was not what I was in search of. Stallions did the job for me. Thanks guy

name: Jose Terrado
text: Came to look at a Prius that I saw on Cars.com, I liked the way it handled. I didn’t end up buying the Prius but I bought a Jetta. Enjoyed working with these folks. (5 weeks ago)

name: Nicholas Cole
text: I was very impressed with their inventory and their customer service. all the cars I inquired about were priced well under book value. Lady that picked up the phone had great customer service skills. My wife is happy. So I’m a Happy customer

name: Debbie McAlister
text: I loved my whole experience. I got a great deal because I was coming with straight cash.  Lady was nice and informative over the phone. Highly recommend this business. Many great reviews. A++

name: Lorie Smitherman
text: Straight forward. I don’t like car shopping for weeks, they make it easy. Not forceful and pushy. Liked the bluntness and I appreciate a straight forward person more than anything. Lee gave me the down payments and review the paper work with me in no time. Was a happy and satisfied customer

name: Anna Lawson
text: I am so freaking happy I finally got the car I wanted and it was in our budget. I’ve been looking for 3 weeks and the Volkswagens all were all priced more than what I had. I found one at Stallions with lower miles and even cheaper. I was in shock. Thank you Rick me and my family loved working with you and your workplace.

name: mike clemens
text: nice selection. under book value. carfax on all

name: Tony Alaraj
text: The cash deals I found at Stallions were unmatchable in the area. Lee answered all my questions, showed me the vehicle history and was straight up with me. I did not need any credit and I was a cash buyer. Very well mannered sales people.

name: cleandria kennedy
text: Literally the best experience! Beautiful family, very professional and trustworthy! Thank you guys, I don’t think I would have found a better deal! If you don’t know where to start, start here, you will not be disappointed!

name: Ricky Bailey
text: I found a few vehicles I liked after I searched other dealers for a long time. Prices were way below the other local dealers. I respect their way of operating. Thank you for your time and business

name: sharlay gibson
text: Talked to them on the phone and set up a time to go in for a test drive, car was in excellent condition, they faxed my bank all the paper work and I drove off in my new Jeep! hassle free. great prices and friendly staff. thanks again

name: justice sanders
text: Wonderful experience. Very friendly staff. Spoke with a young lady over the phone after I looked up their deals on their website and now I’m driving a car I saw on the website. Thank you guys for being so great

name: Melissa Small
text: Pleasant experience would do again

name: Veronica Parker
text: I went to stallion auto sale to look at cars and when I got there I got that BMW  and when I tell you iam please with the salesman who sold me the car if any one looking to purchase a car I highly recommend y’all go to stallion auto y’all won’t b disappointed I’m in love with my BMW 28i turbo everyone is so nice and friendly

name: Hamzah Tarawneh
text: By far the best car lot around town awesome deals and great customer service!

name: jackie aldridge
text: I want to thank the boys at the shop at Stallions for making it easy for me to test drive and buy the Accord. They were sweet, laid back and honest. I knew i was buying a used car and they walked me through the car buying process very quickly and had me in and out the door within 30 minutes. I cant walk far distances or stand on my feet for very long so i appreciated that.

name: Dede Charles
text: Love my car. Love y’all. I can’t stress how happy I am. I didn’t feel pressured. I felt welcomed and appreciated. My cousin told me to come here. He’s happy and our friends are happy dealing with y’all. We’ll be back. Good business

name: Shala
text: I bought a car in honesty and WAS NOT sold a car in honesty. Prior to buying the car he stated there was nothing MAJOR wrong with car. Once I bought the car and realized the key remote was not programmed to the car so it would not lock, it needed a new battery, the dashboard headset was not working. I just came from VW dealership to get the key reprogrammed and they check that the car had a gas leak and the turbo needed fixing. 3500 dollars worth of work. I called Lee at the dealership and he told me I should have gotten it checked. You bought the car! i would NEVER recommend this dealership to my worst enemy. I believe if you are going to sell a car at a higher rate, then you need to make sure the car is worth selling it at that rate. If I could give them  zero stars I would. he just a salesman trying to sell you a far, he doesn't care what happens to you afterwards.

name: Dee Smith
text: If your exhausted, from high pressure  car dealerships sales department,s then I highly recommend  This place ,  the staff was a refreshing experience and extremely helpful,  and awesome  vehicle, s , I will recommend them from now on ,sincerely  Dee . s👍

name: Marsha
text: This place is awesome! They truly care about their customers! I would recommend them to anyone looking to get a good car for a good price.

name: Victorian
text:
Updated post: They say the third time is a charm and it is!!!!!! Went back to Stallions today and I love my new car!!!!! Same great prices and there's a new Sheriff in town lol. Yep new management, Lee is the best!!!!!
Old post: I Went to  Stallions 3 months ago and really enjoyed myself! Bethany was great!!!!! She and I talked the whole time, just girl talk and family talk. I laughed the whole time I was in the office. Our salesman was Lee and he was great also!!!! Don't believe the bad reviews because I almost did, and was hesitant about going. Glad I went!!!! All you need is a down payment,  drivers license, social security card, and you'll have the car of your dreams. I hope this helps someone.

name: mahmoud A
text: I was very pleased with my visit this past weekend. We originally came in looking at a Jetta until my wife steered me into looking at a Mercedes CLS500 that caught her eye. We test drove it, walked in the office, 15 minutes of paperwork and we were on the road. I will not overlook this lot. Will be back!

name: Michael Winston
text: Very unprofessional!!  I was told several lies throughout the buying process. Their system for accepting payments are stone-age and they lied about the condition of the car (service lights, broken mirror, and scratches). Buy at your own risk!

name: Linda bowden
text: I work next door to Stallions and It was time for a new vehicle so I decided to stop by. My husband came with me and we were very pleased with our experience thus far. Nice array of cars! Thanks guys. Changed my oil and that's it!

name: Bailey Chapman
text: Me and my sister just drove off in our new cars. I Was in and out. Very Happy customers. great service and great cars

name: Jessie Langston
text: Got in touch with Stallions over the phone and set up a appointment to view a vehicle. Came in test drove it and paid with money orders. Very easy and smooth transaction. Not pushy. Answered every question me and my brother had. Thank you Rick.

name: Ali Fulladi
text:
Bought my car from here, and my brother got his from here as well.

I had a great experience and I have nothing but good things to say about these guys, I got an Audi and it runs like a beast. Super friendly staff and they walk you through the whole process and make it easy for you. I've had a terrible experience in the past with car dealers but these guys broke the stereotype. Laith was my rep and i'm so impressed. Thank you guys for your help.

name: Jerry Pridemore
text: I had a good phone conversation prior to arriving, asked about tires since I had a 2 hour drive back. Dealer was honest and told me that the vehicle had 1 bad tire that he was willing to change. I appreciated that a lot. Most used car dealers would waste my time. I don't expect a perfect vehicle for $8000. But I damn sure good a good deal. Thank you guys for getting me in the car.

name: David Thorsby
text: Pleasure doing business. I was told about a battery before leaving the dealership. Changed it myself ($90) and I’m good to go! Dealer really priced his vehicle to sell. Happy overall

name: Savanna Silver
text: I found the best car here and would recommend friends families and strangers to shop here for first time buyer they work with you and they're real nice people I would definitely come here for my next car

name: Tonys Morris
text: I had the best experience with you guys. I really do appreciate you guys, and I will be referring my friends to you. You guys are wonderful. I’ve  bought many cars in my life and some were good some were night mares. Website has many detailed pictures. They let me put some money towards the car I wanted so it wouldn’t get sold until I got the rest of the money, that was a blessing! Thank you thank you thank you!

name: Gegory Hausler
text: Very happy with what this car lot was doing. Great business and we are happy to provide you with our future car needs (2 kids to go). Easy, n hassle and NOT PUSHY!

name: Trey Kingsley
text: I was very happy with my purchase. My dad was out of state and still managed to get my funds transferred over to me while Stallions held the car for me (with a small deposit). I spoke with Lee and felt like I was speaking to a friend, not a Salesperson. He was honest and told me what they car needed,tires. I knew it was a used car and it’s expected for it to need something minor like that. I respect that type of business. This was about 2 months ago, better late than never. And I did receive my title in the mail!

name: Rod Chesthill
text: I just came across stallions autos on a website called cargurus that had great deals and looked them up and saw some great reviews and I just purchased a 2011 bmw 3 series. I have to say I was not expecting this kind of service and treatment. These guys are selling cars in the customers best interest and they let me know some things that I didn’t know without asking. My nephew will be coming to see you guys in a few days so look out for him like you did me, and I’ll be back

name: jill coleman
text: 4 years later my car is still going strong. ill be coming by soon my sister needs a new car

name: sumar abukhudeer
text: Customers service is awesome and the perfect place if you’re a first time buyer. Highly recommend!

name: Josefina Kirkley
text: At first I didn’t like the front right  tire on the car that I drove for. The owner gave me $100 discount and I was pleased with that. Good used car for the money. Looked at several cash cars

name: kevin crosby

text: I don't recommend this place

name: Romero Alvaraz
text: I’ve lived all over the south east and I’m very familiar with non franchise car dealerships. With that being said, the profit margin these folks place on top of their vehicles has to be very very minimal based on their website prices. Ever car we inquired about we found cheaper here than anywhere else. Very transparent and very straight forward, they rely on selling quantity rather than a big mark up on a used car. They understand the market and have a great business model. I didn’t catch the owners but I wanted to say thanks and assure you that my family and I will not take our business elsewhere.

name: Emily Bowden
text: Almost had a heart attack when I first arrived and thought the vehicle I drove an hour for was sold. Although the sales person was sweet and advised me to put a deposit over the phone because their vehicles will quick, I took my chance. Anyways, it was parked out back and I got to it first :) *Quick change of mood*

name: Brittany Deflo
text: Just great. Very nice. Not pushy. Customer service was excellent. Provided all the information I asked for and needed. I got the 411 on a place that sells very cheap full coverage insurance. Im so grateful I found this place

name: Christie Downey
text:
Steer clear of this car lot! They sold us a car that they knew was for our 16 yr old daughter. We made it home and the next day the car would not shift into gear and then completely died. The owner did take our call and told us it was because a ground wire caused the transmission to stop working. We got the car to a local mechanic we use for everything who tested the car and said there are major electrical issues and multiple transmission codes. They knew this car was a lemon when the sold it to us. I get that used cars are a gamble but not the kind of issues this vehicle has. It's not even worth fixing. TRUST Me there is a reason their cars are priced so cheap. I'm sure not every car the sell is bad but they do sale junk cars/lemons.

BEWARE, Save your money.  You get what you pay for.

name: Jonas Knox
text: I was pleased to leave in a cash car and not have any payments. They showed me the true book value of what they sold me. Happy guy

The repairs to the transmission were $1,400. We’ve put another $500 into the exhaust system. Nobody from Stallion would ever call us back. Not to mention brakes and rotors were $400. Seems to me that they’re running a scam operation.

text: I drove up today may 25,2019 to check out a vehicle. This vehicle that, “claimed” to be great condition! Turned out to be a nightmare on the lot. They didn’t mention to me at all that the paint on this car was completely destroyed, not just tiny flakes here and there the paint peeling over 50% of this vehicle. We ended up passing on the vehicle the man working Rick was absolutely sweet is why I even handed this review a one star. Rick showed us another vehicle, dead battery but you know we thought, “maybe it’s just been on the lot a second”. Little jump start, and it fires right up. Problem one radio didn’t work, problem two the air wouldn’t even get cold. The biggest problem of them all is we tried to test drive this vehicle and the brakes sounded like steel on steel it was god awful. We didn’t even have second thoughts, we straight turned that vehicle around before we even got a second to pull it off the lot. Ridiculous because the photos that were used on Facebook didn’t show any detail of all of the paint job involved on this car. A waste of an hour drive to the location. Please know what your getting involved in on this lot.

Took it back to dealer and they had their mechanic look at it, 3 days later they said it was running fine.. Check engine light still on and back to "limp mode" the next day. Online research says it could be a failing ECMb saleman told me that I will have to take it to the dealership to fix it.

text: Don't trust these people at all!! In fact just stay away. I purchased a convertible from them about a few weeks ago and was assured that it did not leak anywhere. I washed the car as soon as I got home and there was a small bit of water on the inside right by the door. I figured it might be because the car was sitting still and I was directly spraying it with water, however I contacted the guy about it anyways. He said he would talk with one of his guys and get back to me.... It has now been several weeks and I havnt heard anything from him. Today (8/26) I got stuck in a heavy downpour and the top was leaking from every angle. I got to work and I was soaked and so was the inside of the car. So now I'm going to have to rip out the carpet and get that cleaned and hopeing that no water got in anything electrical. Will never do business with these people again!

name: Whitney Penn
text: Do not do business with this company !!!! Take your money elsewhere. Would give a negative rating if I could.  Purchased a car from this place and they were nice and responsive until they got their money. The very next day the engine started tapping and the same salesman that sold me the car was too busy to talk or see me. Obtained verified diagnostics test from dealership stating the car had a bad engine and would cost $1000's to replace. The salesman Lee originally told me they would fix the car for me than later changed his statement saying there was nothing wrong with the car while it was here and that his mechanic was booked up for the next few months. Not responding to phone calls, emails, and very rude during follow up visit. This place is a joke of a business.  The cars look good but they are lemons. Save yourself hardship and a headache and do not do business here.

text: I think it’s “Blake”? Did a marvelous job.

name: Brittany Boyd
text: They posted a 2007 ltz tahoe on Facebook. I talked to Lacy over a two day period about it. Tahoe looked great in the pictures on Facebook but after driving 2 1/2 hours to buy it we got there and it had been wrecked in the rear, windshield was cracked, front tires had wires showing they were so bald, airbag, and check engine light was on. NOT ONCE did Lacy bother to mention any of these issues the entire time I was talking to her about it. Even tried to convince me to put down a NONREFUNDABLE $300 deposit over the phone to "pull it off of the lot". Don't make the same mistake I did. Don't waste your time at this place. text: If I had the option to buy a toy car here I wouldn’t. This place is terrible and they lie about the condition of the cars. The good reviews on here are half of the family members that work there. I REPEAT DO NOT BUY A CAR FROM THEM. THEY ARE SHADY!!!

text: I had a fabulous experience. Their staff is very competent and easy to work with. Felt more like family than any where else I've been. It is because of the excellent value and service I received that I am now a client for life.
