text: These folks are hands down the best and easiest people to work with. Inventory is constantly updated. I was Treated with nothing but respect.

name: Jen Weaver
text: Good experience will go back for another car. Very helpful on getting me into the right vehicle with the down payment I had. People are super nice. Will recommend to all family and friends.

name: Evan Lewis
text:
Recently bought a car from them. Car seems like it’s a great vehicle and for a reasonable price.

The only problem I had is that we made a deal with them to replace the battery in the car (which was a hybrid) and they gave us a battery that wasn’t for a hybrid. I went back and what should have been a calm discussion about getting the right battery turned into a very heated exchange when the dealer began to call my mother rude and claiming the battery was fine.

The battery ( the 12 V startup one) is a specialty type of battery for a hybrid that only the dealer provides and costs about 500$:

We ended up getting a check from them to get the battery from the dealer (they wouldn’t pay the install price, just the wholesale). The thing is, is that this review would have been 5 stars if they had just been polite and understating when we came to them about the problem. We could have gotten to the same point without the very unpleasant arguing and lying. That had us coming away with what seems to be a great car but a really bad taste in our mouth about the dealer.

Hope the car runs for a long time, but when buying a car from here .... MAKE SURE you get any agreement in writing (be very specific) and check with an inspection place they have done the work correctly  before sigining the dotted line.

name: Mary Lavicka
text: Not the type to generally leave a review, but Im doing so in this case since we felt very strongly about  the people we dealt with. Great, genuine people here. Drove an hour and a half to the location, test drove the 2014 Nissan and took it to get checked out at a near by garage. It checked out- As any used car it had minor things that needed to be addressed but that's to be expected with any used car. I don't expect a brand new car, besides a mechanic shop HAS to give you a long list otherwise they feel like they have not done their job correctly. Came back, negotiated price (which was already low and I admit to that since I did my research). The gentleman was polite and told me he could knock of $200. Paid it in cash and made it through the paperwork hassle free in less than 15 minutes. On the way out I ran into  the owner who  explained to me the way that they conducted their business. They seemed to do well and sold many cars at that location. He was a very down to earth person. The reason for my detailed explanation is to make it clear to anyone that looks at online reviews to take them for a grain of salt. Mid-conversation with the owner I watched a man come into this dealership and demand new brakes and tires on a vehicle he bought a few weeks back apparently, and otherwise threatened to leave a bad review!! People like that get on my last nerve. These folks are selling good quality cars for a fraction of the price. If someone wants a brand new car they need to help themselves to a brand new car store. We don't see shops like this anymore, everything is being bought out and turned into a franchise sore where you would pay at a lot more for the exact same car. We need to value these people.  Anyways it made me angry seeing someone act in such a way. These people treated us very well. We will be back to see you guys.

text: I bought a VW Jetta from them. They told me it had good tires and ran great. It drives great however that was after new tires and breaks and it also had a cabin air fliter that was black. Plus i was told that my tax, title, and rag was included in the total price. I went to the DMV to get my tag and they have not paid any tag taxes on any of the vehicles they sell. So make sure your carrying an extra 200$ or more to get you tag. They basically screw people on the cars. It may be wholesale prices but not worth it at all! They need to work on theyre cuatomer servuce too. Hanging up on people who bought a car from you is bad business. Ill juat make sure to spread the word on yalls scams!

name: Kevin Carson
text: Bought a Tahoe in April 2018 now Aug 2018 still running ok. Thanks. Just sharing my experience. The guys there were really nice to deal with

name: Mirandal Kendricks
text:
While I don't usually leave reviews for places I visit, I was strongly compelled to inform the people of Alabama about my visit and the "OWNER" of this establishment. If I could leave 0 stars, I would.

My mother purchased a car a few weeks ago and today she decided to go on her lunch break and get her tag. Information that should've been provided during her purchase at the dealership was requested from the clerk at the tag/title office. She placed a call and got the owner on the phone and he was attemping to assist her. While he was able to eventually get her the information she needed the process of how she had to get the information from the owner was where she had an issue. She stated that there was a language barrier which she didn't personally mind BUT as she was on her lunch break and had limited time to talk she requested to speak with someone with better English that could accomodate her and articulate the information she needed in a timely manner. The owner became rude with her during her phonecall even prompting the clerk at the window to comment on his rudeness.

I later accompanied her to his dealership as she needed to make a payment on her vehicle as well. Once arriving conveniently the owner was sitting on the front "porch" of the lot. When she expressed to him her issue with the process that it took to get information from him earlier and why she requested to speak with someone with better English he became rude with her again, and constantly interrupted her.  I happened to accompany her on this visit and made a comment about his direct rudeness. I guess he didn't take our visit too well because we'd interrupted his flirting with his employee but he then proceeded to invite the both of us into his office and present to us a dusty old box containing his many "degrees" which from what I saw were merely laminated certificates as if that gave him the right to conduct business and talk to us the way he did. I made the comment that both myself and my mother carried actual degrees from accredited universities, she even having her Masters which at the end of the day should not matter. Him having the title of "OWNER" and his many "degrees" should never give him the right to believe that he should be able to be rude to customers or anyone else for that matter. It takes way more than walking around and merely calling yourself a business owner. Its a matter of action as well. As an owner you should be able to take criticism and responsibility for your actions. A simple apology would've been good enough but my mother didn't even get that. I myself began to get upset because of the way he chose to speak to my mother. I simply could not allow it. I began to explain her position yet he attempted ot interrupt me like he did her. I wasn't allowing that either. Our conversation ended up being a mix of words in which he eventually summoned one of his employees into the room for reasons I still don't know. She attempted to explain that the owner was alone by himself at 8 AM until she was able to get into the office and the fact that she hadn't been able to hang up her purse because he asked her to take the phone. This made no difference to me or my mother because 1. She called around 1 PM not 8 AM & 2. As a business "OWNER" he should've done a better job with tailoring his business to order to fit the needs of customers. If you had staffing issues then as an "OWNER" it was on him to take on that matter himself. Either way it should not fall on the shoulders of the customer to deal with your rudeness and lack of customer service. My mother always raised me to be honest and to speak my mind so here I am speaking my mind and saying that the "OWNER" of this establishment is trash and should better spend his days gaining proper accreditation on what it means to be a good business owner and how to deliver good customer service as well taking some time to fix up his dealership because all it takes is for the wrong person to have an accident on that janky "staircase" on his lot and his entire business under fire due to lawsuit.

text: I bought my car june 29 2019 they told me to come back in 2 weeks to get my title application I went back two 2 later they gave me the title application and told me it would take 4 to 6 weeks to get my title I said ok the 6 weeks mark was up August 29 2019 so I called the lady that answered the phone said oh you should get it next week here it is September the 10 and still no title so I guess I will be making a trip up their again or I will call my  attorney because I paid cash for my car watch out before up buy from here

text: I've bought cars at many buy here pay her lots, nobody has worked with me as much as these guys did. They have me a good price and treated me fairly, even worked with me when I was in a bad spot in my life and was late on a payment. I recommend them to anyone needing a car

name: Corionta Nevels
text: I put $1200 down on my car and paid my car note on time. After my first car note, my car broke down. I only had my car a month and a week. I was already having to buy parts for the car when I first got it as well as pay for labor. The car needs a transmission and all 4 control arms. This is the worst car dealership I have ever delt with. I told them if they would buy the parts & I pay for the labor or the other way around that I would do that and they wouldn't. They want me to pay for the parts, labor and my car note. That don't work with me. They are crooked and their cars are lemons. I advise everyone to go to another dealership. They're nice when you're looking and rude after you get it. They look out for who they want to look out for. They did my sister and cousin the same way. STAY AWAY!!!!

name: J Live Overdrive
text:
Run! Run away from this place immediately.  I called to ask about a car. I was told it was there....I called again to check their hours and ask about that car and another.  I was assured they were there.  I said it will take me 45 mins to get there...they said they would be ready for me.  Rick was the guy I spoke to.  I arrive and it's sketchy ....lots of cars with damage and flat tires...Rick greeted me and I said hey I was here to see the Mercedes-Benz C Class
...he says, Oh the black one? We just sold that last night...I said, I called you twice today before I came..he said well we got this gray one...both front tires flat on the ground, he said...they just need some air...I said nah let's look at the Hyundai, Rick says, it's right here...points to a really damaged vechicle...says let me get the key..and runs off...another man in a cart come by and hands me the key and I get in and the overhead visor was down in my view so I pushed it up to the roof...it fell right back down...again I tried...again, it fell down...I put the key in the ignition and turned it....nothing...the battery was dead...I looked at the guy and he said "oh you wanted to crank it"....I said well yeah, how else can we test drive..he said, well we don't crank these cars a lot and some have been sitting for awhile...just needs a jump real quick....I said no, I'm going to take my money and leave...what a sketchy place.  If you buy something here it had better be your last hope for anything cause you will not be happy...they straight lied to me
..caused me to drive 45 mins for trash.  I had cash in my pocket ready to buy.  Glad I trusted my gut and left....they wanted 3k for that lemon....I picked up something waaaay nicer at a real car dealership, paid cash and rolled out happy...Do Not Buy From Them!!!

name: angela harris
text: This place is a joke. My sister went here because she found a car that she wanted.  When we pulled up I had second thoughts because the place was a dump.  There were cars on the lot with flat tires, cars with broken window panes, cars wrapped in plastic, and she asked to use the restroom and the inside of the place was nasty.  She went on and purchased the car and the damn thing put us down less than 10 miles from the place.  She called the sales person and he came with an attitude and of course he claimed it was just out of gas.  Of course they didn't want to refund her money, but a few days later they did and withheld 200 of her down payment.  I would not recommend this place to anyone.

name: Bani R.
text: KLM Transport was dispatched Two 2019 Ram 1500, 2018 Jeep Wrangler Lifted, 2019 Ram 1500 Crew Cab Lifted and 2019 Chevrolet Colorado to ship either to or from SCA Performance Inc 7769 Gadsden Hwy Trussville, AL 35173. The dispatcher on this order was Chuck McClelland. We successful delivered Two 2019 Ram 1500. Successfully meaning we were about get them safely to SCA Performance Inc. One of the 2019 Ram 1500 was damaged during loading pictures are attached. There was a small scratch on the bumper and a dent underneath the bumper that was done. Upon dispatch we provided Chuck McLeelland with KLM Insurance information. We have been working in the transportation industry for over 20yrs and anytime a damage occur the customer or owner of the vehicle would reach out to the transport insurance company to file a claim, or the transport company can do so themselves. SCA Performance Inc is withholding a $1200.00 check for the shipment of these two vehicles until vehicles are repair like KLM Transport doesn’t have an active insurance policy. KLM would understand if we did not have insurance but being that we are insured with one of the TOP-rated insurance companies SCA Performance Inc should not be withholding payment from us. We have called this company over 20 times and we will continue to call them until we have confirmation that payment will be released. We have never experience suck an unprofessional company when it comes to paying their bills. We will be reporting this to all social sites. Rude and very unprofessional.

text: Top notch. They did more than they had to, and made sure I was satisfied.  These people  are  true professionals.  Thanks for  everything.

name: david lecapitaine
text: Awesome facility.

name: Nikolae Nedeljkovic
text:
Horrible service and ripping people off.
Would never recommend to go there!

name: Alex Pivovarskiy
text: The job they are doing is unprofessional and bad.Would never recommend the service of this company.

name: Mark Hansen
text: Absolute junk. Never buy a southern comfort conversion. Ours was ready for the scrap yard after one year.

name: Mitchell Watts
text: We have been doing business with SCA for nearly two decades.  The most honest people you can find in the automotive industry.  They are wonderful people.  There is nobody else I would rather do business with.

name: Corey Layman
text: After recently purchasing a GMC Sierra that has been outfitted by SCA Performance with their Black Widow package, I am extremely impressed with how well put together this truck is. The fit and finish of the interior components such as the leather seats and the gauge cluster is impeccable. I'm also impressed by how well the suspension, bumpers, and fender flares have been installed and how clean of a look they provide. I'm very happy with my purchase this far and even though I haven't had to deal with any warranty claims like others here have, I have confidence that will go just as smoothly. You won't be disappointed by any product from SCA Performance. I can assure you of that.

name: Harvey Harvey
text: Great company great people and excellent work

name: Rodney Watson
text: Had a couple issue's with my Black Widow that came up while I was on Vacation last week, so I decided to stop by this morning and talk to them and see when the repair's could be done. But while looking up there address I read the review's that other's had left. And was thinking in my mind ( oh crap this isn't going to be fun). But I talk to a guy name Michael and he was very nice and explained what would have to be done on one of my issue's and for the other one. He got my key and took the truck right in and in about ten minutes problem solved. I am giving a 5 star for there  customer service and the SCA Performance package.

name: Danny Tunmire
text: Amazing team of people who are truly passionate about what they do.

name: Toby Woodard
text: I love my SCA truck this is my 2nd SCA truck love them they do great work best in the business!!!!

name: Bobby J Stanford
text: Baddest a$$ truck I ever seen on the street!!! So I had to buy one!!! Thanks guys! You freakin ROCK!

name: Casey Bonner
text: If I could leave a zero rating I would.the customer service is lacking extremely.if you have a nice truck don't take it here

name: Mandy's Towing
text:
Me and my wife started a family back in 2005 and needed to get something bigger and safer
Then our car so we decided to go with a conversion van  thay are a little bit pricey so we  wanted to go with what we thought was a family and god based company well not the case after 2 year's of back and forth trying to get some work done  under warranty  come to find out that they say there was no warranty do to thy recently purchased  the company
(1 year before  I purchased my van)
So I got the dealer to half a"" fix the problems
Needless to say not happy with the we can glue it fix! After all we are not rich and a 62000 doller van really put a lot of stress on a newly
Married  couple try to start our family,
So we hired a lemon law attorney tried have them get them to fix the problems
(TV falling out . Wires smoking in the high top
Headliner not staying up ) just little things! !
So Mr rod McSweeney  said it's not his problem  so our attorneys won arbitration  and
Mr McSweeney  had to pay for the price of the up fit he prolonged it for as long as possible  and then filed bankruptcy just to open it back up in his sons name and and then filed bankruptcy again after a couple of years and the law let's he continue to do so and he just so happened to repurchase all his old equipment funny right
Not really seeing how we took a 42000 doller hit on a family vehicle but one good Thang happen in this me and my wife found forgiveness for them  and found out how strong we were so we forgive you for you know not the law of man just the law of money so Mr Mc Sweeney the law of the land was on your side
But I see you quoted  genius so you should probably try having the law of man on your side first!!!!

name: Tessa McCown
text: Both people I spoke on the phone with were extremely rude. A lady who did not give her name, and then a man named Aaron. Don't even bother

name: Sugma Who (Sugma What)
text: Terrible people. They are dangerously arrogant and dont have a clue what they are doing. And dont bother correcting the guy, his ego wont allow him to listen. Worst experience Ive ever had buying anything.

name: Shania Shelby
text: Didn’t take a super long time. Was in and out in about 3 hours. Made the experience really fun and inclusive. Approved me for the wrong car but I love the car any ways and they have a beautiful selection of cars to choose from. Simply a decent car buying experience from a lovely team

resp.text: Thank you for your five-star review, Shania. Our team at Jim Burke Hyundai always strives for the highest standards. We are delighted we made your experience a positive one. Until next time, take care.

name: Stephanie Sloan
text: I assume everything was done correctly, oil change and tire rotation. I arrived at 3:06 for my 3:00 appointment. ( I did say I would be there by 3:15 when I scheduled). It was 5:04 when I left. That was a long time to service my vehicle, especially when having an appointment.

name: Jack Norris
text:
This was honestly the best experience I have had with a dealership.
First, like most dealerships you get a warm greeting and all the pleasantries of being a potential buyer. This is where my experience usually changes. Usually after the salesperson talks to me, and I tell them my wants then start the negotiations it all changes. This did not happen at all. The sales people Adrienne and Chris were friendly and helpful. They seemed to genuinely care. The financial personal Timberley was very warm and tried to relate to my country roots. There was another lady there that helped me and got the car I wanted and worked out the financial part. I unfortunately forgot her name. She was awesome as well and got me exactly what I wanted!

Thank you all and please keep up the great work!

name: Erica Bass
text: Wonderful love the sale man. He was very helpful. Nathan Merchant a around applause to you, And thank you for help my family in these difficult times.

name: Chandra Sekar
text: Do not recommend this place. The wait time is much longer than what was communicated initially and there isn't a proper documentation of the services performed. I  was charged for a tire rotation and this wasn't check marked on the completed services sheet. The response from the service staff was "the technician has done it but doesn't know why it's not check marked as completed". Doesn't provide me confidence to believe if any of the other services was even done.

resp.text: Hi Chandra, Thank you for taking the time to voice your concerns. Please reach out to us at (205) 324-3371 to further discuss your concerns. Thank you and we hope to hear from you promptly.

name: carole strong
text: Typically I get good service from Jim Burke but not this time. They made promises they didn’t keep and the service took much longer than they initially told me. Was without a car for two days. Said they would have the part overnighted however it didn’t show up until the second day.

name: Micah Shields
text: Great service! Brian was helpful with getting my car’s routine maintenance back on track and making sure that everything in my car was functioning properly.

name: Gary Schneider
text:
Wonderful personalized service received on Saturday, May 29th.
Broke down on highway on Friday night. Spoke with A J Allen in the service department and was told if I got the car there early on Saturday they would do everything possible to get me back on the road to Texas. A J was there on Saturday morning and was able to diagnose and fix the issue. He kept me updated throughout the morning and had me back up and running by 11:00.

name: Christelle Williams
text: Thanks to the People At Jimburke and Most definitely a HUGE THANKS TO The Hyundai Manager and Team For helping me Get in my First car ❤️ You should definitely stop here before losing hope, They help any situation.

resp.text: Hi Christelle, Thanks so much for taking the time to share your feedback! We're happy to hear that you had a great experience with us at Jim Burke Hyundai and hope to see you again take care!

name: Renee Page-Nash
text:
The service staff are excellent.  I am disappointed with the suggested maintenance packages which are exorbitant.  They should just stick with the  owners manual maintenance schedule.

6/22 No one can tell me why my car is burning oil or why the oil light didn't come on when the oil was low.  This is concerning.

resp.text:
Renee,
Thank you so much for your review of Jim Burke Hyundai! We truly appreciate the feedback and hope to hear from you again.

name: Carey Culpepper
text: Very couteous and were willing to haggle.The new car clean-up dept needs a higher standard.

resp.text: Hi Carey, Thanks for sharing your experience. We hope you stop by and see us again soon.

name: Handsome K
text: It's located at the center of Birmingham city, where easy to access. They understand what the problem of your car and what to do to improve the condition regular basis. Their service reservation website is convenient keeping record.

resp.text: Hey there, thanks for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again at Jim Burke Hyundai.

name: Michelle Patterson
text: They listen and I just love their service

name: Sharon Burtnett
text:
My Husband and I bought our first Hyundai (Sonata) at Jim Burke in 2010. We are still enjoying this car and the sales experience was GREAT and we recommended them to friends and family.

In 2017 we bought a new Accent. Again everything was Great and we shared this experience as well.We returned  in 2018 ams bought an Elantra. The Elantra recently broke
down.  Out of warranty of course. We had it towed to Jim Burke  and we received a call that my car needed  an engine. The cost of $7500.00.I thought since we bought 3 new cars that maybe we could get a deal on this service.INSTEAD we were told there was a $150.00 for checking the car out. This was not diacussed when we called and dropped the car off. Nothing like being kicked while you are down. I did some research and found there have been problems with the Engines in the ElantrI am verys sossapointes with the company I thought was so HRgreat and can no longer recxpmend the company and I will also tell anyone that will losten about thisbjorrivlw expeI qill tell anyone who qill liisten about this horrible experience!

My typing is not so grear because of broken hand and arm.

resp.text: While we are thankful for your feedback, we would like to learn more about why your experience was not an exceptional one. Reach out to us at (205) 324-3371 to let us know how we can improve for your next visit.

name: Tre Zimmerman
text: Go see Brandon Montgomery! He will get you right with what you need! Thank you sir!

resp.text: Hey there, Tre, thanks for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again at Jim Burke Hyundai.

name: Jasmine Densmore
text: I recently had to replace my windshield and I am so please with the service at Jim Burke. The technician did excellent work and also changed my oil without me even asking. The service at this location is always great and I'll remain a loyal customer.

resp.text: Hello Jasmine and thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you have nothing but amazing things to say about our team at Jim Burke Hyundai and what we offer.

name: Robert Cato
text: great friendly service!! Jordan smith and Toni vines both worked with me through 3 visits. They both took time and patience working with me and getting me the best deal for what I had to offer.. I highly recommend both of these salesmen if you go to Jim Burke used car lot in north Birmingham. I was also checked up on and greeted by several other employees through out the visits. Overall great experience!!

name: Mary Ricks
text: Erica Holmes and Tanya Shelby made my experience at Jim Burke Hyundai best ever in my life. This was my first new car and my experience was overwhelme by the love and kindness and hard work that Shelby and Holmes put in to make it happen.

resp.text: Mary, Thank you so much for your review of Jim Burke Hyundai! We truly appreciate the feedback and hope to hear from you again.

name: Kleindienst Adams
text: Erica Holmes and the entire Jim Burke car purchasing experience was outstanding.  I will definitely be back

resp.text: Hey Kleindienst, thanks for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again at Jim Burke Hyundai.

name: Janita Armstrong
text: Always get things in writing with Jim Burke..turnover rate is ridiculous. You never know who you are speaking with. Sales person and manager who made "Promises of detailing my vehicle when purchased and reimbursement to the hyundai customer who recommended me, were all lies..when I called to follow up there were no longer there. The new manager had no clue and lied to me as well. I called to follow up..he was no longer there. Poor service, inaccurate quotes, and nothing but lip service given (telling me what they thought I needed to hear).

resp.text: Thank you, Janita, for taking the time to voice your concerns. Please reach out to us at (877) 796-4559 to further discuss your concerns. Thank you and we hope to hear from you promptly.

name: Hilda Henderson
text: Our experience with Jim Burke Hyundai was a very positive and pleasant one. Our sales representative, Larry Greenhill, went above and beyond to make sure we were satisfied with our purchase. His efforts were not in vain. I am very pleased with my 2020 Tucson Sport.

name: Frankie Washington
text: The whole team was wonderful but special mention for my salesman Antonio Gillespie and the Finance manager Melvin. Speedy and professional service with a smile and no games. Everyone was so friendly!! Got a wonderful deal and reasonable monthly payments!!! I recommend them highly!!!

name: Sandy Stern
text: Time expected to be finished was what they told me. Unfortunately,they could not complete all the repairs today. I really think that they needed to wait until they could repair all things at the same time.

name: PATRICK HASSELL
text: Good people GREAT product!

resp.text:
Patrick,
Thank you for reviewing your service experience! We aim to provide time-efficient and exceptional service for our guests, and we are proud that this was received during your time spent with us.

name: Essie Johnson
text: I can honestly say my experience was great! My salesman, Dennis Johnson was absolutely AMAZING! He is very knowledgeable, courteous,  attentive, patient, honest. If you are looking for a car without all the hassle, Jim Burke Hyundai is where you want go. The staff is great.  Great deals, great cars, great people!  They really care!  I am a customer for life!

name: Alexus Carter
text: I had a great experience at this dealership, everyone was really friendly and willing to help. The best thing was I drove away in a new car! Big thanks to everyone who helped! I definitely recommend!

name: Paul Berman
text: Jordan Cook continuously goes out of his way to ensure that my service visits are done quickly, in the most cost efficient manner.   Servicing my car can be a challenge as I am currently traveling outside of AL weeks at a time.  Whenever its time for the vehicle's next servicing, help is only a p[hone call away.  Jordan demonstrates unwavering attention to details and customer service, which is why I bring my 2016 Hyundai Sonata Sport to Jordan in Birmingham versus having it serviced in Atlanta or other possible locations.  Why?  Because in my opinion, he cares about his customers and their satisfaction with Jim Burke's service and his own professional service as well.  Thank you Jordan for all you do!

name: Angela Brown
text: I purchased a new Sonata and everyone at Jim Burke was so helpful & nice. My salesperson Alexis was so knowledgeably and was not pushy at all. The General Manager Tanya worked really hard on getting me approved for the vehicle and was very detailed and explained everything to me and kept me informed through the whole process

name: josette rice
text: Always outstanding service!  Jordan and everyone on the service  team is always very helpful and believe in making sure you're a satisfied customer!

resp.text: Thank you, Josette for this wonderful review of Jim Burke Hyundai. Jordan and the rest of our fantastic team here pride themselves on making every visit with an exceptional one. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Have a nice day!

name: Melissa Mynatt
text: The service center was excellent. From the time i got there until I had left the customer service was one of the best i had visited to date.  The only complaint i had was grease was left on my driver seat and on the driver door liner.  I wished the mechanic had paid as much attention as the service center or possibly protected the seat.

name: Bryanna McClain
text: The associates at Jim Burke Hyundai all were welcoming and kind. In particular I would like to acknowledge my dealer Andrew Briggins who made sure I was comfortable and that I got what I wanted. He was very thorough and very knowledgeable about the inventory at hand and unknowingly persuasive when introducing me to the 2020 Hyundai Sonata SEL. I absolutely love my car and I am proud of my choice. Thank you Andrew and Jim Burke Hyundai for my sweet sweet ride!

name: Susan Crow
text: I have had a great experience with Eddie Hicks as my service advisor.  I always feel like I am being dealt with honestly.

resp.text: Susan, we are glad to hear you had a positive experience working with Eddie.  Our team prides themself on providing an honest and easy approach to helping our customers with all of their automotive needs.

name: Bama Born & Bred
text: I went to Jim Burke Hyundai recently and received excellent service. The service technician was very nice and polite. He advised me of a recall that was on my car and explained what it was for and how they would fix it.  I got three services for my car(which included the recall) and was out in 1 hour. I didn’t even have an appointment!!! The customer waiting area was comfortable and check out was easy and quick.  I would highly recommend the service department to anyone needing great work on their automobile and good customer service.

name: Jon Tanja
text: I was satisfied

name: Ayesha Aj
text: Jessie was the best car salesman I have ever encountered. Adrienne was not my salesperson but she was very hospitable, friendly and thorough! I would definitely recommend either of them to anyone needing a vehicle !!

name: Tae Alexander
text: Purchased a 2020 Hyundai Santa Fe’ through Brandon Blagg. He was excellent from the beginning to the end. He made the process easy. He explained and demonstrated things to us in a way that most others might have not. Although the sale was important, to him he showed just as much concern about driving away in something that we wouldn’t regret. The atmosphere was nice and welcoming. Not boring at all. The staff was friendly too.  In the end Brandon wouldn’t stop until the last tire received its shine. Thanks a bunch!

name: Monica Leach
text: I am enjoying my little gas saver.

resp.text: Monica, we hope we can turn these 3 stars into 5. We want to hear from you—please give us a call when you can at (877) 796-4559. Thanks!

name: Brittany Card
text: Took my car in for a check engine light that was on for a month. The light was off by the time I took it in of course but Jim Burke found the problem and fixed it. Location is so close and convenient to my job so made it easy to drop off and pick up. Will definitely be going to them again for any service for my car! They were fantastic!

name: Dayatra Laster
text: Service writer recommended I get a transmission flush on 2/17/20. I had a transmission flush done on 1/27/20. Same auto shop same service writer.

name: Jillian Carter
text: I had a really awesome experience at Jim Burke Hyundai. I was referred by a close friend of the family to go in visit Alexis and Tanya. These ladies lets my family and I  know that they had our best interest at heart.The service was quick and smooth. I truly thank Jim Burke and staff for our 2019 Elantra Value.

name: Alexis Morton
text:
I had a very wonderful experience at the  Hyundai service department.  Eddie Hicks, the service representative was very knowledgeable and helpful during my visit. Questions were answered without hesitation and he didn’t try to rush me off. Eddie was also helpful getting me an Uber to my friends house . After getting to my friends house and getting a bite to eat my car was ready to be picked up. Fast service. Thanks again for taking care of my car. I will be back for an oil change in a few months.
Alexis Morton

name: Beth Cooper
text: The staff were wonderful and extremely professional.  They updated me when needed, took time to explain the automotive issue and the repair used to update the vehicle. Another impressive detail I noted was the multiple transporters who checked to see if the customers had a need for transportation.  I’ve been highly impressed by the service provided and I will definitely return .

name: LUIS FELIPE ORTIZ ALMODOVAR
text: My experience from the start was very respectful treatment from all the team at Jim Burke specially from Clearance thanks to all you guys and for the cups of coffee during the deal thanks to be so kind with me even when my English it was not perfect you deal with and gave me a good attention to all my request God Bless You All Guys and thank you Kendra for your help and beautiful Smile all the time

name: Andrew Gordineer
text: Even though I didn't get my car there, they were very accommodating.

resp.text: Andrew, We're grateful to know that your experience with us was an amazing one! We look forward to seeing you again soon at Jim Burke Hyundai.

name: Holly Davis
text: Completely satisfied!  I would 100% buy another car from Jim Burke.  Their selection is great and the Sales and Finance teams were excellent to work with.  They were understanding and able to work with our situation and got us exactly what we wanted.

name: Berdell White
text: I was very pleased with the service that I received from everyone at Jim Burke's All my questions were answered promptly!  I'm enjoying my new 2020 Hyundai Palisade! I love it!

name: Peter Newman
text: Good workmanship but the place is rather crowded and hectic.  They need more space and the ability to put fine touches like cleaning to a job after completion considering the quotes are a bit pricey.

name: Sandra D Kindell
text:
The service associates are always professional and courteous.  They advise on service needed to your car, giving details of the service and the expected cost. The cost factor is important, because  quite frankly, money doesn't grow on trees.  They  also give you an estimation on the length of time involved in completing the setvice.  Most of them remember you if you have had repeat business with Jim Burke.

The cashier at the Hyundai service area is always very friendly and helpful.  She is an asset to the department.

name: mycal garrett
text: I just purchased a car from Hyundai and i had the best experience I've had in a long time. My sales rep was Ashley and she is a very polite and respectful salesman. She helped me with everything that i needed and then some. Very knowledgeable about the product and very informative as well. Probably one of the best sales reps I've had the pleasure of dealing with. If you are interested in buying a Hyundai from Jim Burke. Ask for Ashley she wont disappoint.

name: Sherry Lacey
text: Chris Thomas and the finance manager were great! I know God sent them to me. They are the best! Thank you!

name: Steven Gross
text: My experience with Jim Burke Body Shop was a pleasant one - from the initial phone call, through the claim/repair process, and finally to pick-up. At the front desk, Ashley handled my reception with the utmost courtesy and customer service. Josh, the assistant manager was equally professional and the one who handled my claim and kept me up to date on the status and dealt with the insurance company on my behalf. Finally, on pick-up, I found my car waiting for me, freshly cleaned - inside and out. The body shop is a Hyundai preferred repair center and I would recommend them to my fellow Hyundai drivers.

name: Myra Reed
text: I was thrilled with the short wait time. I always ask for Eddie and once again he provided superior customer service. As an example, it was raining and he pulled my car inside so I wouldn’t get wet when leaving. Super great guy!!

name: Bobbie Cagle
text: Always quick and on time.  Always friendly and helpful!

name: dorothy thomas
text: Jim Burke Hyundai is a great place to get a car Tony take his n da rest of the team to I love I would have them ten stars

name: JOEL BUCKLEY
text: Very courteous service writers. Quick turn around on repairs. Mechanics are great! Wouldn’t take my Hyundai anywhere else!

name: sandra richard
text:
Eddie Hicks is very nice and very up to date on the details of our Hyundai. Has been very helpful during recalls.
Also pleasant and friendly when car needs serviced.

name: S G
text: Great customer service. Excellent and fast service. Would recommend to everyone. They made us feel extremely confortable. The waiting room and restrooms were in excellent condition. Awesome awesome awesome job guys.

name: luvsnow83
text: I had an awesome experience and appreciate the whole team! Thanks a lot everyone ❤️

name: Vicki Colburn
text: Me and my husband purchased a 2019 Hyundai Kona a few weeks ago and we are very pleased with the help of our salesman Dennis Johnson, and all the staff they really went above and beyond just a salesperson.. we won’t go anywhere else when we get ready to buy again we will definitely be back

name: Charles Chancellor
text: I have been doing business with this dealership for over twenty five years. The Hyundai dealership at Jim Burke is the best when it comes to respect, courtesy  and understanding the customers need and successfully meeting them. Great people and great to do business with.

name: BLAMS 4Life
text: A professional and thorough experience.   They worked wonderfully with my insurance company and repaired my car back to like new status.  Great job

name: christopher kendrick
text: It’s was fast and easy and that’s not something I’m use to with car buying. The sales rep Kera took her time to make sure I was not just getting a car I liked but also a car i could truly afford. Jim Burke has earned me as a forever customer!

name: Bella Divine
text: I am always impressed with this dealership. The quality of service is unmatched by other shops or dealers. They are always friendly, professional and they value my time. I would happily recommend them to anyone.

name: Ally Trigg
text: Love their innovative interface with texting and choosing what is and is not done as well as status of your vehicle. Amazing communication.

name: Miranda Cantlow
text: I like to say that everyone at Jim Burke Hyundai was so caring and helpful I would recommend friends and family to come and purchased a car. And my sales person Brandon Blagg was so helpful to me and explained all the details. Everyone was so nice. Thanks so much. Mrs. Miranda Cantlow

name: Patricia Carden
text: Eddie was very helpful. Explained all work that was done and work that needs to be done.  He was friendly and courteous. Will definitely recommend him and Jim Burke.

name: Andrea Thames
text: The service guys are always to attentive and personable!  They are always so nice!!!

name: sylviash2
text: Jim Burke is by far the best Hyundai dealer in Birmingham  they found problems that the other dealers could not find. One thing I was a little disappointed in though was not detecting a massive hole in my air intake on the first visit, which seems like it should have been easily detected it was only discovered when I brought the car back the next day because it still wasn’t running right  but they went out of their way to helpful our service writer Eddie Hicks was a class act and seemed like he genuinely cared

name: Miranda Cantlow
text: I like to say that everyone at Jim Burke Hyundai was so caring and helpful I would recommend friends and family to come and purchased a car. And my sales person Brandon Blagg was so helpful to me and explained all the details. Everyone was so nice. Thanks so much. Mrs. Miranda Cantlow

name: Andrea Thames
text: The service guys are always to attentive and personable!  They are always so nice!!!

name: Karen Hanson
text: My service representative is very friendly and helpful. The work on my car was done quickly. They are good about getting me in and out in a timely manner. I wish the location was closer to me but I like this service department.

name: Connie McCreless
text: Had a really good experience.  My sales rep Brian Christopher was very helpful without being pushy.  He listened to what I wanted and did everything to make sure I was satisfied.  The entire experience was very pleasant.  After the sale was completed he sat in the car with me to go over everything and told me if I had any questions to give him a call and he would be more than happy to help.  By the time I left I thought of him as a friend and not just a sales rep.  I was very impressed with the lease experience.  Had never done this before but it was not at all scary or stressful.  I have always had a high opinion of the dealership and this has confirmed my opinion.  Love the car and expect to be doing business with this rep and dealership for a long time.

name: adam jaffe
text: Brian Christopher is absolutely fantastic to deal with.  His outstanding attitude and extensive knowledge of the vehicles makes every car buying experience a great one.  Brian goes above and beyond making every buyer feel comfortable and at ease with their purchase from Jim Burke.   Brian always returns calls in a prompt manner and no question is too small to answer.  Once again thank you Brian I love my purchases.

name: Paula Johnson
text: It's always a pleasure to go to Jim Burke service center. My advisor Jordon is like family. I know everyone there. We always enjoy seeing each other. I will continue to take my Hyundai to my favorite place!

name: mark Myszka
text: Jim Burke makes car buying easy. I told them which car I wanted. They showed me the options available and I made my choice. I wanted a red one they didn't have it in stock so they went and got it for me. Financing was a snap with their help. This was the second car I purchased at Jim Burke and next time I need a car I will go back.

name: Patricia Carden
text: Eddie was very helpful. Explained all work that was done and work that needs to be done.  He was friendly and courteous. Will definitely recommend him and Jim Burke.

name: Patricia Russo
text: We were on the way to Louisville, Ky. from New Orleans. We got off the interstate in Birmingham to fuel up.  By the way, we went 360 miles on one tank of gas in my Tucson. Anyway, riding around looking for a station, a huge piece of metal pierced my right rear tire. No way we could ride all the rest of the way on the spare. I knew I wanted a Hyundai dealer to replace the tire.We found a gas station, then found this dealer right around the corner! The service department was incredibly nice and squeezed us into their busy day.  We were back on the road in no time! Thankyou, Thankyou, Thankyou, Jim Burke Hyundai! I love my local Hyundai dealer (shout out to Hyundai of Metairie!) but this one is fabulous too!!!

name: Suzanne Helmick
text: Once again I am extremely pleased with the service provided by Jim Burke Hyundai.  The service rep, AJ, explains just exactly what they will say do.  Love having my Tucson serviced here.

name: Taylor Woods
text: Great experience all around. From the sales dept to the service dept, Jim Burke’s staff provided top notch  customer service and honesty I’ve never found in a car buying experience before. Thank you guys!

name: adam jaffe
text: Brian Christopher is absolutely fantastic to deal with.  His outstanding attitude and extensive knowledge of the vehicles makes every car buying experience a great one.  Brian goes above and beyond making every buyer feel comfortable and at ease with their purchase from Jim Burke.   Brian always returns calls in a prompt manner and no question is too small to answer.  Once again thank you Brian I love my purchases.

name: mark Myszka

name: Tebriel Alexander
text:
I went to test drive a Hyundai Santa Fe'  two days ago. This is not my first Hyundai since reinventing itself and blowing our minds. Needless to say I purchased what is now my 5th Hyundai.  However, i'm here to brag on the man who walked my husband and I through this entire process in this humid Alabama weather.  Initially, I came in to take advantage of the $50 GIFT CARD that Hyundai was offering for simply test driving its vehicles, but I also knew that I would potentially be driving off the lot with something new as well. Brandon Blagg was awesome from the gate. He stood and walked over to me, invited me to his desk, and inquired concerning my business. A few questions later, a copy of my license, and "BAM" we were test driving a base model Santa Fe.' One would think that this guy designed these vehicle with his level of knowledge concerning them. Recalling that I have own several vehicles in my lifetime, it is feasible to understand that we have dealt with our share of sales consultants. This is by far the first person who not only informed us of what we would potentially enjoy about the vehicle, but patiently explained in detail its benefits, and demonstrated  to us its functionality. He took a base model vehicle and literally painted a picture that lifted it beyond it's level. He hung out with us for over an hour doing comparisons and contrasts. He was honest concerning pro and cons, but never negative.. not one time. For him every vehicle had its benefits, and for every person there was vehicle that fit them. THIS IS WHAT HE DID! He didn't interfere with our choice, but he made sure that we would be satisfied once we left  the lot for good. In the end we ended up purchasing a Santa Fe' SEL 2.4 engine with both the Convenience and Premium Package. He didn't use a hustler tactic to cause us to go for a higher grade, it was simply his transparency and patience that ultimately led to our selection. Recalling that this was in 90 + degree weather, this man didn't stop until the tires shined.  He made me laugh, shared stories, explained who was whom of the CEO vs. COO, and also wasn't shy around me whatsoever. He even blew bubble gum bubbles for our delightful 6 year old who stood amazed at the excellence his gum blowing abilities. Brandon Blagg, job well done. You deserve all that's coming for your hard work and dedication to service. Aside from our direct experience with Brandon, everyone rocked. Their pleasantness was superb, two of the women conversed with me, they offered treats to my babies, and others smiled and waved. There wasn't a rude attitude in the building. The lobby and bathrooms are well designed and clean. As lengthly a process that car buying could be, they have enough going for themselves to make you relax and enjoy your time.

Thanks Again, Tae A.

name: Agee Richardson
text: I can't say enough about the awesome staff in the Jim Burke Hyundai Service Department. Rusty, the Hyundai Service Department manager, has been very attentive to my automotive needs. When there was a way to hold the manufacturer's accountable for repairs associated with their recall, this service manager had no problem going to bat for me. Although my first impression of this establishment was not a good one due to lack of communication, my final impression is the one that REALLY COUNTS! I feel so blessed that these were the guys: Rusty, Eddie and Justin that tended to my 2013 Hyundai Sonata and me when my car just STOPPED RUNNING on the interstate. It took about a month to get my car fixed right, but they have stuck it out. I am proud to say that my blue-silver streak and I are on the road again tearing up the highway!!! Adrienne Richardson from Birmingham is your #1 Fan!!!

text: Overall experience was good, we had hit something unseen on I-65 N and blew out a front passenger tire. My car has high performance tires and not common sizes and front and rear are different sizes,  The dealership was able to locate the appropriate sized tires.  When I returned to pick up the car I was surprised by being told that they had done a oil change on the car.. claimed it was due... I have used a specific full synthetic oil in this car since it has 1200 miles on it and now the bill from the dealership was not clear as to what oil is in the engine..  By factory requirements.. it had  abt 1800 more miles before it needed to be changed. IF they would have asked me - they had my cell phone - and they had the oil that I use.. I would have been glad to authorize the oil change.

name: Bernice Bunkley
text: I went in for a oil change . I have a 2016 a Hyundai genesis. We were told we could get free oil change,but because  I didn't want to get the 45000 mile service done I was told I will have to pay  for my oil change. I told the guy that I  have had my oil change for free without the service done before.  He said  than pull all the time I came in ,on the 24000 mile I didn't get service but free oil change. He said  I didn't  need service at that time. All I went to go to the waiting room. He stop me and told me I had to go to the other side that was for Hyundai customers.  The last time I was there I went to the side he said was for Subaru customers only. While  waiting in t by e waiting room for Hyundai customers and customer ask this lady what kind of car she has, she said a Subaru.  He ask me to give him a 5 rating.  No you get a 2 rating from me.

name: Jackson Pike
text: We traded in our vehicle about a week ago and purchased a certified Sonata. Not to say we were screwed over, but the entire experience felt shady. The salesman knew nothing about the car itself other than the price and the carfax. During the test drive we asked about features and got shrugs. This place also takes its sweet time to process a sale. We arrived at 10 that morning and didn't leave until nearly 5 in the afternoon. Expect a whole day ordeal. Also, make sure you know what your car is worth to the dime before attempting to trade. They will not give you anywhere near what your car is worth.

name: Debbie Brazeal
text: Always courteous and helpful. They did not find cause of car noise. Started making it again after I left. Will bring it back when noise starts back

I am not satisfied with the level of service on my last visit. I was promised free wiper blades for life with the purchase of my car. You may recall that it has been a rainy year. The service advisor said he would have the windshield cleaned which does not solve the problem and then, the cleaning was not done. Miles driven is not a reliable indicator of wiper wear.

Also, 2 1/2 hours for an oil change is excessive.

name: Keven Akings
text:
I've purchased several cars and this experience by far stands out as one of the worst.......from beginning to end. I test drove the vehicle on a Monday and pointed out a few cosmetic issues that I feel should have been addressed prior to placing the car up for sale (only a few hundred dollars to correct).  That combined with the manager coming outside to talk to me smoking a cigarette, should have clued me in to the professionalism and pride taken at the dealership.
I was asked that if the problems I pointed out were corrected,  would I purchase the car? I agreed.  The following day I recieved the bill of sale and I noticed that the price shown on the internet was not the price shown on the bill of sale. When I asked the manager, the explanation I recieved was that the car was headed to auction the day I saw it and the price on the internet was the auction price, not the sale price (what does that have to do with me? And the price I came intending to pay is the price that I saw advertised ).  I was then told that they would sell it to me at the internet price but I would have to pay for the repairs which would be $400+.  Since the price was still under book value,  I agreed.  I was then told that the car would be repaired, HAND WAXED and ready for me in a couple days.  I was informed Friday that the car was ready. I drove up Saturday only to find the car just as dirty as it was when I test drove it on Monday(they sprayed the dirt off but there was still hair and dirt on the inside of the car.... wheel wells were dirty, etc). Of all the cars I've bought,  no one has ever tried to delivered me a dirty car! I discussed this with the manager who appeared to care nothing about it.  I left with no intention of buying the car,  but the salesman,
Mr. Willie, called and said that he would take care of it...... he took it to a local shop and had it washed and vacuumed.  As a customer, when money is spent, whether it be $30 or $30,000, you want to feel good about spending it. That's not the feeling I left with.  In the end, I purchased what I feel is a great vehicle.   But the service is what will definitely keep me from being a repeat customer or recommending to anyone else.  Professionalism and putting the customer first is definitely lacking and needs a lot of improvement.

name: Jo Jones
text: I am completely dissatisfied with Jim Burke Suburu and will not ever bring my car there again, even if I have to drive outside Alabama. I took the car in for four recalls.  When I picked up the car the car three lights came on, the car wasn't running smoothly, and I called the technician. He said "nothing they did could have caused this."  Also he told me the diagnostic test -which I didn't want or ask for - indicated the car needed a timing belt,AC etc lot of work that's is needed at a 100,000 miles.  I told him this was already done.  I took my car to my usual mechanic who cleaned the throttle so that the new ECM would read it properly.  Your guys should have known this and should not have returned the car to me in the condition they did.  Also,the right passenger airbag light hasn't been reset.  It's still showing an error. I just hope they really replaced the defective airbag

text: I bought a 2012 Volkswagen Passat with 85,912 miles on it. This was the worst car buying experience ever. My original salesman was nice but knew nothing about a car at all. My battery had a dead cell when I first purchased it. I took it back for the battery to be replace and it took four hours to get a new battery. I asked them to take me to the service center to find out what was taking so long and the guy that work in the front said my battery has been there for two hours. And the guys that were supposed to be working were playing and joking around the next time I needed work done was three days later I noticed the bumper on the car was popped out of place, the 12 volt adapters didn't work, the service light had come on, the key tumbler was messed up in the ignition. I went to try and get that fixed and they told me it would be two days well I asked if they would give me a replacement car to get back and forth to work they told me no they don't do that. Ok so I paid for the work myself. A few days later I discovered my account was overdrawn 500 dollars and when I ask the finance manager why my account was charged and I paid 1000  in cash his response was well we wanted 1500 for the car and u couldn't do that. So they took it upon themselves to take the other 500 dollars. Now after they agreed to give my money back.  I waited a week and called and he said I could pick it up across the street so I went across the street from them and the guy over there didn't know what I was talking about so he called Cleveland Moore the guy I've been having problems with to asked him where I needed to go Cleveland didn't know that he was on speaker phone and said " she so damn stupid" he really called me stupid and then when I informed him he was on speaker phone he said so. Meaning he didn't care. So I feel disrespected and I was so upset I called a manager who said it will be handled and I will be waiting to find out the results of this because if they are not satisfactory I would like to speak with the owner myself. name: Anne Murray
text:
I was treated very politely, the salesman even picked me up at my home, because my car had caught on fire and I had nothing to drive.BUT the car I was supposed to look at was no longer available. They did not tell me it had sold when I called that same morning to verify my appt. & it's still on the internet as "Available" the following day. Further more 5 days later, it's still listed on the internet as available. So NOW I'm positive it's to lure customers in. If someone is awaiting approval for financing on this vehicle, the very least Jim Burke Hyundai should do is post a flag on the car saying; "Sold Pending Approval of Financing". In my opinion, that would be " Professional Business Protocol".

I'm of the opinion that they might possibly do this to get customers to come in when it looks like a certified car is lower priced then average.

I believe they tried to do a "bait & switch" maneuver on me by showing me a same priced vehicle that was the same color but a different make and model.

The sales mgr. also told me he would find me a Pre-certified car in the same price range that same day, however he never followed through or even had the professionalism to call me back one way or the other. I called him later that afternoon, I didn't want the other car I looked at, at another dealership to get sold, & asked if he could call me back by 6pm  to tell me if he had found another car so I could make a decision. He never called.

Bottom line... before you make the trip to see a specific car, make absolutely sure it's still for sale.

name: Traci Miller
text: DO NOT PURCHASE A USED CAR FROM THIS DEALERSHIP. And if you do, please, make sure you ask them to print and show you any TSB's (Technical Service Bulletin) on the vehicle you are considering. A TSB is not like a safety recall and therefore the dealership is not required to make the repair. Make them prove to you that they have repaired all of the items on each and every TSB. However, I can almost promise you that they will not make the repairs before selling you the vehicle. I purchased a used 2007 Hyundai Entourage van from Jim Burke Hyundai's used car dealership in March this year after having purchased a new Elantra from them last year. I did not make them show me the TSB's because I wasn't aware of them at the time. Unfortunately there are several of them on the van I purchased. One of them had to do with a part that causes called the "Junction Box Switch" or Instrument Panel Module that causes the battery to discharge. That means when you go out to your car it simply won't start!! I found the TSB on it and it says in large print that it was issued to all Hyundai General Managers and that the repair should be made before retail sale of the van. Many of us believe that purchasing a used car from what you think is a reputable dealership will protect you from these type issues. Well...this dealership is not reputable and should be put out of business. I have contacted them to give them a change to try and make this right to keep customers happy and try to get return business but they obviously are not intersted in this. I will be taking further action regarding this issue.

text: # 1 we made an agreement about Lucy up vehicle and leaving a check in the drop box which I have done before when I get there Saturday the had my vehicle locked inside the building saying I had a outstanding when service manager investigated the claim had never been filed with my insurance company my question is if I had a outstanding balance while did you do the repair I have been a customer  since 2011 never had a return check yet you a10.000 vehicle up for a 415,00 bill tried to talk to the manager he got really nasty told me not to ever come back on his property and followed me outside and continued to disrespect me in the present of my wife and after I left he called the police I saw the chief of police and he agreed the manager was wrong I have already contacted my lawyer and we definitely will be suing DOS Chevrolet 😡😡😡

The dealership owner even stopped into Evelyn's office to personally thanks us for our business. We will definitely recommend Doc's dealership to any of our friends looking for a great buying experience.

name: Lisa Roberts
text: I just purchased a new 2019 Volvo XC90 after a great experience of 131,000+ miles on my previous 2013 Volvo XC90 which I traded  at Royal. My salesman was Richard, and he and John, the manager, were delightful and very helpful. Richard highlighted the many features of the car and did not pressure me to buy the car which I appreciated. He was friendly, informative, and he and John answered my questions.The Service Dept. added a trailer hitch to my car after the purchase and had my loaner car ready with no wait. I do not hesitate in giving Royal Volvo a 5 star rating and will certainly recommend purchasing a Volvo from Richard and John to others.

text: These employees will try to rip you off and upcharge you every chance they get!! This is no reflection on volvo the company, just this dealership location! Told me it was going to cost $700 to fix a part in my door that in reality cost $48!!!!!!! Horrible service! DO NOT RECOMMEND!

name: Pruthvi Raj
text: Service was good...spent around 4000$ got everything fixed ..great service.Later I recieve an email which says get a test drive and earn 75$ Amazon gift card.Went for a test drive got my GC.I recieved an email again as there was a new model launched as my love for volvo never ends I did go n try but they say the GC was already redeemed.Manager says we can redeem it just once.Hw is it even possible when previous email and current email shows 2 different GC codes.Really disappointed.

text: Allen helped me get the best deal possible.

name: Johnathon Burton
text: We bought our very first Volvo from Royal and we are hooked on both.  Great people with great vehicles.

name: Timothy Richey
text: Service department changed my partner $800+ to wrap some electrical tape around a wire harness and plug in a sensor. They will take advantage of you, go elsewhere with mechanical issues.

resp.text:
Timothy,
We're sorry to see that you and your partner were dissatisfied with the expense of your service. Our customers' safety and satisfaction are our number one priorities, and we never want anyone to drive away feeling that they've been treated like anything less than Royalty. After reviewing your maintenance records, we maintain that the costs associated with your repairs were fair and commensurate with the market price of the parts and labor necessary to execute them. As factory-certified professionals, we would never intentionally misrepresent the value of the parts required to get your vehicle back on the road, nor the value of the time it takes to get the job done right the first time. In the case of your vehicle, the ignition coils, spark plug kit, reinsulation, and other accompanying expenses represented a significant value of our technicians' time and part resources–all consistent with the final costs presented to you. We'd be grateful for the opportunity to talk further with you, come to an understanding, and hopefully make things right. Feel free to contact our service department by phone at (877) 712-9073 or reach us via email at https://www.royalautomotive.net/ContactUsForm

name: John Thompson
text: Looking forward to the new building.

name: William Moulin
text: Best place to buy a vehicle!

name: BK Sensei
text: Went there March 16, 2021 just a few hours before the tornado that hit the area close by. These guys went above and beyond that day. That took care of my vehicle and the others in the shop even close to the time of the tornado passing. They made sure everyone there was safe and took us to the safest center room they had. I have a strong and hardy work ethic and even I wouldn't have asked these guys to work in the garage at the time they did. I have nothing but good regards for each and every person working there that day. I can't complement them enough. Definitely deserved a sixth star that day. Make sure you keep this place in mind when you need something taken care of.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are so grateful for your kind words and for your support. Thank you for choosing us!

name: Kevin Jones
text:
Greystone Tire and Automotive recently performed my son's 120k Service for a 2014 Camry SE. The car performs better than it did when we purchased the car with 70k miles on the odometer. The car "now" idles quietly which is uncommon for most four cylinder engines in my opinion.
The car drives like it's new. The difference after the 100k service and tune-up is appreciable.

resp.text: Kevin, thank you for your review! We were glad to help your son out with his 120k service on his 2014 Camry SE. We look forward to seeing you family next time!

text: I was over on 280 for a massage when I noticed my van picked up a nail on the right passenger side. Thank you for being so kind, fast, and for having much compassion!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Ashley! We take pride in providing automotive solutions for our customers in an efficient and friendly manner and we're glad we could help with your van's tire. We appreciate your kind words and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

resp.text: We're so grateful for your support as well as your loyalty over the years to our shop in Birmingham, Alex! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Kimberley Phillips
text: The power steering went out on my car.  They ordered a hose and it came in later than expected; however, these guys went above and beyond to have my car ready when they promised.  When and if I ever need work done on my car, these guys are the ones I'm using.

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review, Kimberley! We're glad that we were able to take care of your vehicle's power steering and earn your trust in our shop. We appreciate your kind words and we're looking forward to having you back!

text: Excellent service.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and for supporting our auto repair shop!

name: Pierce Brunner
text: Needed new tires on a tight schedule. They had it turned around in less then a day. They have a great a staff and great prices.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Pierce! We're glad that we could help you out with a new set of tires at great prices. We appreciate your kind words and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

text: Good work and good price. Just not crazy about sitting in your waiting room so long - without any magazines geared for women. :-)

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Judy! We're glad that we were able to deliver quality auto services at fair prices. We appreciate your feedback and will work on getting new magazines. Let us know if there's any other auto services that we can do for you!

name: Jared King
text: Had a great experience with the staff. Called in AM and they told me to come by around 2pm for an alignment. They were able to have my taken care of in about 25 minutes. One of two shops in town that I would go to if I had any mechanical issues.

resp.text: Thanks, Jared! Your experience means everything to us. We're glad you chose us to do your alignment and we appreciate your loyalty! We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

text: Very efficient as well as professional. Staff that knew what they were doing without taking advantage of you. Great place!!

name: Kristeena Thomas
text: We started using them for our company vehicles' routine maintenance. Easy to deal with, reasonable prices, and they actually do company accounts that way we don't have to call them with a company card every time we need service. HIGHLY recommend using them!

resp.text: Thanks, Kristeena! We appreciate your business and are always happy to service your company's vehicles. We appreciate the kind words! See you next time!

name: Dennis Wilson
text: Good service, competitively priced, friendly staff. I have been using Greystone Tire & Auto for several years and have always had a good experience.

text: Great turn around time on the work I had done to my automobile, very professional and customer service is second to none. I will be using Greystone Tire & Auto from here on out.

text: Great family owned business always do a great job on my cars !

text: Awesome place , clean , excellent service . friends of ours , highly recommend .

text: Had a low pressure light come on.   Called them and they told me to come on over.   They checked the tire and found a nail, plugged it and I was on my way !!   Very professional and all done in about 15 minutes !!   Highly recommended !!

text: Great people, great service!  Thanks for helping our four car family keep rolling!

name: Billy Brown
text: Great service. Helpful, quick and fair. Will definitely continue taking my vehicles to them.

name: Westley Said
text: What I found most surprising was everyone hospitality. Great people and did not try to sell me something I did not need. They are fast and accurate at what they do and this is now my go to place. Definitely a thumbs up from me!

text: They are very professional and have great prices on your car needs. Napa auto parts is connected to the store as well which is a plus.

text: Great service! They will tell you what repairs need to be done and which ones can wait. I will recommend G.A. To my friends.

name: Dave Bechtel
text: Great Job. Excellence is the norm for their work

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review, Dave! We're glad that you had a great experience at our shop and that we were able to deliver excellent services. We hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Dominik Herrmann
text:
Great place and knowledgeable, friendly staff offering services at a reasonable price. Especially with CostCo discount. Only complaint is when I went to get my A/C checked out they only told me what I already knew. It's stuck on defrost. Repairing it would require taking the dash out. Well that's an easy 500$.
However, they did not notice the ripped vacuum-tube that connects to the driving cabin, which could be fixed from the engine compartment. Had to fix it myself after I noticed the problem. Could have done a better job on that. Otherwise great job.

name: Dylan Minor
text: Honest automotive shop that will take care of you fast and easy.

resp.text: Dylan, we're very grateful that you chose our shop in Birmingham for your automotive needs and we're glad to hear you found the service exceptional and prompt; that's our goal each time! Please let us know if there's anything else we can do for you!

name: Edward Zwilling
text: Recommended by AAA when my car overheated.  Honest folks.  Certainly had the opportunity to take advantage of me.  They did not.  Just added coolant and replaced a leaky hose.  Good folks.  I will use them again.

name: Sandra Cross
text: I had to have my radiator and battery replaced in my car and it was ready over the weekend. Everyone is very kind and honest here- pricing was also very competitive compared to others that I received a quote from. These are some go-to people if you have any car troubles!!

resp.text: Sandra, thanks so much for reviewing us! We appreciate your kind words and are glad to hear that we are your go-to guys for car repairs! Have a wonderful day, and we look forward to working with you again in the future.

name: Sarah Kirkland
text: Probably one of the worst customer service experiences I’ve ever had in my life. In short, I had to have it towed there TWICE because they never fixed the problem in the first place, my CAR WAS STOLEN because they left the keys in the car overnight, and then they jerked me around for months after and even refused to pay for getting a new key (that was stolen out of the car.) The owner seems nice, but the people at the front of the house constantly lied to me and my family. Awful, awful service.

name: Austin Howard
text: Had multiple services done on my truck including: lift install, tpms calibration, and alignment. All services done in a timely manner at very reasonable prices. Highly recommend and will be back!

name: Margaret M.
text: Tammy is always easy to work with and  the staff is all trustworthy and dependable when it comes to what maintenance my car really needs verses other chain locations that just want an extra penny.

resp.text: Margaret, thank you for the great rating and for recommending us! Integrity is so important to us and we're glad to see that your experience reflected that. See you next time!

name: Angie Trantham
text: We recently took our van to Greystone Tire and Auto and were very pleased. They did a great job and the prices were incredibly reasonable. We will be back!

name: Ben Evans

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Ben! We take pride in earning the trust of our customers and we're proud to be family owned and operated. We hope to see you back for future auto services!

text: I actually came to the Napa auto parts store next to auto masters for a headlight bulb and the guy wasn’t very helpful but he did suggest this place after I asked him are there any places nearby to help. It was a little after five and I wasn’t expecting them to help that night because they were so close to closing but they instantly sprang into action and fixed everything in less than 10 minutes! Super awesome helpful staff and will definitely use them again in the future.

name: Alex Tobon
text: I have used Greystone Tire and Auto multiple times. As usual the management and mechanics are always polite and helpful. They were prompt and the prices are always reasonable.  If you're looking for a great all around auto service, this is the place.

text: Have used these guys for years and have never once had an issue. Great people that truly care about you and making sure that your vehicle is properly taken care of. Great management and service, I highly recommend!

name: Deanna Helton
text: So I post many reviews and honestly I hate for them to be negative but I have had a horrible experience here. I went in on Tuesday 12/18 because my car was running hot. Tammy was nice enough to give me a ride home while I waited. Firstly my car was not correctly diagnosed I spent over 500$ here and still having the same issue. When I picked it up drove toward Wal-Mart it immediately got hot so the looked at it again right before closing then i leave again same thing finally I park in publix to let it cool down. Again in the morning I take it back. Again they check it send me on my way 30 minutes later car hot again. I call and was pretty much brushed off and was told that they fixed what they thought was the problem. So as of right now I've been charged all this money car still running hot n they acting like it's cool I came in with 1 problem which has still not to be resolved. I will I'm so disappointed I travel alot for work and I'm in Alabama all alone no family I came here expecting a1 service seeing that it's connected to a napa but to spend this type of money and my issue not be fixed I'm so disappointed. Now I have to go get my car worked on all over again so I can hopefully make it home for Christmas.

name: Randy Jaudon
text: Great Place, Quick, Clean  & Friendly.  Tammy was great.  I have a new place to service my vehicle.

text: BEWARE....Don’t trust these guys. We needed a headlight changed on our Prius. We were told how much. When we returned to get the car they charged us an extra $15.00 because they said in was hard! My husband asked well why didn’t you call us first to make sure it was okay. They didn’t have an answer.

text: This is the only place I take our vehicles to.
