When bringing this up he told me they were not willing to work with me on the price and when I was going to leave he mentioned that "Were not the type of people who will call you later and lower the price." So I left, then I went down the street and bought a Honda Accord that was a year older, had more miles on it and paid $1,000 more than the price J told me he wouldn't budge on the Accent. Why? Because Billy at Tameron Honda treated me as a serious buyer who was paying cash and needed a car instead of a 20 year old college girl who J hurried out the door thinking I wasn't ready to buy. It pays to be nice to people.....

name: Charles Hefner
text: Could not have asked, to be treated any better!

resp.text: Thank you Charles!

name: Andy Hawkins
text: Great used car selection

name: Denice Sims
text: Matt was awesome!

name: LaDale Bishop Jr.
text: My experience was great! Lori, my saleswoman, took great care of me!!! Thanks to top notch customer service, from a team of wonderful individuals, I have no reservation in allowing Tameron Hyundai be the place I purchase my next vehicle.

name: Marcus Coleman
text: I had a great experience!  My salesman, Derrick was very knowledgable and decisive in the sales process!  Great job!

name: Cindy Moravitz
text:
This is for our salesperson LORI
1. You were on time for our appt.
2. You had a car waiting for us to look at
3. We wanted a different one and you had it there immediately
4. You let me test drive in an area I felt comfortable
5. You worked hard to get the payments we needed.
6. You kept a straight face when my husband said he wanted payments under $200.00 for a new vehicle, while I sat there laughing.
7.  You ARE an excellent salesperson and I recommend anyone to you.
8. We love our vehicle and thank you for all you did to make it come true.
9.  Since Tom can't leave a review he said you get 10 stars and ditto to all above.
10. MAKE SURE THIS GOES TO YOU SURVEY AND RECORD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
THANKS LORI !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

text: Loved working with Natasha and John. They helped me get exactly the car I wanted for an exceptional price! Very easy to work with and made car buying a great experience.

text: Quick service.

name: Patrice Bailey
text: I LOVE TAMERON HYUNDAI IN HOOVER...I DEAL WITH MATT AUSTIN ONLY IN THE SERVICE DEPT...MATT IS SUCH A VALUABLE CARING REPRESENTATIVE OF THIS DEPT..I TRUST HIM COMPLETELY..HE IS HONEST & GUIDES ME WITH MY VEHICLE..I KNOW HE WOULD NEVER LIE OR MIDLEAD ME WHEREAS OTHERS HAVE AT OTHER CAR SERVICES. I RATE MATT & TAMERON A FULL 5 STARS..WOULD GIVE 10 STARS IF ASKED..NICE TO HAVE HONEST PEOPLE TO TAKE CARE OF MY CAR & SAFETY..THANK YOU ALL & GOD BLESS YOU ALL🙏GOD LOVES YOU❤😇🙏💒💒💒💒

text: The waiting time for me to get my oil changed and an ethanol treatment was exactly right at an hour.

name: Vivian Melton
text: Excellent customer service! I recommend going to Tameron for all your vehicle needs! I have a 2019 Sante Fe and I love it.

name: Teri L
text: Great service easy to get an appointment.

name: Reggie Stokes
text: Great service. Trust these guys 100%

name: BIGGEEKED TV
text: Professional service, I had no problems getting my car serviced.

name: Anthony Mitchell
text: Im new in town and I needed a service for my 2016 Hyundai.sante Fe.  I contacted Tameron Hyundai in Hoover,Al. They gave me a same day appt with Matt in the service dept..He was professional, friendly and knowledgeable, and he also made me aware 3  manufacturer recalsl on my vehicle..well Matt did my service and fixed the recalls and had meout and on my way in a couple of hours..Matt was amazing and also the ladies at the counter had great customer service and friendly smiles and thanked me for my business... Amazing experience! Check them out!

name: Lindsey. Griffin
text: The people are unlike any other dealership. It's a family. It's friendly. It's not a pressure cooker with a demand to buy....They are there to help, and make your comfort, and your needs first and formost. And this is just the first stage. We have not purchased, but are hoping to be soon. Getting our car appraised was fast, and we weren't put in "line" to talk to a sales manager on our option. John Petway is awesome, and will tell you the straight truth, with no bull. THIS is the dealership you recommend. THIS is the dealership that has customers for life.

name: Kirk Deyer, Sr
text: Extremely fast and courteous service!!

name: AMANDA GODWIN
text: The worst service I have ever seen. The manager sold me a car the paint is peeling off. Mind you the car is a 2018 Hyundai Sonata brand new. They run your credit weeks after you have left with the car because they say we have a deal but then the deal will require more paperwork then they cant produce the paperwork so two weeks after you leave with the car you are required to hassle them down for your registration paperwork. Only to find out that the paperwork doesn’t exist. That’s when they don’t call you to tell you and just begin to continue to bash your credit without your permission. Be careful they will lie and scam you. Worse service I have ever had and I have been buying cars for years.

name: Nathan Davidson (ohthelawd)
text: Just bought a CPO Sonata at Tameron in Hoover. It was definitely one of the better car buying experiences I've had. Brandon Crawley and the rest of the team there do a good job of balancing what they can offer vs. what your preferences are. They offer you everything they can, but not in a pushy way. In the end, I got the sense that they actually listened to what I was looking for, and offered a fair deal on trade-in and on the new vehicle. Would certainly recommend them to anyone in central AL looking for a new or used Hyundai.

name: Dennis Read
text: Your service department makes the dealership! Additionally the Service Representatives are helpful and knowledgeable.  Matt was a great help.

name: Chas Smith
text: Adam Ellaham did a fantastic job from start to finish. He made the car buying process enjoyable. I would highly recommend him to anyone!

name: Darneshia Mosley
text: Austin Matt from tameron in Hoover is great but I asked that the noise own my car be check and unfortunately they didn't fix it because once I turn sharp to the right I hear the cracking noise and for the amount of money I paid I think they shouldn't have left anything out now I have to make another trip over to tameron in Hoover because I trusted them to fix my 2014 Hyundai sonata SMH

name: David Cataldo
text: Always top notch service and the price never changes. Once quoted, the work is done and there are no "oops, it is this much not what we said before." No surprises!

name: Wendy Mickler
text: Friendly staff, prompt service

name: T S
text: I am still sitting in the waiting room waiting to hear anything about a simple diagnostic as to why my check engine light is on. No repairs, just testing. This is absurd. I had an appointment for 930, and every other person who cane in after me has come and gone. Why the heck is this taking so long? I am beyond aggravated. This is unacceptable.

name: Jeff king
text: SERVICE WRITER ARE FRIENDLY AND EASY TO TALK TO

name: ying liu
text: I was looking for a new Hyundai 2014 Accent. I went there in Saturday afternoon. Alex Marefka helped me out from the new car test drive to old car trade-in to new car cleaning. I drove in with my old car my left with the cleaned new car in the same afternoon. I like this kind of efficient way and appreciate the good patience and friendly attitude of Alex. I am enjoying my new car so far.

name: Jeannie Leighton
text: Mark Hodgson was so helpful and kind. He recognized that we were returning customers and listened to what I wanted. He then helped me get the the car I wanted for the price I needed. This is how buying a car SHOULD be!

name: Christie D
text: I call about a car that they have not only advertised on their website but also on cargurus and carfax. I drive all the way down there after talking to them and they tell me the car never passed inspection. What I don't understand is why you have it advertised everywhere if you can't sell it. And then want to show me the crappiest cars on your lot. This place is a joke and I will make sure that anyone I know does not waste their time or gas to come to this place. That is false advertisement and i think they are doing it to get people to waste their time just to come to the lot. And on top of that they couldn't get their story straight. I got one person telling me the car had just sold and another person saying it didn't pass inspection. So yes I am beyond angry

name: Jane Meadows, M.S.
text:
AWESOME SERVICE & PERSONAL!!!
On my way from South Alabama to UAB – Birmingham Alabama, I experienced what I thought was a problem with the steering of my IONIQ  hybrid. I was concerned about the safety, and I called corporate Hundyai. They advised me to go to a dealership that afternoon. It was getting very late in the day. However, I did find  Tameron Hyundai that allowed me to come in, and they checked my car.
I first was met by Joe Bajalia, Service Manager, who was Great! I told Joe I was concerned about my safety, and I had a 4 Hour drive back home. He called in his National Award Winning technician, Chris Cochran. Chris took my IONIQ for a test drive, and also checked out the car with his device that identified Car trouble.
After Chris’s Evaluation, he educated me on what I was experiencing in the steering , and how the car is designed to work on the interstate . I felt very comfortable in his confidence and his explanation.
The Previous dealership where I had my car serviced in South Alabama did not put enough air of equal portions in the tires, and Joe got a very polite professional technician to make sure the tires work properly inflated. There was one other man that assisted me when I arrived . This man wrote up the paperwork. He too was also very professional and polite!
I certainly did appreciate Tameron Hyundai taking my concerns seriously , especially when I was concerned about my safety! I had never been to this dealership.  However,  as a woman I am used to being talked down and sometimes not being taken seriously but this was NOT the case at Tameron Hyundai Service department.
Although I live 4 hours away from this dealership, if I lived closer,  they would be my #1 choice in Service!!!
What a positive, efficient, effective, professional and polite service team! As one tech told me, “we have very little turnover here and we are all like family”.
Thank you for your help, and treating this woman with respect and professionalism.
Jane Meadows, M.S.

name: Sue Dobrinski
text: Fast service. A little confusion regarding future maintenance and what I came in for (oil change and key fob check).

name: Nan Rust
text: We got a new Hyundai Genesis Coupe at Tameron Hyundai yesterday. Shannon was wonderful to work with! It was one of the easiest car-buying experiences we've ever had. No back-and-forth, no "sales talk", no hassle. If you need a car, go to Tameron!!

resp.text: Shannon IS great! Thank you so much for taking the time review us, we appreciate it- Enjoy your new car!

name: Linda Wilkinson
text: Prompt and courteous service

name: LaPorcha Houston
text: Service was great and they got me in and out!

name: eric brown
text: Brandon Crawley the the most professional sale person I have ever worked with his patience his attitude he makes sure that his customers are well taken care of and me and my family really appreciate everything he does Tameron should be proud I know a lot of places that would love to have his services and need people like his keep up the good work👍🙏

name: Amy Sehulster
text: Would recommend using Tameron services to friends and family.

name: Jasmine Christion
text: I’ve had my car four years and every time I go in there the customer service is phenomenal! I’m most definitely getting my next car here!

name: Erin Price
text:
If there were a no star option that's what I would have given this place. My service experience was terrible. I had to go in four times for them to replace a plastic cover for my trunk arm. After ordering they would replace it because I didn't have 3 hours to wait for them to do a recall service on something unrelated. Then they tried not to cover a warranty covered replacement because by trip 4 I no longer had it the broken piece. Had they wanted it's simple "please keep that handy until we service your vehicle " would have prevented the problem. After talking to 4 different people the only thing that happened was what should have happened in the first place. They should have thrown in the oil change or cleaned the car or really done anything to make up for my wasted time and money and the fact my child was suffering in the heat. This place is 7 miles from my home --5 trips in total...70miles traveled. Over an hour dealing with sub par service people. Hours spent coming an going. My 9month old baby having to sit in sweltering heat while I deal with the bullshit. I will never ever go to this place again. So much for their great warranty service! When something goes wrong with an item from Amazon or REI or Whole Foods they just fix the problem. They don't hand me back my rotten lettuce and say "we see it's gross could you carry it around until we get a new order in?"
I am irate. I know that they don't care that this happened or that my time was wasted but maybe you reading this will save yourself some grief.

name: Tommy B
text: Just bought a new Sonata from Tameron Hyundai. Had a great experience. Very friendly staff and were easy going and not pushy. Actually kind of had fun.

name: Prestpn
text: the last two service visits were not good. the tire rotation was completed but the lug nuts were not tightened correctly risking a possible accident while driving. this last service was for fuel injection service and one day later service engine light came on. I had to return to dealer to get this condition corrected.

name: Kristy Watkins
text: I had a very pleasant experience when purchasing my 2014 Hyundai Sonata. My salesman, Corey Hooper, listened to what I wanted and him and the staff at Tameron Hyundai made it happen. If you are looking for a new car, you need to give Tameron Hyundai a try.

name: Sherrell Thomas
text: As always the service was fast, professional, and with a clean, and friendly atmosphere. My only concern is the expense, things can get to a little high at cost.

name: Kenneth R Huffman Sr
text: I like that they take time to go over with me whats needed for my wife"s car

name: zach jones
text: We purchased a preowned car from this place and we were told it had the full inspection completed, after 2 weeks the ac compressor failed and the car was having a bad shudder at low rpms. We took it to have the car repaired no rental was issued and after a week we got the car back, the manager claims everything had been fixed but the ride home showed other wise. The ac works great but the shudder is still there unfortunately, be warned when buying a used vehicle from this place.

resp.text: Hello Zach! We're sorry you're having issues with your pre-owned vehicle purchased from us. While we mechanically inspect all vehicles before sale, we cannot guarantee there won't be issues in the future- especially with older vehicles. We would be more than happy to service your vehicle, and if you are totally unhappy with the car- perhaps we could trade you out of it? Please let us know, again we're sorry for the frustration. We would be more than happy to help.

name: jim hicks
text: Where to begin?? My fiancé went to upgrade her car, which was A lease and we were told by the salesman that fees, lease and overages would all be taken care of if we bought a car, which we did. I love the Tucson, however we were lied to. Nothing the salesman said was true. I got a bill from Hyuandi for everything the salesman said he would take care of. When I contacted the sales manager (several times) he blew me off. Needless to say I got stuck with the bill. They have the worst customer service I have ever seen. If you buy from them PLEASE get everything in writing. Do not take their word as I did.

name: James Lawshe
text: Always great service and always get me out in a timely manner.

name: Larry Cummings, CA-AM
text: Ready when promised and I drove off SOOOOOO pleased

name: Joel Reid
text: Always great service!

name: Hunter White
text: Beautiful 2015 Sonata, under budget! My wife and I were all in with an extended warranty and even car insurance through Geico (full coverage) for a monthly payment well below our budget! Thanks to Cherie for working with us. This is the 4th Hyundai purchase from my immediate family and the first for our family. Love Tameron Hyundai.

name: D mckenzie
text: Great professional service as always. Keep up the great work guys. Very well pleased customer.

name: annette campbell
text: I highly recommend working with Ms. Cherie England , she gets you the best deal possible for an car and work very well with what you have . She knows everything you need to know and more . She always helpful when I have questions about my car as well.

name: Regina McAteer
text: From the very beginning, Shannon Cowart made this buying experience the best I ever had. From the initial contact to the completion of the purchase she was most pleasant and knowledgable. She took the time to explain all aspects of the vehicle and especially the electronics. I most definitely will recommend her and this dealership to friends and family.

name: HILDE CAMP
text: Larry was very friendly and knowledgeable and was very fair in dealing with me. I would recommend him to anybody. He even found my glasses and the four dollars in change I left in my old car!

resp.text: Congratulations on your new Sonata Sport! What a great car that you will love for years to come. Thank you for shopping with us, we are elated to see that you enjoyed your time with us.

name: LeAlan Carter
text: I went to look at a car a few days ago with no intention of buying, but my salesman Brandon Crawley really worked with me and got me the car I wanted at a price I couldn't refuse. I never felt pressured at all and everyone I came in contact with while at the dealership was very friendly and courteous. I have had some bad experiences in the past with other dealerships and I found this whole experience with Tameron Hyundai to be great.

name: Debrah Fisher
text: I was able to schedule the service easily online, They took very good care of my car and were most considerate, offering suggestions on to get the necessary work done.

name: Barbara Moore
text: Mr. Brandon was great, very informative, and very helpful.

name: Gil Mauldin
text: I just bought a car at Tameron Hyundai and it was the best car buying experience I've ever had.  Our Salesman Mark Hodgson, was the best salesman hands down.  In fact everyone I came in contact with at Tameron was so nice I didn't feel like I was at a dealership, I felt like I had known these people for years. I would strongly recommend  Tameron if you are in the market for a new or used car.  You won't be dissappointed.

name: Justin Ott
text: Bill Cowan was awesome! They are always good to me and treat me right. They let me know the work before done. Have great pricesand good service

name: C Jones
text:
Terrible buying experience!!! I purchased a car last June and I am still unhappy. I will NEVER purchase from Tameron again. It took over two weeks to get my contract finalized. When I received my final contract, it was past the date to get my car tag. I called and they told me that they would pay the 15.00 late fee that I was charged. I sent my paperwork to them and never heard back. When I purchased the car I told the salesman that the car needed tires and he told me the car didn't  need tires and the tires look like that because they are "low profile". I just had tires put on the car. I purchased an extended warranty that was supposed to cover everything for 2 years or 24,000 miles. I noticed that when I  purchased the car the drivers seat rocked a little. The seat has gotten progressively worse and I took the car to a Nissan Dealership and was told the seat needs to be replaced, the warranty doesn't cover it, and it would be $1,748.00 to fix.
Dear Tameron,
You will never get another dime of mine!!

name: Leon Mills
text: Fast and easy to get my service done

name: Alaina Muse
text: Chris Cochran and the whole service team rock. They always take care of me and they are super fast!

name: Scott Ridley
text: I made a reservation for oil change and noise problem.  I was notified of what the noise was, and oil change was done and I was gone.  Very good service and comfortable waiting area.

name: Lori Earle
text:
Between myself, my husband and our oldest son, we have purchased many cars at many dealerships, but this place was different. Everyone was so genuinely nice (not just being nice to sell you a car), yet very professional at the same time. Shannon seemed to really care about getting me in the RIGHT car, not just A car. I told her my needs, she gave me my options (without being pushy, which I HATE) and I got me a new car! That's the way it SHOULD be!

We also have a 7 year old, so we know where we'll be getting his first car! We'll see you then, Shannon!

name: Daniel Brasher
text:
Had a solid experience a couple days ago with Tameron thanks to the helpful and knowledgeable Jonathan Reeves.  He was attentive to questions and concerns, personable, and as accommodating as he was knowledgeable.  I came in knowing what CPO car I wanted to purchase, aware it was a good deal, but he still took the time to highlight the features and functionality of the car while I test drove it.  The overall vibe is you're buying a service in addition to just your vehicle, which is of course a great way to do business.  I appreciated the time he took to address concerns and make sure I was absolutely satisfied with my purchase before completing the transaction.

Jeremy Blalock also deserves special thanks for advising me on the cheapest way to retitle the car in a different state, which easily saved me a thousand dollars in additional sales tax.  Definitely worth a look if you're considering a car purchase.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Brasher! We appreciate you taking the time to review us! We understand the buying a car is big deal- so of course you should get to know it first! Please contact us with any questions or concerns! Thank you and welcome to the family. Enjoy your new car!

name: Joe Herbert
text: Service was delivered promptly, professionally, and courteously. I'm completely satisfied with my Hyundai and Tamaron's support and service.

text:
Tameron Hyundai was the most accomodating and convenient buying experience I could have expected! As I was searching for my first vehicle as a graduation gift, I was walked through every step while explanations were simple and thorough. JAY was my sales representative and after some approval delays, he brought my vehicle to me on his OFF day and made sure that my transition into a beautiful new Elantra Limited was as smooth as possible. Their motto of "You'll love how you are treated" was no joke- Tameron lived it out to the tee. They set me up with my perfect car at an affordable cost. As a young and inexperienced woman new to the vehicle industry, I felt the employees were not only friendly, but flexible and trustworthy. I undoubtedly know where I will go to in need of a new vehicle and GREAT SERVICE!
Thank you Tameron Hyundai!

text: My car buying experience at Tameron was the best I have ever had. Highly recommend them to anyone looking for a fair deal on a well built vehicle.

text: My car buying experience at Tameron was the best I have ever had. Highly recommend them to anyone looking for a fair deal on a well built vehicle.

name: Suzanne Barry
text: I was driving a Tucson, leased, and nearing the end of the lease.  I came to dealership unsure of what I wanted to do because, although I loved the Tucson I had not had the greatest experience purchasing it.  I met Chris George, who immediately put me at ease with his calm, friendly approach.  He went above and beyond great customer service as he walked me through the entire process, spending time to find out about me and my needs and actually looking for the best car for me, the price I could handle and the best financing process.  He described the features of the car and instructed me on functions and features that I had not even known about in earlier vehicles.  I am still learning about ways that Chris went above and beyond when I received notice that he had notified my insurance agent of my new car, and even notified the leasing agency about my autopay.  I have never had this experience with the many vehicles I have had over the years.  Chris,, where were you when I bought my first car?  You would have changed my impression of what has always been the "daunting experience of car shopping".  Thanks to Chris, and the GM at Tameron Hyundai.

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to review us, and let us know what you think. We greatly value your opinion, and look forward to servicing all of your automotive leads.

name: Ariel Graham
text: I traded in my 2000 Accent for a 2017 Elantra. Everyone at Tameron Hyundai was amazing! Mark made sure I knew about all of the features the new Elantra offers and how to use them. I got the car and color I wanted at a price I can afford. Go see Mark, he's awesome!

name: Stacey McGhee
text: I want talk about my experience with Tameron Hyundai. I had an AWESOME experience buying my car! The sales person Martavise was so helpful and knowledgeable about the car I chose, which is a 2015 Hyundai Sonata, I mean he showed me how to use all the features and I wasn't in there all day like most car lots have people.  The finance guys John & Seth were amazing and really helped me get the best bank and payment I could afford.  Not only was my service good but the warranties I received from Hyundai and Tameron gave me more warranty, now that is how you roll out the red carpet for your buyers. I was even introduced to the Service department manager and I thought that was really cool....no one has ever than that !!! Another cool feature I have is Blue link which is my roadside assistance etc and I downloaded the app and guess what I can start my car while I'm in the house or in California lol! I have told all my friends/family about Tameron Hyundai because it was a Great experience and I AM LOVING MY CAR!!! Thank you...You guys Rock!!!

name: Brittany Sullivan
text: Randall was nice and very helpful. I love having the added benefit of a shuttle to avoid finding a ride or waiting for hours.

name: Eileen Joiner
text: Tameron's service dept was great! Very professional and efficient.. I will certainly go back! A+++

name: Clay Stephens
text: Tameron Hyundai in Birmingham has now sold me my 3rd vehicle, and I couldn't be happier about it.  The sales people are fantastic and supportive.  Management is patient and helps explore every financial option available to get each customer into the right car.  Specifically, Corey L Hooper spent a significant amount of time learning what I wanted, but more importantly, what I needed.  He was courteous, knowledgeable and a real pleasure to work with.  Each question was answered respectfully and with assurance of trust.  I never felt pressured or pushed to select any particular vehicle.  Nor did I ever feel uncomfortable or out of place.  This purchase brought me in for a used truck.  While normally I enjoy purchasing new vehicles because of Tameron's incredible warranty, this time I needed a truck for work purposes.  Corey went through the available used stock, finally settling on the truck I now know, I truly need.  Thanks to Corey Hooper and the entire Tameron family.  Every person I had the privilege of speaking with was more than willing to help in whatever fashion they could.  I will purchase another vehicle from the experts at Tameron again when the need arises.  Thanks again, and I look forward to seeing Tameron's family of professionals again.

resp.text: Hat trick!! We appreciate that you took the time to review us! Thank you for the kind words, please contact us with any of your automotive needs!

name: Shawn Allen
text:
Everything was great from sales to finance.

First maintenance visit went great as well.

name: Christopher Weaver
text: So I am a consumer protection attorney who handles a lot of autofraud cases. Generally,  franchise dealerships are better than the we finance (and then assign that contract to the highest bidder), high quality imports (except for that salvaged title) dealership. These guys were better. Salesman was a bit shady. Service is too, everything else was fine. Car was the wifes choice.  We told Salesman, I wont mention his name, that we just wanted prices, and after test driving a couple cars he got a hissy fit when we told him again that we just wanted prices.  We settled for a 2015 hyunda sonata,  an off lease for a good price (the floor manager, hes quality folks.) Well, the antenna falls of the car, the lil shark fin thing,  the very next day on our way to church.  Wife paid for the extended service contract tho I advised otherwise , and their service initially said they wouldn't fix it, thinking we broke it. ..we had the warranty on top of a service contract, and they initially said no. They changed their mind after my pregnant wife started breathing fire, and fixed it as a "one time courtesy " as if they didnt have to but were being polite.

name: Abby Barrett
text: Rude staff. They will give you an attitude of you take time making up your mind about buying a car. Something was wrong with a truck and we wanted them to see what it was and we were told only if we but the truck. Would never go back

name: Tom Milton
text: The sales staff was courteous and professional throughout the buying process.  My son bought a Sonata last year at Tameron and had the same experience and that is the main reason I returned this year to buy our Santa Fe Sport.

name: Shannon Entrekin
text: Service took great care of me!! Great job!  Will return..  frequently.

name: Lake House
text: This was the best car buying experience I have ever had, and I have bought many automobiles,I'm 88 years old

name: Linda Caffey
text: Great people in this service department.....Tameron Hyundai!

name: Sarah Fisk
text: I'm an older lady who found myself in bad need of a new car. I dreaded going shopping for one by myself. Had heard horror stories of buying a new car. So I walked into Tameron Hyundai scared to death. I first met Danny Pereira. This young man was professional, nice, and helpful. I immediately felt comfortable and that I had come to the right place. Danny found me exactly what I was looking for. There was no pressure or haggling. I can not say enough good about my whole experience. It was unbelievable. There was not one aspect of the sale that was not easy, fun and pleasant.  The manager, the finance manager and the service manager could not be any nicer.  They truly went over and beyond accomodating me. I can honestly say they did treat me like family!  Also, beside being nice, they sold me the prettiest, best driving car I've ever had, and most importantly, at a great price!. I think anybody would be very impressed and pleased doing business at Tameron.

name: DANA REED-VERNON
text: I highly recommend Tameron Hyundai. Everyone I met was so nice.  I could not have asked for a better salesperson in Shannon Cowart.

name: Daniel Corbin
text: I'm always happy with the service I receive at Tameron. Everyone is professional and serve me in a timely manner.

name: melanie carter
text: Always awesome service! Matt always takes great care of me!

name: Grandpa Plays video games
text: Awesome.....shannon took care of me .it was my easiest and most pleasurable experience purchasing a vehicle .....she did exactly what she said she would do right from the start.....I will send her name on to anyone looking to purchase a new vehicle

name: Juan Whitfield
text: Tony did a wonderful job

name: Leaman Griffin
text: I went to Tameron Hyundai after a bad experience elsewhere.  Incredible car buying experience here!! Everyone was friendly, nobody pressures you, candy and snacks to keep the kids entertained etc. Found the perfect suv and was in and out in only a few hours start to finish! Jon Pettway and his team were incredible and if it werent for them it wouldnt be the place it is.  I would recommend them to anyone looking to buy and worried about their dealer being honest and upfront.  Car buying as it should be!!!!

name: Brian Baker
text: Buying a car has NEVER been a fun process for me until I came to Tameron.  Tameron runs like a well-oiled machine.  No detail was omitted.  If I had one word to describe this dealership it is "genuine".  My husband and I always laugh at the cheesy car salesman and their gimmicks but not so this time.  I left Tameron feeling like these people were people I could be friends with--I liked them THAT much.  There is an authenticity there that cannot be manufactured--they've just GOT IT.  This review is saying a lot since this is my 5th Hyundai and 3rd dealership (Auburn and Montgomery being the others). We both said on the ride home "Is it weird that buying a car was that much fun?!?!" We will be forever customers!! Thank you to Shannon, Alex, Richard, and Walt!!

name: Cass Russ
text: They always deliver superb customer service!! Brandon in the service department is awesome!!

name: Hannah Murphy
text: I can’t say enough horrible things about this dealership. Go somewhere where they won’t consistently lie to you

name: Ann Morrison
text: Very thorough.  Service personnel very courteous.

name: julie sutherland
text: Professional And Knowledgeable Staff. Clean, And Quick Drop Off.

name: Regina Bergfeld
text: I went to a couple different dealerships but none of them even compared to Tameron Hyundai! From the moment I arrived at the dealership Brandon Crawley was there to answer all of the questions I had since this was the first time I was buying a car. He helped me get the best price for my Hyundai Elantra, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Tameron Hyundai is definitely the best in Birmingham!

name: Zachary Hall
text: Perfectly cromulent, I just wish they had courtesy vehicles, so I could drive to and from work when I drop off my Genesis for service.

name: Rebecca Hatten
text: Very easy going yet informative salespeople.

name: Diedra Richey
text: My service is always the best.Joe and the team are super nice and courteous.

name: Shedrick Flowers
text: The service department does a great job of getting the work done timely and professionally.

name: Jenni Kress
text: I purchased my Veloster when I lived in GA so I've never dealt with anyone from the sales team at Tameron Hyundai, however I've dealt with the parts and service guys (Tom Land and Todd Hill specifically) since I've been in Bham and they've always been extremely nice and super helpful - if it's not something the dealership can do, they usually have a suggestion or recommendation. Highly recommend these guys - they'll take great care of you!

name: Steven Ogran
text: Oil change and multi-point inspection very affordable and they were very helpful.

name: Judy Patterson
text: Very professional and accommodating. Get in and out quickly

name: Jennifer Powers
text: Went to car max to get a repair and was told I was under the actual manufacturers warranty so they sent me to TAMERON Hyundai to have some service issues done. .....Had a few repairs done to my car. After the manufacturer’s warranty ended, the holding tank for the windshield washer fluid broke.... SO...I scheduled an appointment at tameron Hyundai just like before. .....I’m glad I called my warranty to double check because tameron wanted me to pay $50 deductible even though I purchased the 60 month 125,000 extended warranty. Service manager tried to get me to pay $50 knowing it would be free at carmax. Yep. Can’t trust anyone.

resp.text: Hello Ms. Powers, we're sorry to read that you feel misled by our service department. However, since your extended warranty was purchased at CarMax, that deductible is waived only at CarMax. Of course we are more than happy to service your vehicle, we cannot honor all stipulations of a warranty that only serves the location of purchase. Please give us a call if you have any more questions! Thanks for reaching out.

name: Susan Mooresmith
text:
Positive experience, other than the Cost of Service, at $141.00 for the
8,000 Mile Service.

name: Gloria Donworth
text: Larry Johnson was extremely professional and helpful as he went way above and beyond to take care of every detail in the purchase of my new Sonata.  Larry should be commended for his efforts to please the client.

name: Ian Oliver
text: Good experience, solid offer on my trade in, can't complain.

name: J FIKES
text: The service manager was rude and a little demeaning. I took my car in for a recall for the seatbelts which states that the links could come detached from the pretensioners and could cause serious injury but when I went in all the paperwork said they did was install a sticker. When I asked if that's all it needed then why say the seatbelts could come detached, he says, I don't know why they would say that and why would I lie about that? Well a lot of ppl lie for no reason. Also where is this supposed installed sticker because I still don't see it on the either seatbelt!!! Such a waste of time. But I did get to meet someone extremely nice by the name of Christina Jowers. Go buy your from her.

name: Alan Thompson
text: Have purchased a total of 4 cars there. Overall I am pleased with them.

name: Latoya Hearns
text: We bad one hiccup there but other than that the customer service is great. We have always been treated well there.

name: Tommy Carneal
text: Great customer service. Cherish is the best

name: Sheila R Tingle
text:
Brandon in the service dept is a Rockstar !!
He went over the top to help me with my vehicle !

name: Keef C
text:
Update - July 2016:
Had to take the same Veloster Turbo mentioned below in for a replacement wheel sensor, and to get a couple of service bulletins completed. Matt, the service manager, did a phenomenal job of keeping me informed of the work and any challenges that developed with securing parts, as well as of any additional service work the car was due to have. I was pleasantly surprised at how effective the entire process was, and have to bite my tongue re: expected "dealership experiences". If you have to bring your car in for service to the dealership, I'd highly recommend Matt.

If I had to choose a less than favorable part of the overall experience, it'd have to be the shuttle service. Completely unorganized it seemed, and not very good at following up with customers (at least with me) concerning transport to/from the dealership.

Original - August 2013:
I just recently purchased a Hyundai Veloster Turbo from Tameron, and the experience was definitely a favorable one.  I had the opportunity to work with Mike Kelly, which turned out great.  From my initial, quite spontaneous interest in the car, to the test drive, to the eventual price haggling process, Mike presented himself professionally and factually throughout the entire experience.  He displayed a tremendous amount of respect for my desires with regards to the sale, we both managed to appreciate each other's role in the brief relationship, and we were both able to come to an agreement that both saved me an acceptable amount of expense and allowed Tameron to earn a profit from the purchase.  Mike was very forthcoming regarding his thoughts on the car, as well as advice for making the most of the transaction, and it was and is still very much appreciated and made the overall interaction much easier through which to navigate.  I'd definitely recommend seeking out his expertise if considering a car from Tameron Hyundai, or any car available through Tameron's services, in the near future.

name: Jana Whisenhunt
text: Brandon Crawley was my salesman, but was the first person I've ever dealt with buying cars, that truely broke the mold. No pressure to buy was ever felt and that was much appreciated. The team at Tameron Hyundai is awesome, and all were helpful in making it a pleasant experience. I will definately recommend them to my friends and visit them again, the next time I am ready to purchase a car.

name: Kristie Rankin
text: Great experience! Wonderful staff and fast service.

name: Matt Vinzant
text: This was my first experience shopping for a hyundai and I was very impressed with the customer service at Tameron.  Brandon and Mark were down to earth and friendly even staying after hours in order to help with all the features of my new veloster.

name: Bret Reaves
text: Great car dealership in Alabama.  Nathan Jordan is an excellent sales associate and very knowledgable about the cars here.

name: Renell Grantham
text: When I tell you that I was car shopping, understand that shopping is the key word. I test drove 9 different vehicles in the crossover class by every different manufacturer you can think of. I had a price in mind that I would spend and I was not going to spend a penny more. Since I was just shopping and did not have to have a new car. The ONLY place I visited more than once was Tameron Hyundai and that was thanks to my sales person Shannon ! She was amazing. Not pushy at all she just wanted to make sure that I understood everything about the cars that I drove and that I got the best pricing I could get. I walked away with everything I wanted in a car for exactly what my OTD price was. I bought a Santa Fe Sport 2.4 with every package you can add from SHANNON the best sales person on staff at Tamaron Hyundai.

resp.text: Ms. Grantham, we sure do appreciate you taking the time to review us! We love to hear that our customers enjoyed their experience with us! We hope you are enjoying your new Hyundai and give us a call or stop by if you need anything from us!! Thank you!!

name: Jan Parks
text: They've always taken great care of my car and will take me home or elsewhere if I don't want to wait.

name: felipe corral
text: Wait until your car brakes down see how good there powertrain  warranty really is. It is just a selling point. Buy somewhere else!

resp.text: Mr. Corral we are so sorry to hear about your car issue, please know a manager will be calling you soon to go over the warranty and see what we can do to help you!

name: Felicia Pascual
text: Great experience. Brandon and Adam were awesome at helping us get exactly what we needed!!

name: Huel Young
text: Tom is always very helpful with explanations to my questions, and the service was timely.

name: dphinis porter
text: I thank yall so much for everything ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

name: David Black
text:
My wife and I have just completed the purchase of a Genesis from Tameron Hyundai.  Contrary to the stereotypes many in the automotive sales profession have, we found Tameron's sales staff to be very helpful each time we stopped by, or contacted them for information.

What we appreciate probably the most is that we did not feel pressured to buy.  Whenever we had questions, they were answered, and phone calls were returned.

Eddie Sterling wound up being our main sales agent for the purchase, and we quickly understood why he has won awards for his sales expertise; his knowledge of the products was excellent.  He seemed genuinely interested in making sure that we were buying the right car for our preferences and needs, as opposed to just making a sale.  Other sales people and staff who helped us at different times were very nice to deal with, as well.

We would not hesitate to buy again from Tameron.

name: Paul Stephenson
text: Oil change good

name: Keef C
text:
Update - July 2016:
Had to take the same Veloster Turbo mentioned below in for a replacement wheel sensor, and to get a couple of service bulletins completed. text: My service is always the best.Joe and the team are super nice and courteous.

text: This was my first experience shopping for a hyundai and I was very impressed with the customer service at Tameron.  Brandon and Mark were down to earth and friendly even staying after hours in order to help with all the features of my new veloster.

name: Sylvester Johnson
text: I am ecstatic about my 2015 Sonata! Mark Hodgson not only got me the price that was comfortable for me, but he also made the experience a lot of fun! He, along with Adam Ellaham got me taken well care of!

name: Kent Graeve
text: Outstanding service; above and beyond what would be expected

name: william smith
text: Shannon was excellent and the service and attention to the particulars on closing the sale were outstanding. I would recommend her to anyone interested in buying from Tameron Hyundai.

name: Annette Stephens
text: I was interested in the Veloster, but they appeared to be hard to find in the Hoover area. I spoke with Eddie Sterling about what I wanted, color and all, and he was able to get it delivered promptly. They were very friendly at the dealership and went the extra mile to accomodate my request. I would send family and friends looking for a car to Tameron.

name: John Schilleci
text: Matt in service was great.

name: David Black
text:
My wife and I have just completed the purchase of a Genesis from Tameron Hyundai.  Contrary to the stereotypes many in the automotive sales profession have, we found Tameron's sales staff to be very helpful each time we stopped by, or contacted them for information.

What we appreciate probably the most is that we did not feel pressured to buy.  Whenever we had questions, they were answered, and phone calls were returned.

name: Shannon Harris
text: My husband and I were initially looking for a used Azera to trade for my Acura as a attempt for lower payments. Jay Johnson showed us the new 2015 Sonata with more features than the Azera and we were sold. Jay was one of the best salesman we have ever encountered thus far. He was very professional and helped us from start to finish. Because it was raining on the day we purchased the car, I was able to come back and get it cleaned. Kudos to Jay and the staff. Great experience and I love my new Sonata!

name: Tommy Payson
text:
My wife and I went into the dealership with no real intent to buy but more to find what car we might want to look at more. As soon as we walked in, we immediately noticed the laid back and no pressure atmosphere of the dealership when we met our sales guy Davey P. He was very warm and personable and it was obvious that he wanted to understand our needs before trying to sell us something we did not want or a car out of our price range.

Davey grabbed some keys for a black Hyundai Tuscon that almost perfectly matched the description of what we were looking for and we went on a very enjoyable test drive with him. It was a very easy interaction and we did not feel pressured at all. My wife ended up not really liking the leather option on the car so instead of trying to upsell us, Davey immediately found another car with exactly what we asked and we were sold! Davey and the Tameron team worked very hard to make sure we were able to get the finances where we needed them to be and they were very thorough in the entire sales and financing process.

Overall, this was an excellent experience and Davey in particular really kept my wife and I interested in working with Tameron. We'll definitely be pointing our friends in Tameron's direction!!

name: Paul Stephenson
text: Oil change good

name: brian smith
text: I had just got off work and my appointment was later that morning for a recall problem. They got me right in and there were several other issues that he told me about. He told me what was an immediate issue and what could wait. I will return for future service. Monica Smith

name: Annette Burrell
text: I love coming to Tameron Hyundai in Hoover, Al. I'm always treated with the best customer service from sales to the General Manager. No other team I've experienced works harder for the customer than Tameron Hyundai!

name: Moses G
text: Staff is friendly not pushy trying to fast talk you into a deal

name: Xeta mancer
text: Mark Hodgson caught me at the door when I wandered in looking to expand my car search horizons.  He knew I couldn’t buy same day, but went that extra mile with me to educate me about a potential car I was interested in and he invested his time above and beyond to get me in a confident state of mind for my purchase.  Mark remained patient with me while I dealt with an superbly incompetent dealership service department (one Dewey Barber Chevrolet to be specific) over a dying, relatively young Chevy Cruze.  Despite all of those setbacks, on top of being a year out of bankruptcy, having no cash on hand for a down payment, and now being upside down in a financed car, Mark came through for me.  I’m stressing as my wedding and honeymoon are coming up and I have no vehicle to make these events happen and Mark assured me with a hundred percent confidence “You’re leaving here in a new car”, and he did not deceive!  I got a fair price and a reasonable payment on a brand new, 2018 Elantra with enough protections in place to give me peace of mind for the time I’ll be spending with my new ride.  I can genuinely call Mark a life saver, and my wedding plans aren’t ruined now because he stuck it out with me and helped me make my new car dream a reality.  Give Tameron Hyundai a shot and ask for Mark, you’ll be surprised at what these folks can make happen for you!

name: Wendy Trucks
text: Used car sales team and finance  team exceeded my expectations on buying a newer car....mark hodgson and walt lee made the experience amazing...i will be a repeat customer

name: Courtney Osborne
text: Thanks to Mike Kelly I am now driving around in a brand new Elantra!!  Mike took me on a course that let me try the car out on straight, curvy and highway roads.  He was also very knowledgeable about the specific features of the car.  This was helpful because he was able to tell me things that I wouldn't have even known to ask.  After we got back I knew that I was ready to drive this new car home.  The process of trading in my old car and purchasing the new one was made super easy.  Everything from beginning to end was explained to me and made me feel very comfortable.  Before driving off the lot Mike helped me set my phone up through bluetooth so I could talk handsfree.  He also showed me how to use all of the features/buttons in the car in a way that easy to understand.

resp.text: The Elantra is a great car with all the bells and whistles in a compact, super chic style!  We are glad that you enjoyed buying your vehicle with us! We hope to service all of your automotive needs in the future. Thanks!

name: Belinda Brennan
text: Quick, polite, courteous and efficient.

name: Aaron Pinhas
text:
Unbelievable pack of dirtbags.

I reached an agreement on price and terms on a car over the phone and said I'd be there in 20 min with a check. I was called back a mere 2 min later and told the car was already sold to someone else.  Over the next week and a half or so, I was called no fewer than 7 times by 5 different employees of the dealership alternately telling me the car was still available and that the car had been sold but that there was another one they wanted to show me.  I had someone else do an online chat during which he negotiated, in written email communication, the exact same price I'd been quoted originally.  I went in the next day, check in hand, only to be told that the price was now $1000 higher and was absolutely firm.

Needless to say, I walked out and won't be returning.  If they felt they could make more profit selling to someone else, they should have simply said so upfront instead of jerking me around for nearly two weeks and then trying to bleed me for more money.  What a colossal waste of my time and a clear demonstration of the utter lack of respect these clowns have for their customers.

resp.text:
Mr. Pinhas, thank you for taking the time to review us online- Unfortunately, you had a disappointing experience with us. It might not surprise you to hear we now have a new General Manager, Rob Gallik, who understands and wants every customers to have a wonderful experience here! I apologize that we weren't able to assist you and make shopping more of a pleasure and less stressful experience. We still hope that we can change your mind about us. If you ever need anything automotive wise in the future, we hope that you could consider coming to the new Tameron and letting us show you something very different.

Thanks again for reaching out, please give us a call if we can ever change your mind!

name: Ayman Farag
text: It was great experience, all were professional and helpful.

name: Michelle James
text: The service professionals were very nice and informative.

name: D C
text: Great customer service 👍

name: Steven Ford
text: Love this place!! Fast service!

name: frank hester
text: Marcus was helpful in finding the car we wanted and the process of purchasing it

name: Mike Coop
text: Visited Tameron Hyundai recently to take a look at a Santa Fe for my wife. We were greeted by Daniel Pereira, we let him know this was our first time looking at the Santa Fe and we were just looking today. He asked us a few questions about what was important in a car to us and then said he had one in mind that my wife my like. He pulled it out front and my wife immediately feel in love. We began talking numbers but were never persured. We had our one year old and three old with us but they made them feel at home supplying balloons and snacks. Within two hours my wife was pulling off the lot in her brand new Santa Fe. Eveyone at Tameron treated us with respect and curiosity and Daniel went out of his way to take care of us before and after we purchased the vehicle.

name: Anola Schulz
text: Was pleased with my service.

name: Jim Powell
text:
The only positive thing I can say about purchasing a used car here is I learned all the ways you can get screwed by a used car salesman.

I brought in two used cars and bought two "newer" used vehicles. I"ll be up front, I made every stupid decision you could buying a used car. The Yukon my wife wanted had a little difficulty starting (that was my first warning sign I failed to heed). When I asked the salesman he just brushed it off as it hadn't been turned on that day (my second warning sign).

When we got into the room for negotiations I told him upfront what my requirements were. He then (what I later learned is a typical salesman trick) went to "argue" with his boss about giving me the deal I wanted. After a few hours he finally invited me back to his "bosses" office to sign the deal.

When I sat down to sign, he handed me a stack of papers that I spent some time reviewing. I honestly could not make sense of the numbers. When I started asking him about them he responded, "I thought we were here to buy a car!" (my final warning sign I failed to heed). I caved to this high pressure sales tactic and just wanted to get out of there as quick as possible as it had already been 4+ hours. When I finally got my vehicles they said it took so long because they had to "clean" them. Worst cleaning job ever.

The NEXT day the Yukon I bought died in a parking lot. I should have taken it back and got my Expedition back I traded in but I felt like I had to make do with what I bought (besides, I bought the warranty!) Took it to a local repair shop and sure enough the fuel pump needed to be replaced. Lucky for me, I only had to pay the $100 deductible!

Less than a year into owning the vehicle, the transmission went out. Fortunately for me I again ONLY had to pay the $100 deductible to replace the transmission. Little did I know, transmissions tend to go bad again after they go out the first time. About a year later, the transmission went out a second time! That was the final straw, so I traded it in at Driver's Way where I had a MUCH better experience.

Now, my second car I mentioned I bought that same time along with the Yukon ended up having a broken motor mount and the A/C compressor went out less than a year after purchase. Both vehicles were only 3-5 years used and less than 75k miles on them. Maybe I just had terrible luck from Tameron Hyundai but I can't help but feel they knew about these issues and just passed them on to me based on their sales practices.

Tameron Hyundai lives by the moto "Caveat emptor"... Lesson learned. Never again.

name: eai13
text: TAMERON HYUNDAI is AMAZING!!! I genuinely cant express just how amazed and grateful I am to them. About 4 months ago I financed my first ever car. I am in my mid-twenties and was in desperate need for a vehicle (at least a reliable one lol). I had always had a hand-me down car or bought one from out of somebody's driveway. So when it came time for me to want to BUY an actual car, Tameron Hyundai was the ONLY dealership that could help me out. I spent an entire week going to different dealerships all over the Birmingham area. It was Ridiculous how every place turned me away because I didn't have $8,000 down, or an established credit line, or just lazy sales people who could care less to help a young man/single parent out. When I finally got to Tameron they blew me away with what seemed like the red-carpet treatment lol. They were friendly, knowledgeable, and committed to making sure that I drove away in a new whip. The sales managers Larry Keene and Rob Galik worked their tails off to get me a new ride WITH an warranty. They even gave me options on which ride I wanted, all of which had an affordable payment. On-top of that, they even made my lil girl a balloon and got her a coke when she was thirsty:) They went to bat, looked out for me, and got me the ride I needed. My sales person even calls to check up on me and my car; I bought it 4 months ago lol. I couldn't recommend these guys any higher. Its nice to know that I can count on that for the next 20 years, ALL of my vehicles will come from Tameron Hyundai :)

name: Andrea Arrington
text: Thanks , Brandon great job!

name: tavares mcelrath
text: Just didn't think they were really wanting to help my mom get in a car. So we went to McKinnon Nissan and they put my mom in a car.

name: Alexander Bloom
text:
Tameron’s sales and finance professionals are top notch and they stand by their products whether you are buying a new or used vehicle.  My story didn’t begin with a five star experience but it ended with one.
I purchased a used Tucson at a great price.  My salesman, Nick Foster took care of us and got us through negotiations without any hiccups.  We got what we asked for with minimal resistance.  Tim Provost, in finance, processed the paperwork and made us feel comfortable throughout the process.  All was well.  9 days after our purchase we were informed by Tim that the car had been wrecked and repaired prior to our purchase.  Not the best thing you want to hear, but let me tell you how refreshing it is to deal with the team like Hyundai who make integrity and honesty a priority in their day-to-day.  The wreck was not on Carfax or Autocheck so no harm no foul.  They purchased their car back with no penalties imposed on myself.  Still though, I was ready to walk away.
One of the owners, Rob Gallik, learned of what had happened and met with me personally.  I was very impressed with this alone.  He apologized for the inconvenience and offered us several options if we were still interested in buying with them.  His personal touch and a great deal (we think) put us in a new car that day (Sonata).  Our salesman on the new car side was Daniel Pereira.  Great guy!  Very mellow and we did not feel pressured with him during our time together.  Really we felt no pressure to take any deal at all but Rob’s offer was hard to refuse.
Overall I rate these guys a perfect score because of the way we felt after the ordeal was over.  Our two week long relationship was a bit strenuous at times but they came through in the end treating us like family (the kind you like).  Thanks Nick, Tim, Rob, and Dan.  I look forward to seeing you guys again.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear that we were able to work everything out to your liking! Thank you for taking the time to review us, we appreciate your business! Please let us know if you have any questions!

They have a great team there that understands what customer obsession is all about. Thank you for the great purchase and I am sure I will be referring customers in the future.

name: Jim Clark
text:
Recently, my daughter was traveling from Tuscaloosa to the Birmingham airport and had some car trouble.  She managed to make it to Premiere Chevrolet in Bessemer.  They not only scheduled the car for repairs, but got her to the airport in time to make her flight home for Christmas.  Upon returning to Birmingham, they picked her up at the airport to take her back to her repaired vehicle.  She is now safely back in Tuscaloosa to finish her Senior year.  So appreciative of their efforts, and the fact that we were still able to enjoy Christmas with her.

They also did a fantastic job of explaining and fixing the problem with her car.  I just can’t imagine receiving this kind of service anywhere else.  Great service, with above and beyond southern hospitality.  You can’t go wrong with this dealership.

text:
I can not say enough good things about Premiere as a whole. From beginning to end the buying process was seamless. We arrived at 5:30 and were home by 8. The longest part of the whole process was sitting in line at Taco Bell after we left.
Our Sales Consultant, Michael Williams, was friendly and professional and went above and beyond for us. While we bought the truck last night, we left it overnight for washing and detailing and he met us on his off day tonight for us to pick up our new (to us) truck and on top of that filled the tank for us!

name: Jeff Davis
text: I had the best car buying experience I’ve ever had. I told our salesman, Henry Corley what I was looking for and he listened. I think that’s the key difference at Premiere Chevrolet. Henry wanted to put us in a vehicle that served our needs. He wanted us to be happy. The entire dealership seemed to display this quality atmosphere. I think Henry Corley was as happy as we were helping us find the vehicle that was perfect for our needs. All because he listened to us, he delivered exactly what we were looking for. name: Krista Simpson
text: The dealership had the vehicle I posted for one price and then sold it for another price. Then when I looked online I realized that the dealership is known for doing such. So much so that they have reviews stating that and they even put it in a description for the vehicle which I didn’t see prior to. I think it is very unfair to post a car for one price to get the customers up there and then once the customer is there the price is 4-5 thousand dollars more than what you expect to pay. That is pretty much false advertisement and then they don’t want to give you the vehicle for the price that they have it listed for. I think that is ridiculous and pretty annoying.

text: I initially contacted them regarding a 2021 trailblazer they had on the lot on Wednesday and was immediately put in contact with Grant Copeland. Grant Copeland and the rest of the staff there at premiere chevrolet definitely made this one of the best dealership experiences we've had in years!  Thanks alot for everything!

My husband only has one off day every now and then and he spent his entire day at premiere and came home with absolutely no answers. We’re very disappointed  in the service department. name: VaQuita M. Curry
text: The dealership did not have the color suv that I wanted, but they did find one for me at another dealer. They went to pick it up as well, which was great.  There are a couple things that were overlooked as one of the tires was out of balance pretty badly and the detail job left swirl marks when they washed it (it's a black vehicle, so you can notice everything on them). I had to take it somewhere else to find and correct the tire issue as the dealership informed me that new tires ride a certain way the first 500-750 miles.  I've purchased a number of brand new vehicles, and never encountered a vehicle shaking/vibrating like that.  After I requested that they check again (leaving it with them), I was informed that the tires had too much air. After the issue still existed, I took it elsewhere and it drove so smoothly once the out of balance tire was fixed.  They stated that they would reimburse me. The people are nice at the dealership, but taking a little more time to ensure things are done and checked correctly would have made the overall experience a lot better.

name: JOHN AKERS
text: Noticed a vibration in frontend of my 2017. Daniel signed me in and said he would let me know what the problem was. In a short time he told me that the transmission fluid needed to be changed and that it would take about 2 hours. I told him to go ahead. In about 2 hours he came and told me I was ready to go.

resp.text: Thank you John for taking time to share your experience here at Premiere Chevrolet. Daniel prides himself with delivery excellent service and will certainly keep you in the loop during your entire service visit. We believe in building lasting relationships and value you as a customer!

name: I Am Nerd
text:
I would not recommend buying from this dealership or getting your vehicle fixed from here. The salesman when I was purchasing, knew the budget I wanted to stick too. He quoted us $50 above our monthly amount. We agreed to it. The next day when seeing the financial department, they tell me my monthly price was $75 more than the salesman's quote. So an extra $125 than I was told. Very deceptive but I wanted that vehicle. So I got it. Then the salesman tells me "Hey, we got it pretty close." No not close at all.

Then was told at 7000 miles I would get a complimentary oil change, rotation and balance by the same salesman. Well guess what? Not so, they said I would have to pay for the balance.

Before my free oil change, I ran over a small screw and my back left tire was loosing some PSI. Called the dealership and they told me I would have to pay $250 + for a new tire and work. They said they couldn't patch it. So I called 2 other professional tire shops and they laughed when I told them what the dealership told me. I got it fixed for $8 and took less than 10 min. And it's like brand new. No issues.

If you want to be treated right and not be deceived and lied too, please,  don't come here. Do yourself a favor and find another Chevy dealership.

resp.text: Hi Jacob, we appreciate you taking the time to give us more details about your experience. We value our customer's feedback as we are always looking for ways to improve. Do you mind giving our GM, Robert Pollard a call when you can? (205)424-4121, thank you.

name: Arthur M
text: I dropped my vehicle off Monday morning. I'm told by Daniel that they would look at it THAT DAY. Although he told a guy in line in front of me that it would be Wednesday before he could get an diagnostic. I call Daniel back later that evening for him to tell me that it would be the next morning (Tuesday) before they could look at it. I call Daniel again at 12pm Tuesday and he said that they looked at it off and a couple times but they really haven't looked at it thoroughly and that it would be later that day. I called around 3pm and he said that he would let me know something before they left that day. No call. I call again on Wednesday @at 12 pm and I'm left on hold for a few minutes and the secretary comes back to take a message. He supposedly was  busy with another customer. I don't get a call. Again, I call back around 430pm and he tells me that the mechanic had to hold my battery cable to start the vehicle. And it would be $650  to change my battery cables. SIX HUNDRED AND FIFTY DOLLARS!!  I show up Thursday morning to pick my vehicle up and it won't start. Mind you, I started the vehicle everyday for two weeks since having the initial problem. Daniel laughs in my face  when I expressed that to him. After I left I tighten the battery cable(30 second process)and the truck starts just fine. I took that as we don't want to fix your vehicle if you expect us to do what we say.  Wish I could give them a zero.

resp.text: Thank you, for your business and thank you for your feedback. Our goal is to make every experience a pleasant and memorable one, but we apologize for your inconvenience while visiting our store. Please call our service manager, Barry Sparkman (205)424-4121.

name: Mark Gwynn
text:
I had previous recalls with my company leased truck before and I had taken it to H????? Chevrolet. Short story - it was extremely frustrating working with H?????: it took several days beyond the promised timeframe and the communications were non-existent. I was very angry with how I was treated - even their service manager's apology was poor.

So with these new recalls, I decided to bring the truck to Premiere Chevrolet. My first contact on the phone was terrific and responsive, the service team was ready to go when I arrived, and  the work was done in less than an hour (the original promise from my first phone call was 1.5 hours). The waiting area was clean, pleasant, and safe. I could tell that Premiere Chevrolet was not just a different level of Chevrolet dealership, but a different level of auto dealership and business all together. Everyone respected the current COVID 19 restrictions and protections, so as an "at risk" person, I really appreciated that as well. Everyone was super and Daniel Slaten was extremely professional. I appreciate Premiere Chevrolet's dedication to customer service - it was very apparent!

resp.text: Good work ethic, and attention to detail which is why you’ll always get top notch customer service from Premiere Chevrolet. We are overjoyed that we were able to provide this to you, Mark. Thank you again for your kind words!

name: Kristie Williams
text:
I have a close friend that recently bought a car from this dealership. From the moment she drove off the lot, she begun experiencing problems with her mini copper. She posted her experience, however, it was deleted from the reviews. Here is what she said

"As a spouse of an armed service veteran, I recently purchase a 2012 Mini Cooper countryman from premiere Chevrolet. The day of the purchase one of the warning lights was on, the dealer ship couldnâ  t figure out why it was on and how to get rid of it, That was my first incident  with the car, but since I drove over an hour away to pick the car up I trusted the dealership in that the car was good and they said that it was just a sensor. Two days later the check engine light came on , still thinking that it was the sensors, I over look at the magnitude of the situation. Exactly 4 weeks after having the car, it started smoking so I had to get it towed to Mini Cooper. Mini informed me that I have an oil leak, my turbo went out, and other things. My grand total for repairs come to 13,000 dollars. I think that it was very unprofessional and dishonest that You sold me a car that needed so much work done to it. I would not recommend buying a used car from this business."

name: Linda Roberts
text: Appointment at 9:00.  Service completed by 10:00.

resp.text: Thank you Linda Roberts for taking the time to share your experience here at Premiere Chevrolet. Our service department work hard at getting your vehicle in and out in a timely manner. Looking forward to seeing you again for your next routine service visit.

text:

ASSOCIATES ARE MOST FRIENDLY AND PROFESSIONAL AND COURTEOUS.  THANKS JEFF FOR POINTING US TOWARD MICHAEL OUR SALES PERSON. YA'LL ARE THE GREATEST!!!!

Your feedback means a lot to us and we want to make every visit memorable and enjoyable. Please call me at 205.424.4121 in order to resolve the issue. My name is Shirley Grayson and I am the E-Commerce Manager here at Premiere Chevrolet. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

text: Sales side of the dealership is great! The inside of the building could use some upgrades, but really, for the amount of time we were there, it was fine. The service department is, however, very slow. If you're in the market for a new vehicle you should check them out!

text: Had to bring my car in for a bumper, hood and windshield. The service I got there was great. name: Emily G
text:
What an absolutely wonderful experience. We drove in from north of Nashville, about 4 and a half hours. I had the pleasure of working with Grant over the phone, then Michael when we arrived. The vehicle we purchased was EXACTLY as described over the phone by Grant, he even sent me pictures via text. He was upfront, honest, and just so kind. When we arrived, the vehicle we came to see was parked in the front and ready for us to look over and test drive. Michael answered all of our questions and was very helpful. When it was time to complete our sale, Grant already had all of our paperwork done ahead of time, it took about 30 minutesto sign a few things  then walk out the door with our new vehicle.

We had been looking for a month for a replacement vehicle for me after mine was totaled. I spoke with numerous dealerships within a 150 mike radius of Nashville. There were several times that we drove over an hour out of our way to see one, only to arrive to find the vehicle was NOT at all as described, it was beyond infuriating. Premier Chevrolet was 100% up front and honest from the first phone call. We will absolutely do business with them again, and also recommend them to our friends and family should they be looking for a vehicle.

Thank you so very much to Grant and Michael for going above and beyond what I even expected from a car dealership. It was so great to meet you both, and we really appreciate you and your hard work.

resp.text: We strive to be the best for you and your car Emily. Thank you for taking the time to acknowledge us, we hope to meet all your needs in the future!  Again, Congratulations on your purchase!

name: Dannielle Myrick
text: I bought a vehicle from Premiere Chevrolet in January of 2019. Hoping that I would not have to have problems with a vehicle for some time. I went to the dealership because I was told they were representable. They sold me a vehicle that has major electrical problems. So now it is July of 2019 and I have a vehicle that has been sitting up for 2 months and cost more to fix than the car is worth. I have already put about $1,000 worth of repairs into the car. And now it's going to cost me quite a bit more to get it running.

resp.text: Dannielle, Thank you, for your business and thank you for your feedback. Our goal is to make every experience a pleasant and memorable one, but we apologize for the inconvenience you have experienced with your car. We want to acknowledge that you have been in conversation with our upper management to address your complaint.

name: Tammy Cliett
text: The sales people are not willing to work with you, even on a cash offer!!

resp.text: Tammy, I have looked through our system and can't seem to find your information. Do you mind giving me a call so I can see what we can work out? My name is Tristin Hunt and my phone number is (205)481-0707. Thanks!

name: Ashley M Richards
text: Premiere Chevrolet has always been good to me. I am a very loyal customer and I always recommend them to anyone until what happened last Thursday. My wallet was stolen and I had money in it. I talked to the owner to see if I could get reimbursed some of the money back and all he said was be is not responsible and just apologized a couple of times. It's the fact that I didn't receive the money back it's the fact that he didn't offer me anything at all. No type of help discounts nothing. I don't want to receive a car from a company that doesn't help you when you really need it. The owner could have helped me he just didn't want to and my wallet was the only one that was stolen. I'm not saying don't go to them for that specific reason but I am saying loyalty or making sure the customer is satisfied doesn't matter to them as much as you think. It's OK though because soon I will doing business with someone else and giving them my car back. He didn't offer me anything to trade in my car so for two days I walked out with nothing. I will receive my belongings back but I won't forget this.

name: toby jolly
text:
Here is how premier chevrolet works:

I just tried to buy the truck in the picture. It is clearly advertised on their website for $43k. I was going to trade my loaded f150 fx4 which is very nice. They offered $17k for my truck. I keep up with truck values pretty close so I know my truck will retail in the $23k range. Whatever, I was expecting a $19-20k trade offer but $17k was close enough to start dealing. EXCEPT... They had their truck at $53k on the paperwork, $10k over advertised price. I also have been looking at these trail boss chevrolets and I know they sell everywhere for under $45k. So, long story short they were trying to get my truck for $7k.

I was in the car business for a lot of years. There are good dealerships out there that treat their customers fair with no bs. Premier is not one of those dealerships. Do business with them at your own risk.

text: Ya'll, this is a great dealership! We have now purchased two new trucks from them, and each transaction was pretty quick, and painless lol. We had our 3 young kids in tow each time, and their waiting area with toys was perfect and the staff is super sweet and friendly. Winston Carroll was our salesman who is great! And Bill in financing is straight forward and there to help! This is the dealership everyone should go to, trust me!!! Dont waste your time trying the other dealerships, especially if you know your patience will run out with kids :) Thank you Premier! You have a loyal family here!!! Will always happily recommend ya'll!

resp.text: Lindsey, thank you for leaving such a grand review! It is family like you who are the "life's blood" of any organization. We will be sure to tell Winston and Bill about your positive comments. See you soon!
